Fantastic family fun. 3 girls (9,12,14) plus parents had a great time escaping - as the time ticks down really gets exciting - shortest hour ever!

Fantastic Experience. We came to Clue Quest as a family of four as we had read the reviews and wanted to try something fun, challenging and different. Clue Quest was all of those things. We all had a great time, my sons are 12 and 16 and they both thoroughly enjoyed it. We will definitely be going back to do Operation Blacksheep. Great Experience, thanks Mr Q!!

Excellent, heart racing fun. Booked Plan52 room for our family, including sons aged 8 and 11. It had been recommended to us and we pre-booked well in advance for the Easter holidays. We didn't know what to expect, which I think is for the best. We had a fantastic time and managed to complete the mission as the clock struck 0. Tricky to find though. I would seriously recommend it!

Excellent time, healthy competition and really helpful staff. Spent an excellent hour here today with two teams from work, staff really friendly and helpful, exercise stretching enough to keep it interesting and extra challenge of racing against each other. Real value for money, everyone came out energised and loved it. Definitely recommended !!

Great Family Activity. We took our 14 and 10 year old boys here - and had the most amazing hour. Went by far too quickly - and we were enthralled, amused, baffled and enlightened throughout! Can't wait to try the new room soon.

Unusual, Fantastic experience. The fantastic reviews for ClueQuest are well deserved, what a brillaint way to spend an hour! 6 of us went last week and I can't wait to return to try Operation Black Sheep! Great fun, great value, great staff. I can't recommend this attraction hightly enough!

Wonderful Birthday Treat. 10th Birthday present for my daughter in family of 5. I agree with the guideline that it is suitable for 9 years and older. Came to ClueQuest after an excellent visit to the other similar London attraction - it's nice to see that the 2 venues complement each other, with healthy and respectful competition. If you have enjoyed one, then certainly do the other - both great, but with enough differences. Back to ClueQuest - staff were brilliant. Friendly, funny, informative and happy to spend plenty of time with us before and after the 'hour'. Really made our day - family couldn't stop talking about it afterwards. We will be back soon for Operation BlackSheep!Thank you to ClueQuest for making it a special day - a perfect place for a birthday treat.

Absolutely amazing!. Booked this as an 18th Birthday present for my friend- I saw that the reviews were good and it looked like a laugh- we ended up having the most AMAZING TIME, loads of fun and we couldn't stop talking about our time at cluequest for the rest of the week!!! Definitely 100% recommend it
Great fun!. We did a team building exercise and this was great fun! The clues challenged each of us and we needed to work together to solve the puzzle. Highly recommend it!

Brilliant fun!. Had a brilliant time doing Clue Quest for an afternoon. The team are really friendly and fun, and set the event up really well with a great 'back story'. I didn't really know what to expect before I went, but I was completely absorbed for an hour, it got pretty tense towards the end and the whole team were on a real high when we got out a few moments before the end! Can't really say any more than that without giving it away! We did it with work to build team skills, but would be just as much fun with a group of mates. Can't wait to go back and do another one!

Absolutely fantastic!!. Went here yesterday with 2 friends and tried out the Operation Blacksheep room. We definitely weren't disappointed! They have a great team there and really set the atmosphere, highly recommend this for anybody looking for a great way to spend an hour. Will definitely be back!

Best day out EVER!!. ClueQuest was an absolute blast. We didn't really know what to expect but the team there were very helpful and I had an amazing birthday adventure there. I can't recommend this place highly enough and we're definately going to return to try some of the other missions. A*Thanks ClueQuest and Mr Q!!
Great family fun. A great experience. Sort of like a real life version of the Ipad app "The room". A little hard to find though. The location is in an office building - look for the door buzzer.

Fanatstic!. Read the reviews and booked for 6 of us. It was even more fun than expected. What a brilliant way to spend an hour or so. Cannot wait to return for another challenge. Great staff too! Well done with this wonderful new concept.

Awesome expirience!!!. Playing cluequest was one of the highlights of our london visit. It's fun, smart and challenging. We absolutely loved it and i strongly recommend it to everyone who loves puzzles and riddles.

ClueQuest, London - great fun, definitely worth a visit. I spent a couple of hours at ClueQuest in March 2014 with my team from work and we had a blast. It doesn't look like much from the outside but it was really good fun and definitely worth the money. Looking forward to going back to experience 'black sheep'.

Fun part of a stag do. I booked clueQuest as an early afternoon part of my friend's four-man stag do, and we had a blast. Great puzzles, great fun and really nice people. I think we got out with 3 seconds to spare, then spent the next hour talking about everything that'd happened over a few beers in the pub around the corner. Seriously good fun and highly recommended.

Simply brilliant. Went to Cluequest yesterday for my son's 18th birthday surprise. Originally wanted to go to a comedy club but couldn't because my daughter is only 14. Anyway, this worked out better & we had a great time. We all loved, but my teenagers think it is the best thing ever! We were in room Operation Black Sheep & wouldn't hesitate to book another room in the future. Only down side is you really do need to book well in advance. Well done Cluequest team & thank you for a memorable visit, great for adults & teenagers alike.

Just EPIC !. We booked the PLAN52 room, and never did anything like that before. The ClueQuest team is awesome! really setting the atmosphere and bringing you inside the mentality of the game.We had so much fun and even escaped the room! Thanks for an amazing experience. You really need to book it now or you won't have any room available. DO IT!

Definitely try this out!. I went to clueQuest with 3 friends (we are in university) having no idea of what to expect. And we were not disappointed! It was really fun and everyone had to work together to escape the room in time! The team were really nice and gave us complimentary magnets because we had to change from Operation Blacksheep to Code 37. The only problem I would say is that the one hour flew by so quickly!!! (but it was worth it for sure) Let's just say you will never see locks in the same way again.

Book it now !!!!. We took two families with kids aged 11 to 13 and all of us loved it. We worried it might be too tricky for the boys but its brilliant for all ages as you get little hints on screen if you've hit the wall !! The feeling of cracking clues is just brilliant and all the staff made it so much fun. Kindly offered us water too and allowed us an extra ten minutes when we hadn't cracked it in an hour ( we had three people in each room ) so we got that exhilaration of finding our own way out. My son wants to book the sheep adventure now. Brilliant idea.
Fantastic surprise. So much fun and excitement with friends and family. I did not expect that. Hope it will start up en Denmark!! I will gladly help with that :-)

Absolutely fantastic!!!. Went here for a friend's birthday and it was one of the greatest days out I've ever been on with my friends. An incredible experience!We booked up two rooms between ten of us (myself included), ending up the eventual winners – hurrah!Would definitely do it all again and would recommend.

awesome!. Visited the new room (Operation Blacksheep) after having done the first room a while back and and I enjoyed every second yet again. Very clever and engaging and friendly passionate staff. Great for first timers or those who have done the first room previously.

If you were a fan of the Crystal Maze....... then this is a must. The staff are friendly and helpful, the idea is simple but ingenious and it is simply the best way to spend an hour in London. My kids (now 10 and 13) adored it - everyone can join in (in fact the kids 'see' things differently so are an enormous help) but I would just as happily go with a group of friends or family. The only negative is that once you've done it, you can't do it again and need to wait for a new room to be built and the wait is always too long!! As soon as they open another room, we'll be first in line. GO!!!!

A brilliant fun hour!. We were recommended Cluequest by a friend from Ireland, and although we live in London, had never heard of it. We took our mum for mothers' day and it was absolutely the most brilliantly fun evening!The setting when you walk in isn't what I was expecting, but as soon as you're locked in that room it really does get your brain working and make you work as a team to get out. Hidden talents quickly emerged and most importantly, we had a great laugh.Highly recommended!
FUN!. Great time! Fun for all. This was a challenging experience, we didn't make it out but it was still fun.

Great fun and you get so involved! Highly recommend!. Amazing fun and fast paced activity!Staff were brilliant, really fun and into their roles at the beginning and throughout the game and then friendly at the end when chatting about our experience.Easy to find and great fun for friends or hen/stag do!Bargain price...i look forward to new rooms and locations opening up.Thanks for making me feel really clever and clueless at the same time! :)

Brilliant...absolutely brilliant...nothing else to say.... See Above- no one can be disappointed after a brilliant day out here! Staff friendly and helpful, games well designed, rooms expertly put together. I just wish they had lots more booking slots available!

Fantastic Time. Went here for a friends present, it was absolutely brilliant. The hour went really quickly and we were all trying our best to get out. If you want to team build or build friendships this is the place to go. The staff were really great too.

The ultimate escape game!. I cannot recommend this place enough!It really is the best of fun and the staff are super friendly. You really do get into 'operation mode' and the puzzles are brilliant. It is such a smart concept and most teams do require a little help on the way but, we did get out on time with 47 secs to spare!We are all excited to go back again to try out Operation Black Sheep!Guaranteed excitement!
Operation Black Sheep -Amazing. It was even better than the first one. Interesting puzzles and fun! Definitely recommend as something different to do with friends.

Incredible way to spend an hour! Watch out for traffic wardens!!. 8 of us had a go at the two identical rooms in two teams of 4. Everybody had an amazing time - the balance of difficulty of the clues was perfect - a few hints along the way from the staff kept us on track. Both teams made it out but, importantly, our team won by 30 seconds!! (2 mins 42 to spare) The time flew - it was extremely well put together and rewarding. One note of caution - you cannot park outside (even though they said we could) the parking attendant was about to give me a ticket when someone spotted him. We all definitely recommend this place.

Brilliant fun - book early. clueQuest was a brilliant way to spend an hour in London. A unique experience which I hope to repeat soon. The staff are really friendly and helpful. They will no doubt go from strength to strength so my advice would be to book early to avoid disappointment. You probably need to be booking at least 3 weeks in advance.

Great Fun!. Went this morning with 5 friends to celebrate a birthday and had an amazing time! The game was challenging but achievable - we completed the room with about 2.5 minutes to spare without much help. Can't recommend it enough for groups of friends - just make sure that your friendship can take it as the stress levels can rise a bit ;)

Fantastic Fun. Seen this on trip advisor, had good reviews and we were in London so thought we would try something different. It was fantastic. I was with my two daughter-in-laws and we have never laughed so much. We weren't much good but we loved it. Please visit if you are in London.
Perfect experience. Enjoy an exciting hour with friends! Good organization and good communication. Very helpfull staff. Well located and easy to reach.

Exciting experience. This was a fantastic experience. We booked this activity as part of a Bachelor Party in London. We had such a great time with these mind games. The concept is simple yet magnificent!! A real pearl of entertainement. Recommended!!!

Awesome!. Just do this and you won't regret. A lot of fun and just the right amount of challenge. Solve clues and make your way out of the room. And there's even a nice story to it, but I can't say any more, or I will get in troubles with the Mr. Q ;)

Exciting! THRILLING! 60 mins of being a secret agent!. I had such an amazing time here with my friends! The staff were so friendly and passionate, and the puzzles were challenging and got bigger and better as we progressed. I really felt like I was either an 80s James Bond or Austin Powers. It's such a fun activity to do with friends! I do do do recommend that you go here when in London and to be prepared to think outside the box! Thank you!

A really unique,fun experience. I spent three days in London with my son and daughter celebrating my 60th birthday.I stumbled upon this activity and thought that it would be perfect for the three if us to do as it's different,fun,challenging and something we could all enjoy,my son is 22 and my daughter 28.It was absolutely brilliant and far more difficult than we had anticipated.We also did some of the more usual things here in London,going to a musical,eating in some fabulous restaurants etc. but this was defiantly a highlight for me and I have recommended Cluequest to my friends.
Brilliant!. I haven't done an experience like this before but it really was excellent from start to finish. Would highly recommend it!

Fast paced family fun. Went as a family of six, with children of 9, 14,15 and 17. The whole experience was great, with the team providing just enough help and tips to keep the momentum going, without us getting too frazzled. A great sense of achievement at the end. Would definitely recommend.

Amazing puzzle solving experience hidden away in London.... What a fantastic idea - a live action version of The Room (ie an "escape the room" game). In essence it's so simple - your team is stuck in a room and has to escape by following clues, mostly to open locks of some description. I won't detail the game itself any more than that (don't want to spoil anything!) but it's a fantastic combination of puzzle solving and teamwork (a la Crystal Maze).The whole set-up impressed as well. Our guides beforehand were great, setting up the premise behind going into the room but not revealing too much about what we would encounter when inside. Then after you get your picture taken and can comment in the guest book, as well as getting a memento to take away. Slickly run from start to finish and in my opinion excellent value.I honestly can't remember an hour passing so quickly and with such fun (and concentration!). That countdown timer quickly gets to zero (we sadly went over the hour to escape!) and it's amazing how you start to panic near the end!Simply cannot recommend highly enough. We did the new room, Operation Blacksheep, and we'll definitely be returning to give the other rooms a try in future trips to London.

Excellent experience! Best activity I've done in a long, long time!. Big thank you to the ClueQuest team for helping me to organise this experience for my boyfriend's birthday! He absolutely loved it, and I couldn't have asked for a more wonderful day!! The four of us who took part can't wait to do another room as we had such a great time!! We only just managed to escape in time and everything is really well thought out! If you are looking for something to do in London then this should definitely be it!

Something a little different. We held our 10 year old daughters party at ClueQuest, we had 2 rooms and went head to head to complete our mission. Both adults and children had a great time, everybody came out smiling and energised and couldn't wait to fill in the visitors book! The Team at ClueQuest were brilliant, nothing was too much trouble. We will definitely be going back for Operation Blacksheep!

1 minute 35 with 2/3 clues ;). Obviously most people probably visit this attraction due to the great Trip Advisor score.Everything about the 'experience' is really well thought out and delivered fantastically. The game is brilliant, but so is the experience before and after the game. We'd done 1 room before and we think this helped our time/clue tally. It'd be easy to see how you'd be locked in. We did the Plan 52 room.Great location, which you'll have to work a bit to find - but surely that's the whole point?Game wise, we won't say anything to spoil the fun - but the progression through the game is good and some of the surprises are on a 'big' scale which is refreshing. Next time I'm in London I'll return to the Operation Blacksheep room.It one of the few attractions in London where you won't feel like just 1 of thousands - and that's what makes it special!Bravo, Bravo!

Awesome as ever!!. Returned to the new Shoreditch location to do the brand new room - Operation Blacksheep. Had a great time!! Both rooms were absolutely awesome... The most awful thing about it, is that I have done it now and it's over!! :( Here's to many more rooms to come!!! Thank you ClueQuest for an hour of extreme entertainment!!!I love it!

James Bond meets Sherlock Holmes. Best hour in London I've spent in over a year!Special mention to Juliet who was out wonderful, friendly, enthusiastic guide!Definitely do this!!Ps- we made it out with time to spare!

Great fun!. Such a clever way to have fun with friends and spend an hour. You will continue to think about this game after it's over. Would highly recommend this to anyone. Location a bit difficult to find so map it out ahead of time. Not one regret...super fun.

EXCELLENT. Its the fastest hour that passed in my life! The experience was fantastic and challenging at the same time! Lots of laugh and teamwork involved! Am excited about the next game they are creating! CANT WAIT!!

The best adventure experience in London!. I went to Clue Quest with a group of friends and we were split into 2 groups, tackling one room each. We had an amazing time, and I can't explain how great an experience it was. This has to be the most fun I've had in 60mins in a long time! I would definitely come back, and bring my friends and family with me.

LOVED IT!. I had an absolute blast at clueQuest! I can't recommend it enough. Without giving away any details, you have 1 hour to solve your way out of a room (or rooms...). I was there with a large group- we were split into two teams, which gave an nice extra competitive edge. It was such a fantastic experience, I want to return and have a go in another room! Would be great for birthdays and team building- two thumbs up!

Clue Quest was highlight of trip for our children. We are family of four. Kids ages 11 and 12. We all absolutely loved it. We had no idea what to expect and found the game to be challenging and very, very fun. It taught us about teamwork and communication. The brothers who run Clue Quest should be very proud of what they have put together. We are now waiting for them to open an operation in the States.

Must do in any city!. Even if you have to come to London just to play this game, you must. It is beyond fantastic. We had hired a three rooms in total for 15 people and I can happily concur that it was the best fun we ever had. The games were so well thought out that while playing I could not but help be amazed at the level of detail and planning that went into it. The ClueQuest team are extremely hospitable, friendly, and, in keeping with the spirit of the game, extremely inscrutable when it comes to looking for clues :-)Will definitely visit again.

SUCH a blast!. I can't say too much because I don't want to spoil it for future "agents"... but, this is probably one of the funnest things I have ever done anywhere! No specialized knowledge is required - it is purely based on logic and sense - and we had a fantastic time (3 men and 3 women, so we did men versus women :P). HIGHLY recommended if you're looking for a unique experience and a good laugh! I would seize the opportunity to do it again.
Highly recommended!!. Went in not expecting too much but my gosh was this a fantastic experience. Really recommend it to fun loving individuals looking for some challenging fun!

Something everyone should do once in their life!. This place was crazy amazing fun! It keeps you in suspense. And is sooo entertaining. If I could do this again I would do it in a heartbeat. And the most greatest time to do this is of course with your family.
Great fun and a real challenge. This is a really interesting way to spend an hour or so. Staff were very welcoming and we had great fun.

Fastest hour ever spent :-). I am so happy we chose to try clueQuest! It's fun, challenging and a great team-building experience. If you like puzzle games, this is a must-do. A special thanks to friendly staff :)

Fab-u-lous: Exercise those little grey cells. An utterly brilliant way to celebrate my half century! In a team that included a Chess Grand Master & a Grand Mother, we were intrigued and beguiled by the fiendishly clever puzzles and distracted by a couple of red herrings. Some so simple, others requiring contemplation,calm and co-operation and others nimble fingers. As the minutes flew past we wondered if we would ever manage to get out. But everyone played their part and we got out with just 5 seconds left thanks to the texting speedy thumbs of our teenage team member.Zoli made sure there was plenty of room our wheel chair team member, who was able to be fully involved and crucially solve a number of the puzzles. From Granny to grandson, all were vital and everyone contributed. The shared feel good factor and high on succeeding together was PERFECT. Zoli was fantastic & as others have mentioned the customer service is 2nd to none. A polished and professional set up.Do not hesitate, you will never spend a better team building hour.We'll be back for Operation BlackSheep. Thank you for a lovely time.
Brilliant!. What an absolutely excellent experiece. Will defintaely be going back to try the other puzzle room. Highly recommend.
A great family event. Thank you for providing a really entertaining event for our family team. Expertly facilitated to keep the pressure on. We finally escaped with only 7 seconds to spare

Incredible fun. We are from out of town and were looking for something to do one afternoon and happened to see this on trip advisor. It was literally the most fun we have had in a long time and it made me wish we had something like this in Atlanta. You may have to book pretty far in advance, but we ended up getting lucky and having the one time they had open line up with our schedule. This is really and engrossing experience and is truly something that everyone from about 10 years old and up can really enjoy and get involved in.

Excellent, great fun in London. We visited clue quest last Friday (7th March) whilst on a weekend break in London. There were 5 of us and can honestly say it was a great way to spend an hour. From start to finish it was great, we found it very entertaining and needed to work as a team. Although some members were almost giving up with very little time remaining. But we got there in the end.We will definitley be back again and will recommend it to others.

Engrossing!!!. Weeks later my friends and I are still raving and chatting about our experience! We can't wait to do Operation Blacksheep in the summer!!! Definitely worth the pounds! The workers were very relaxed about our tardiness and really forgiving. Although, I wouldn't suggest being late, certainly look up very well your specific directions to the ClueQuest space. It's in an exciting area of Shoreditch, and this experience will be one of the most memorable activities you ever do!!! Don't hesitat, book your room, and Have Fun!

Amazing family cooperation. Take three often quarrelsome adolescents of divergent opinions and interests, add an older relative to arbitrate if necessary and a hardly known teen to encourage politeness. Amazingly an hour flew by cooperatively and revealed hidden talents leading to mutual respect. Everyone agreed it was great fun, even if sometimes some of us didn't really have a clue as to others logic. We got there in the end though so Operation Black Sheep was definitely a success. To be repeated.
Crystal maze type fun. Love Cluequest - so much fun! Please build another room and adventure so we can come back! Thanks! Highly recommend.

Brilliant way to spend 1 hour. Brilliant to spend an hour. Time just flies by when your trying to solve the puzzles and find the clues . Would thoroughly recommend this to anyone. I went with my hubby and son it was great to work as a team . Reminded us all of the Crystal Maze!

Best fun in ages. Went with two friends for the black sheep operation on monday afternoon. We didn't end the mission in time, but we had great fun. The game was brilliant, and the 60 minutes went so quickly. Can wait to go back and try the other room. A very well done to the clue quest team for putting together this amazing game and thanks for gave us a brilliant afternoon. Recommend this attraction to everyone.

Awesome birthday for my brother.. I booked both unit 51 rooms for a group of 10 people. The guys and girl were great fun. Very helpful also. The challenge was amazing and we all had great fun. Will definitely be back to try operation black sheep.

Incredible. I do not review things often but... this is a must. Great fun, fantastic value for money. I would recommend this to anyone. Would be fantastic for friends, family or work colleagues. Book it now, you will not regret it.
Operation Black Sheep. Great fun! 60 minutes flies by! Be prepared to put your thinking caps on! Highly recommend it...would like to go back at some point.

such a unique awesome experience. a MUST do!. This quest will leave you all adrenaline pumped and talking about what actually happened in the 60minutes of mind blowing puzzles, riddles, code cracking and out-the-box thinking that is required to escape the room and save the world! Loads of fun and a definite MUST do!!!!

Unique Experience, we want to go again!. Four of us took on the ClueQuest challenge, without knowing what to expect. As soon as it was over we wanted more and will definitely be going back, and recommending it to everyone. Completely different to anything we've done before and so much fun. Highly recommended as a great fun, exciting, and unique thing to do in London.
A great, fun team building activity. a new and unique experience - great fun to do with friends or colleagues - really different. Would strongly recommend.

A great way to spend an hour. A team of 5 of us spent an hour battling our way out of a room - it was a great activity, completely different to anything else you can do in London. Really enjoyable and we made it out with a couple of minutes to spare!

unforgetable experience!!!. i totally love this place.Everything was perfect.The decoration of the room,the mystery that followed after each and every new clue that revealed in front of us..I wanted more and more...A unique destination for everyone...

Brilliant way to kill an odd hour in London. I got bought a trip to clueQuest for my 21st birthday present. The whole arrangement was a total surprise, so I turned up not having a clue what I would be doing. The venue is down a back alley, and not recognisable from outside. But after starting the quest, it was excellent. You have an hour to solve clues and codes to save the universe. I found we were talking about the event for weeks after, and certainly recommended it to all our friends! The staff were excellent, and the whole thing is so clever and well thought out! We can't wait for the next room to open so we can go back!
Unique. Boys vs Girls..(age range 18-late 30) We all loved it. Definitely coming back to try the other room. Julie and Marcel are so friendly and welcoming. A unique experience. Highly recommended.

great way to spend a rainy sunday afternoon. visited clue quest this afternoon with my husband and our two children aged 12 & 14. Great way to spend an hour in London on a damp, murky sunday afternoon. Got our brains whirring and working and was a brilliant team activity that we all had to work together on. The hour just whizzed by. We did Plan 52 but will definitely be returning to try out operation blacksheep!Amazing concept, super staff, good location and something completely different

DEAD GOOD. AN EXCELLENT EVENING!!. Visited here on Friday 28th Feb as a group of 4 (2 girls and 2 boys). Had a great time and were very impressed with the organisation and with our friendly and enthusiastic host Marcel. Would highly recommend this to anyone and will be telling all our friends about it!

clueQuest - Brilliant!!!. Amazing, Amazing, Amazing!!! Spent an hour yesterday with a few work colleagues taking part in the most novel and clever activity I have seen for a long time. The whole experience was a joy from start to finish made extra special by Julia and Marcel's (clueQuest team) superb direction and support of our attempts to solve our way through our task. We had two teams girls v boys embarking on the same game in different rooms. The girls, of course, solved their way out quicker than us boys...but what fabulous fun. I cannot recommend clueQuest too highly. It is simply a wonderful experience that will have you smiling and talking about and certainly wanting another go soon!!!M I

One hour of fun and mind exercise. If you want to have one hour of fun along with two of your friends (I would say that the optimal number of players in a team is 3), then ClueQuest might be a good option for you. At least, it worth a try to change a different kind of fun :).You're suppose to escape in less than an hour from a room, solving puzzles and riddles.

Amazing!!. I booked this as a team building exercise for myself and four colleagues....We had such a good time! The less you know about the experience the better, but its certainly challenging and essential to work together. Such a clever and well thought out game... will definitely be returning for operation Blacksheep in March.

Operation BlackSheep rocks!. This was our second trip to clueQuest and it was even more fun than the first!We took on Operation BlackSheep and I won't spoil it by revealing just what happens once you go through the door, I can guarantee you'll have an awful lot of fun. Gabe, Zoli and the team have tremendously devious minds and set amazing puzzles that'll keep you guessing right to the end. They're also some of the nicest people you could hope to meet.If you are wondering why they're the top of TripAdvisor and think they can't possibly be that good, I promise you they deserve it. Give it a go and good luck, agent.

Team Building Success. Three teams of us went on three consecutive days and all of us really enjoyed the experience. It was a fantastic idea and we all shared our experiences afterwards. Some of the stories will go down as legend. Can't say too much as I don't want to give any secrets away but I would highly recommend this to anyone else and we will be coming back to have a crack at Operation Blacksheep. Thanks to the clueQuest team and the Mr Q in particular!!!

AWESOME!!!!. Couldn't stop going on about this to everyone after we "escaped"! Cannot think of any negatives or anyone who wouldn't enjoy it - well maybe those who didn't manage to succeed! ;) We will all definitely be back for Operation BlackSheep!

One of the best things I've EVER done.5£. This was my idea of heaven for a hen party. An activity. An odd one. Competitive. And it was just so much fun. We all absolutely loved it. I will definitely be recommending it everywhere I possibly can. It was absolutely amazing and the guys that ran it were ace.

FANTASTIC!. I would highly recommend clueQuest, the guys that organise it are great and made us feel very welcome. The puzzle rooms are fantastic and really get you thinking, the hour seems to tick down very fast! We decided to do 3 Wives verses our 3 Husbands! We were put into identical rooms and it was a race to save the Universe! Unfortunately the boys won by 5 mins (Grrrrrrrrrr!!!) But is was a great experience and we will definitely be back when they change the puzzles around for a rematch! (I put it down to all the computer games the guys play!!!)Great Experience, excellent value for money, 10/10 and 5 stars!!! :-)Claire and Lee(We are all aged between 30-37)

really special and great fun. highly recommended to anyone that is looking for something special to do on a weekday evening or weekend before brunch activities. We were two teams of four - all been living in london for a few years - but were amazed to discover this. Will definitely be coming back for Operation BlackSheep!
So. Much. Fun. . A group of 3 of us visited today and I could not recommend this highly enough! Completely different to most attractions and I couldn't stop smiling after getting out!

Such GREAT fun!!!. We had a fantastic time trying to solve the puzzles. Lots of giggles and 'tense' moments lol. If you do only 1 memorable thing in London make it Clue Quest. We came as part of my hen do weekend and the experience is something I will remember forever! Can't wait to return and try the new challenge.
GREAT GREAT EXPERIENCE. One of the BEST to-do things in London. Looking forward for the Operation Black Sheep! Keep it up guys!!

Something really different for a bunch of boys. Wasn't sure what to expect but this was a really enjoyable hour spent solving clues and undoing padlocks. Went with a group of 12 yr old boys and they really got into the whole problem solving against the clock. Definitely recommended and look forward to returning to try to new room. Try it! !

Such a fun night!. Four of us went after hearing good things from friends. It was SUCH a great laugh. The pre-briefing is a bit cheesy and hard not to mock, but once we got in, we had an ace time. As that clock ticks down into the red, you start to seriously feel the pressure. Cannot recommend it enough, especially for puzzle fiends and geeks.

We all loved it. We are a family of four ranging in age from 12 to 51, and this game was perfect for us! We all contributed equally to our 'success' of breaking out with only one minute of extra time needed!!! The 'room' was very cleverly set up with lots of different clues to solve. Filled the hour just right. Very friendly and helpful staff. You need the map to find the place! Would consider the new room if we are in London again...

Excellent Family Fun. I booked this from the tripadvisor reviews as I wanted something for the family to do whilst we were visiting London and have done most of the "sights" that the teenagers (18 & 15) want to do. It was the best bit of the trip! We had a great time working together as a team - competitive natures kicked in to make sure we saved the world (with 1 minute to spare) and we talked about it for hours afterwards. Dont be fooled by the unassuming start...brilliant way to spend a cold grey afternoon.

Brilliant!. We visited ClueQuest as a family after hearing about it through Trip Advisor. It was fantastic! Myself, my husband and our 17 yr old and 14 yr old all thoroughly enjoyed it, the 60 mins in the room flew by, feeling more like 15 minutes! We escaped with 3 minutes to spare, then spent the rest of the day discussing the clues and the clever design of the room. I obviously can't say too much, as I wouldn't want to spoil the experience for anyone else, but if you are looking for an unusual way to spend 90 mins in London then give this a go! The building was a little difficult to locate due to roadworks and a diversion, and a large lorry was right outside, obscuring the entrance - I realise that ClueQuest have only recently relocated to these premesises but I think the signage could be improved to aid people unfamiliar with the area - the only sign we saw was the tiny one on the buzzer to request entrance. (perhaps this is the first puzzle to solve - if you can't locate the building, then you are not fit to become one of Q's secret agents!!)

There is a reason this is #1!. My family and I booked this after seeing that it was number #2 on Tripadvisor (it is now #1!) and we are so happy that we did! It was just simply, wonderfully fun. It requires teamwork, cooperation and smarts. I don't think I have ever been so happy to get a door open in my entire life! Great fun was had by all, I ABSOLUTELY recommend this to everyone! We may have to take another trip to try their new operation when it opens!

Great experience. Great experience. Truly must to go place. Unfortunately our family team (me, my wife and our sons 10 and 8 years old) have not won but we were very close to win. It was very funny and challenging. We exactly will try to crack Operation Black Sheep which will be launched in March.

Absolutely Brilliant Mind Stretching Fun!!. I had the best time after initially wondering what on earth I was getting into - thought the kids and better half had set me up for a secret company evaluation session! The four of us got stuck in and did not want it to stop - it was just the most involving, intriguing, funny, engaging and stimulating activity I've had the pleasure of being part of for many years. Jake looked after us really well and most importantly, his enthusiasm rubbed off on us. The organisation was great and the attention to detail and after care have been excellent. Also, in a City where everything costs the earth, this didn't - it is the best value in London. We cannot wait for Operation Black sheep even though Team Easto are clearly the worst spies ever!! Thank you to everyone at clueQuest for making my birthday really special.

By far the best experience activity i have ever seen.. It is fun throughout the whole game. We booked it for my brother's birthday and it was an unforgettable gift for him but also for the rest of us. Everyone should try it!!!

Engaging and challenging fun. A great activity for teenagers and grandparents requiring considerable cooperative skills. The experience is very well managed from start to finish - and great fun. Refreshments, photo souvenirs and additional family games are all provided.

Loved it!. Went to cluequest with family aged 30-70 years, and we all had a brilliant time. It's so clever and well thought out, completely different to anything we'd done before, and the cluequest team were fantastic. We laughed loads. I can't imagine anyone not enjoying it!

10yr olds best activity in London. Went with 4 adults and my daughter, all loved it although frustrated us all as failed to finish. Simple concept, great host who made us feel like we were good even though we weren't! Great value for money

Great fun. Booked this to break up a days sightseeing around London,as it turned out this was the highlight of the weekend! There were five of us in our group, a 10 year old, 12 year old, 21 year old and 2 nearly forties! All of us had as much input as the other and there are so many puzzles and clues to work out you will have to work as a team. London has some of ,if not the best sightseeing in the world but if your looking for something a little different and great fun try this,highly recommended.

Amazing. We had such a fantastic time at Clue Quest and I would definitely do it! We had 6 people in our room and it would great fun...I wouldn't have anymore than 6 though. Our slot was at 10pm on a Saturday evening - it wasn't too late for us as we enjoyed a cocktail before heading there. If you are thinking of going then stop thinking and just book it! It's so clever how they have come up with the game! Well worth the money and the people who work there are SUPER nice and make you feel really welcome (which is really nice as we are paying customers after all). We can't wait to book up for the new rooms which they are designing at the moment.

Very good fun . Visited in a group of 5 and did mr q's apartment. We were very pleased to get out in a good time, there were a few especially challenging puzzles and the host was great (before and after care with the 'theme' carried through properly was great). Only not giving it 5 as could be more done to differentiate with room 1 at hint hunt (we happened to do that one first but I'm not sure which came before). Really good fun good value and definitely recommend. Tip: shoreditch high st station much closer than Liverpool street. Thanks

Great fun had by all!. Booked this for my 2 sons birthdays (early twenties) as an activity we could do as a family. My daughter was apprehensive as we did not know what to expect and she doesn't like small spaces or things that jump out at you. We had a fabulous time, working together to try to solve the clues, starting off all calm but then the adrenalin kicking in as the clock is ticking! We escaped with 3 minutes and 40 seconds to spare! All 5 of us absolutely thoroughly enjoyed ourselves (including my daughter!) and we will definitely be back for Operation Blacksheep! Fantastic - definitely recommend.

AMAZING EXPERIENCE. I booked this activity as part of my friend's stag do that me and a friend organised. He absolutely loved it, and turned out to be his favourite thing from the whole weekend. We did hinthunt earlier on in the day and everyone agreed that this was better. Each puzzle just flowed so well into the others and we loved the way that everything linked together. We ended up escaping with 6 minutes to spare, but it could have so easily gone wrong for us if we'd wasted too much time! The guys were so friendly, laid-back, helpful and even hid presents that we'd got the stag in the room for him to open and discover on his own. We could not ask for anything more, they had a great sense of humour too and made us feel so welcome. We are already trying to sort out a date so we can come back and try the new room when it opens!Just book it, you will not be disappointed, this is probably the best value I've ever had for doing something fun and exciting in London. One thing we were worried about was it going too quickly but it's so well structured and planned that we were always kept so busy and with one eye on the clock. Think they do gift vouchers too so would make a great unique birthday present or gift for someone as there's not much else around like this!

Great fun, can't believe how much we enjoyed it. Went with office group of 10 split into two teams of 5. OK I admit we are a bunch of geeks and computer nerds, but I never expected anything as well planned and well organised as this. Best evenings entertainment and fun - cannot recommend highly enough
Just in the nick of time!. We had such a great time. Made it out with 2 minutes 16 seconds to go we were all so excited and the adrenaline was rushing. Great experience!! I definitely recommend it!!
Amazing. If you are in London you must visit clue quest it's quite interesting and I had a great day ....it was good.. !!!
Absolutely incredible!. Literally the best fun I've had in ages! Feelings of nervousness and excitement combined! Such an adrenaline rush. Cannot wait to go back again!!!

Best thing I've done in ages!. Being quite into point 'n' click games, I was worried before I went that they might make the task too easy, or alternatively completely impossible - relying on your in-depth knowledge of greek mythology, for example - but I needn't have worried - the tasks are definitely challenging enough, and it was the most fun I've had in ages - I can't recommend it highly enough and I will be back for the next challenge! Next time I might try to book two rooms though, so we can play in teams against one another - Bring on Black Sheep!

Amazing!. I actually booked this for a work do - didn't really know what to expect beforehand and now I've had the experience, I'm recommending it to all my friends!Plus, Gabor and Julie (our gamesmaker) were wonderful hosts and couldn't do enough to help me organise things so everything goes smoothly. The only not so good thing is that now I've tried the game, I can't really play the same game again as I know all the secrets, but waiting for the new game (Operation Blacksheep) to open in March.
Amazing . Just got out!!!! Absolutely amazing. Well done guys. Fab idea. Two young people in their twenties and two patents but we all had a great time

Amazing Experience. A great trip all around! although I was a little skeptical initially this is an experience unlike any other that I have tried which proved to be brilliant.Trashing a room to search for clues is genius. I can't wait for the new room have been recommending to anyone and everyone.

The best time!. We booked ClueQuest for our team away day. It was brilliant and exceeded all expectations. We are already planning our next away day in March when the new room is open! Would highly recommend to anyone wanting a fun and unique hour of fun!

Interactive Fun Times. A great experience and fab way to get to know people better if your team is comprised of new friends, or having lot's of fun with good friends. Also a fantastic idea for office team building and parties. Look forward to seeing it grow. Recommend reading PopCo...

Not scary - great fun!. I'll admit I was a bit nervous about the whole 'locking you in a room' factor but clueQuest is great fun! I tried it with a team of 4 friends for my birthday and we enjoyed it without yelling at each other. Teamwork becomes crucial or you can't complete some of the tasks but the helpful staff are always monitoring and will send tips if you look like you're really stuck. I'd definitely go back so am looking forward to the Operation Black Sheep room opening in March 2014.

A real mind boggle. An excellent way to spend an hour or so in the Capital City. This was booked for my 50th Birthday as a like a challenge and love puzzles. This was right up my alley! Brilliant from start to finish. Will be going back once next room is ready.

Great Fun!. Myself and four friends went at the weekend and had a great time. Really good fun and a great idea for those looking to do something original and different in London ( also a bonus that its not weather dependant!)Julia who was our mentor was lovely and really helpfulWe will def be back to try the new room after March!

Duh Bomb!. Absolutely amazing time! Great way to get some intellectual team bonding in. The hour flies by and feels great value for money given the thought that's gone into the activity.Really looking forward to coming back when the new room opens.

Great fun!. I did this as part of a group of three. It was great hours fun and quite challenging. There was a good variety of different tasks and it felt like you were in the middle of a mash-up episode of the Crystal Maze and The Adventure Game (see YouTube if <35yrs old). I would recommend this but avoid the two beers we had beforehand as it helps to be as mentally sharp as possible!
Amazing. Had a great time. The task requires a combination of perseverance and logic. Great staff. Can't wait for the new room to open to go again.

Mr. 5 friends went in together - the puzzles, excitement, searching and deciphering didn't stop until we escaped just before time ran out! Really fun, nice variety of challenges to solve and clever surprises. Recommended!

We had a blast!. This is so much fun, we had a team of 3 girls and did it for something different for one of our birthdays. Would definitely recommend for something fun to do as a group. Won't write anything about it as to know anything would spoil the brilliant surprise!

A Must Do - One of the Best Things Ever. Plan your weekend around this which will be the highlight of your visit to London.
To say more would spoil the experience. JUST GO. You'll be sad when it's over.
Thanks to the guys. Looking forward to the new addition. We will be back.

Brilliant!. Only two of us in our room as our third pulled out last minute and although we didnt escape, im sacking my useless team member (!) and I'll be back. We both loved it and highly recommend this to any age and any ability. No former knowledge needed, just the ability to hunt hard and piece together the clues. A fantastic experience.

Never had so much fun. After experiencing Secret Cinema, I thought it would be hard to top that attraction. This one proved me wrong. It was a birthday activity I organized for my boyfriend and 2 of our other friends. We managed to unlock all the doors and come out in 56 minutes and enjoyed every minute of it. It's fun, you use your logic and see how you can work as a team. It's definitely a good team building activity. The creators are also really nice people. Definitely recommend it!

Have not had as much fun in ages!. When you bein, you have the feeling that this is easy....but as you go along and discover new challenges, you soon begin to feel like an agent that needs to resolve a situation and your life depends on it :) Best team event ever.

Excellent for teambuilding. We booked two rooms at the same time for our group of 7 and decided to see who would escape first. We thought we'd have no problems, we're all information security guys who look for unexpected things all the time. One team (not mine) escaped with a few minutes to spare, we managed to escape with 0:01 on the clock. one second. That was close. It was the perfect event for teambuilding as you have to work both individually and cooperatively on the puzzles. The guys running it are awesome, it was super fun, and I'd recommend it without hesitation to anyone. In fact we can't wait to go back in the summer with their new room.
Clue quest. Excellent. Great fun, great people.. Made us feel welcome and very pleasant the challenge was interesting, but the guy running it really made it funThank youHighly recommended

megawickedawesome!. My cohort included six colleagues from work. We each like solving problems and puzzles and randomly organized ourselves into two teams. clueQuest presented us with a perfect blend of challenges that allowed us to work individually on some parts (to conserve time) and as a team to meet the mission objectives. I'm confident we'll be talking about our challenging, fun, shared experience together again and again.

Birthday Treat. We went there for my dad's birthday and had a really good time. The hour goes by so quick and there always seems to be something else to do in the challenge!We made it out with 50 seconds to spare - there was a good balance of letting us work things out and providing us with some simple hints to move us along.There were a couple of pictures that were a bit faded that made it difficult to work out what they were but we got there in the end and would definitely recommend as something different to try out.

Excellent fun. I booked this for my boyfriend's 28th birthday and took on the challenge with 4 of his friends. We had a great time and it exceeded our already excited expectations! I was a bit worried that it may of been too easy for us grown ups, however, it was still challenging and enjoyable! The staff are very friendly too! Thank you clueQuest! We'll be back soon :)

Best hour spent. It was so fun, wished they have one nearer to home! There were 8 of us so we booked 2 rooms (4people in each), started at the same time and raced to get out. All the clues were very well designed and when we were stuck, they sent us clues to help. Everybody should just try this at least once. So worth the money!
Birthday Treat. Had no idea what we had signed up for , but it was fantastic . We all had great fun and can't wait for the new room .

Such a great experience, can't wait for the new room. Came across Cluequest and so glad I booked it, was such great fun. Went with a group of 5 and everyone is raving about it. Can't wait for the new room in March!

Had no idea what to expect...left desperately wanting to go back.... When I spotted ClueQuest, and indeed rival Hinthunt so high on Tripadvisor, my initial response was 'they must get all their mates to write reviews as part of a marketing ploy'. Call me cynical if you must.However...in pursuit of something different to do to celebrate our son's 21st birthday, we took a gamble and paid £80 for the bizarre prospect of being locked in a room for an hour.An hour and a bit later and my cynicism was gone - truly, it was fantastic fun...the time disappeared so fast, and the minute we got home I wanted to go again.Clearly, much of what goes on behind closed doors must remain a secret or it would spoil the magic (and really it would, so I wont), but suffice to say it's really well done and clearly there has been real investment in making it a good experience.If you like puzzles and always fancied being on a Crystal Maze style quiz...well this will be for you.Which only leave me to really be open about the situation around it.The building itself is tucked away off the main street which Liverpool St Station is on and is simple to find...although you do feel you've strolled into some rather dodgy area as you enter the yard it's on.Still, the welcome was warm and you really felt you were getting special treatment. In fact, the staff were excellent.I had no idea what to expect when we did get inside, but despite not being the brightest of buttons, the puzzles were really well balanced and we all had a great time.We're going back as soon as we can - apparently a new room opens in March 2014, so that will be one we'll make an effort to visit.If in doubt, go for it...honestly, you won't regret it.

The most fun I have had in ages...... We stumbled across ClueQuest whilst trying to book Hinthunt (which was fully booked) and we are so glad we did! The whole experience was excellent from booking onwards. We entered as a team of three, determined to escape within the hour. We didn't know what to expect but had been practicing room escapes online before going.Gabor was our guide for the day and we found him to be one of the nicest guys you will meet. He was truly there to ensure we had a great experience which we did. After all the pressure we put on ourselves, we were still in the room as the clock turned 60 mins!!. Gabor gave us a further 5 mins of which we only needed two of them to escape. I guess it is all about the personal achievement and although this may not work for the business, it would be nice to give teams of 3 a little longer than teams of 4 of 5 to escape. We convinced ourselves that with only 3 people, we did well to get out in only 62 mins. It was a fantastic experience and one I would recommend to anyone. You don't need any special skills or knowledge to participate in this, just have fun. I have a 9 year old and a 13 year old that I intend to bring along when the new room is open in March. Well done Gabor and the team, we will definitely be back soon.......

Just do it!. Such a fun way to spend an hour. Can't give too much away, but the designers must be so creative and imaginative to come up with all of the puzzles! 100% recommend and will be going back once the new room opens!
Great fun. ingenious - was bought this as a gift and wasn't so sure but actually doing it was brilliant - can't recommend this enough and will be going again when the new room is set up in march.

Best Experience EVER. This has been one of the most memorable experience of my life!Due to popular demand the waiting time on Saturdays are long, but the level of customer service provided by the team-family behind ClueQuest are exceptional. They allowed us to be the first ever late night crew to challenge Mr Q. We had a blast and would recommend this experience to anyone. Cannot wait for these guys to open up new rooms!

Can't wait for them to build more rooms!. Cluequest is a spectacular concoction of puzzles, tension, wit and fun. The challenge was expertly pitched: sufficiently manageable that we were able to make progress, sufficiently difficult that it gave us a buzz every time we discovered a clue or solved a puzzle. The eery music throughout added to the thrill and the Cluequest staff were friendly and entertaining. We managed to escape with 30 seconds remaining, giving us one hell of an adrenaline rush.

Brilliant . I went their today in a group of four and its was brilliant. Member of staff were great and put your mind in the right form for this quest. It was very different and great am looking forward to returning in the future !!!

Cluequest- great fun!!! . Decided to visit here after seeing reviews on trip advisor and it did not disappoint! Visited with 3 friends and had such a good laugh!The clues were great fun to find and was well thought out and very clever! Honestly had such a great time! Real experience!!The staff were also very friendly and played the part well! Highly recommend!

Had a great time!!. 4 of us went late last night and had a great time. Though I am afraid that if I tell you anymore about the experience, I may be eliminated ;)Look forward to seeing these guys expand

I think I would still be locked in!. Went following the reviews and thought it was a brilliant experience. Very well thought out and planned. Staff great and friendly, puzzle was amazing and still has us all talking about it now. Even Ok to take baby into room whilst taking part. I wish the venture every success and hope to visit again, once my brain stops hurting. Hope you have more success in escaping than we did.

Brilliant. Five of us wen't on the Cluequest adventure. Absolutely Brilliant.The guy who met ut at reception was excellent.I can't say to much as it would spoil your experience. A brilliant gift for BirthdaysYou can visit their website just google CluequestYou won't be dissapointed

Incredibly entertaining. ClueQuest is so much fun. It will challenge seasoned puzzlers, yet is also accessible to everyone. You are given an hour to escape a room filled with locks, codes, puzzles and hidden clues. I would highly recommend this to anyone who visits London. Way more interesting than staring at Buckingham Palace or Big Ben.You only have an hour to get out so if the game managers notice you're falling behind, they'll give you a few extra clues to help you out. My only complaint would be that if we were given more time, we wouldn't have needed clues from the game manager to finish in time. But that's an extremely minor complaint given how much fun we had.

Cluequest........fantastic. My wife, myself and our 2 adult daughters went to Cluequest at the weekend and have to say it was great. Really entertaining, a lot of thinking and the fact that it against the clock adds to the tension. Great idea delivered in an interesting way. Quality session

Exciting & challenging for the whole family. Went this weekend with my husband and 2 children aged 11 and 12 years. In my opinion this age upwards is great whilst younger children will definitely still enjoy it but will need helping along by an adult. An amazing way to spend time as a whole family and well worth the money. Children and adults find it challenging alike since it is puzzle solving rather than knowledge based or physically challenging. The time whizzes by as you are fully occupied. Lovely staff. Can't recommend it enough. We will definitely be back for the new Quest in March.

Intelligent, imaginative and great fun. This attraction really lived up to its billing. Inspired by the growing "Escape the room" craze, the clueQuest team have put together a set of clever and inventive challenges that will truly test the grey cells and leave you thinking about the puzzles for some time afterwards. Works brilliantly as either a team building or family fun event.

Great fun and challenging activity. A fantastic way to spend time with family or friends. We booked based on a recommendation as we were looking for something fun but different do in London before heading to dinner to celebrate our daughter's 25th birthday. The 4 of us had a great time working through the clues. We didn't make it out in time but still had lots of laughs and really enjoyed the challenge as well as the fun discussion over dinner afterwards. It was well organised and well run. I would definitely recommend it. I would however suggest that offering a refreshment might be a nice touch - there was nowhere to even purchase a drink and it was quite warm inside.

Really, really good!!. This is brilliant! My husband, (student) daughter and I went for his birthday, expecting it to be rather geared towards 12 year old boys. How wrong we were! We do enjoy mental challenges (fans of Crystal Maze and Only Connect - thus covering both generations), so had high expectations. Suffice it to say, we burst out of the room with a mere 13 seconds of the hour remaining, relieved that we hadn't been beaten!. (Note to organisers - THAT is where you should have your cameras!)

Ever dreamt of becoming a secret agent?. Loved it. Came in with no expectations, escaped the room mind-blown. A definite must to everyone in London. Cheers to the staff as well, until next time Mr. Q! ;)
Fun. Good fun, active alternative to the usual activities like cinema or drinking. Convenient location in central London.
Next Level. This was one of the best hours of a Sunday afternoon I have ever spent. Would recommend to anyone. Concept was really cool! Looking forward to the next one currently being developed!

AMAZING!!!!!. ClueQuest was absolutely amazing. Didn't know what expect, but had a truly memorable and fun time. I felt like a cross between James Bond and a Crystal Maze contestant! Would recommend to anyone who wants to give their brain a work out in an exciting way.

A great concept perfectly presented.. I didn't know what to expect on arrival however what I got was a high octane and adrenaline filled hour. The curator's attention to detail was faultless and I couldn't recommend this activity any more.

An absolute MUST. So went to the new ClueQuest on a strong recommendation from friends, and we were not disappointed!!!!! This is Sherlock, meets cluedo meets TheRoom and the Crystal maze. The team were very welcoming and helpful, and (not giving too much away) the actual experience was mind blowing, stimulating, adrenaline rush. A must for families (my kids are 9 and 12.. Just the right age and they loved it) friends and for corporate team building events. If you want an experience that is like nothing you have done before, you must try this.

Exhilerating Fun Fun Fun!!. We were the first team to go head to head at the new Liverpool st venue. We were not really sure what to expect but the team were friendly and set the scene well. From the minute we were locked in and the clock started ticking -we were a bit like frantic headless chickens running around trying to get clues- but every clue or challenge solved was a great victory!! There are twists and turns in the game which you don't expect that keep you challenged from beginning to end and getting out before the clock reached zero (and before our other team) was just exhilarating! I can highly recommend this for a family with older children , a group of friends or just anyone you can bear to be locked into a room for an hour with. We cant wait to now try teh new game opening soon and will be back!!!

Brilliant Corporate Day Out. Had an amazing time at ClueQuest. Extremely well organised and very professionally put together. A proper challenge for all ages. One thing I would say is that if there are no kids in the group then the introduction should drop the MI5 bit - it's a bit cringey (sorry!). Anyway a fantastic experience and worth the trek there. Very interesting to be able to watch your colleagues on secret cameras and see how they interact and deal with the various aspects of teamwork and the riddles. Just go to do. Seriously, you won't regret it!

Challenging and a great time!. Arrived as part of a group of 4 and after a quick brief we were into the action straight way. The tasks were very cleverly thought out and was non stop until we finished with 10 seconds to spare! Great fun and would recommend to anyone.

Brilliant fantastic brilliant!!!. I visited Clue Quest with my work colleagues as part of our Christmas celebrations. We were a little apprehensive as we entered a bland office block near Tottenham Hale station but appearances can be very deceptive - what awaited us behind the doors and corridors was possibly one of the most fun ways to spend 60 minutes. The clues are so so smart. Extremely challenging but 'do-able' with a bit of brain power and team work. It was interesting to see how some colleagues solved some clues quickly and others fathomed out the others with ease - a good insight into how people think!! Absolutely loved it, would recommend it to anybody and cannot wait for the new room to open in Liverpool St so we can play again. Fantastic job Mr Q - keep up the good work!!

Amazing team game!. We visited Clue Quest for our Christmas team party as we were looking for something fun and different and we weren't disappointed.The game is so well thought out and challenging without being too intimidating, and the occasional clues were always gratefully received! The hour flew by and we could have happily carried on playing for longer.We played in two teams (with the first team getting the added bonus of being able to watch the second team on CCTV) and although neither team got our within the hour (1hr 1m and 1hr 3m), we all had a great time and will definitely be going back to try the new room when they open in Liverpool St.

4.26 minutes to spare!!. 4 lawyers and an English teacher with only our wits and the various hidden clues to help us escape within the hour! This was soooo much fun. We were running around like crazy folk, trying to figure it all out. There was lots of laughing, far too many high fives and ultimate victory when we got out within the hour! Would defintiely recommend. Apparently they are opening in Liverpool Street soon too.
Superb!. What a fantastic game. I would really recommend it. Suitable for all ages and abilities. Well worth a visit.
Excellent, better than I could have hoped for. A brilliant environment created by four mad genius Romanian brothers - we went through about 60 padlocks, a safe and much brainache. Brilliant.

60 mins of fun and excitement. We didn't know what to expect from this as a voucher was bought from Groupon and sounded interesting even though there was no indication of what this could be. We arrived, given instructions and then locked in. It was a lot of a fun and would definitely recommend it to anyone, no special skills were required, the only thing is to expect anything. We managed to escape with 3 mins to spare but it was close as the adrenalin starts when you see a massive clock counting down!Greatly commend the creators of this game and thought it was clever designing. Definitely go again (definitely worth the full price!) and I hear that they are creating a second room in the Tottenham branch so you could have 2 teams playing against each other - how exciting!

You just HAVE to go..... We had absolutely no idea what to expect and had not done anything similar, but went based on the TripAdvisor reviews. We were not disappointed, it really is fantastic. Even at 10pm on a Friday evening, we really got our brains in gear and were buzzing by the end. The customer services was exceptional, they really just want you to enjoy it! Thanks so much, can't wait for the new one to open at Liverpool St :)

Brilliant!. Went with my partner, daughter and her BF. Once we got into the swing of it, the team was star and we made it out with just seconds to spare. it was our first time at anything like this - so cannot compare - but cannot wait for the new room to open at Liverpool Street. We will certainly be in the queue for clues! It was top fun - very well run - and certainly got the heart and brain pumping.Totally recommended for groups of friends and families with kids in the mid-teens and upwards.

Would recommend to anyone. Went with work colleagues as a Christmas activity. Was great team building and a lot of fun. Can't wait for the one at Liverpool Street to open! See you again soon Clue Quest...

Great fun for a winter afternoon!. Did this challenge with husband and another couple, we all loved it. We didn't want to be beaten by the clock and appreciated the subtle hints that were shared. A completely new experience and would recommend to anyone who wants to try something different for entertainment:)

60 minutes of fun!. Absolutely brilliant hour of fun. My four girl friends and I heard about this through a colleague and thought we would see what it was all about. It totally exceeded expectations. The welcome was friendly and the game was described and explained perfectly. I don't want to give too much away about the whole experience because I think it's more fun if you don't know as much. But it was challenging, fun, great for team building but equally as good for a group of friends that like a challenge. If you have the chance then I would highly recommend a visit (don't let the fact that it's in Tottenham put you off, haha). The lady that welcomed us also told us that they are opening a second clue quest room soon so you can have two teams compete against each other which is a great idea.

If you do one more thing, make it this!. We absolutely loved our experience at ClueQuest and wish there were hundreds more rooms so we could keep coming back for more challenges. It was great fun and so well thought out. I can't say much as it would give it away, but I highly recommend it to everyone.

Better than Hint Hunt!!. Visited ClueQuest with 3 friends and we all absolutely loved it. We had previously done both rooms at Hint Hunt so were intrigued how it would compare - can definately confirm that it is miles better than Hint Hunt. The room is bigger, the puzzles more fun and the owners more friendly. Can't wait for more rooms!

BEST 60 MIN IVE HAD IN A LONG TIME!. i wont tell you too muich apart from try it yourself. the more i think about it the more i am itching to book again. brilliant day out for the people 7+ i would say. great idea for a stag or hen doo, or just a day out with your friends. Can not rate this highly enough.

Don't wait, go now!. We went in a group of four in October and I was blown away! Every time I thought we were near the end of the puzzles and surely must have figured everything out, another clue and another amazing puzzle would be set in front of us. It was really exciting and I can't wait to go on their next adventure.

What a fab experience!! More rooms please!!. What a fab experience!! More rooms please!! We thoroughly enjoyed our real life escape gaming experience and can't wait for cluequest to build more rooms. Although we didnt get out within the hour we loved every minute of it!!

cant wait to do it again!!!. We went not to sure what to expect, but it was so much fun, we left wanting to go back in! Great location for us.. especially as theres not much to do in North London! Looking forward to the new rooms opening! Our host was lovely!

Great fun. Took brother-in-law (+ his wife) for birthday outing. He had no idea what to expect but we all had a great time trying to escape from the room. Brings out your competitive side as you so want to win. Gabor was a delightful host and would recommend to others for a great way to spend a hour. Looking forward to new rooms at Liverppol Street soon.

Great game for anyone. I went with four friends. To be honest the location is less than inspiring, but once you're inside it's a fantastic game and it's clear that plenty of thought has gone into the design. It's hard to describe without giving too much away, but you'll have a great experience, and be surprised both by the puzzles and how you managed to miss things that seem so obvious afterwards. Lots of variety of puzzles to solve ranging from low to high tech, so you never get bored.

REALLY WONDERFULLY DONE!!. I bought this for my teenage son and his 3 friends, they absolutely came alive when they arrived. The experience started straight away with Gabor who was playing the part of their operative to tell them what their mission was to be.Very well run, they can't wait to try the new rooms at Liverpool Street in the New Year. They really enjoyed it!

Brilliant fun! Great Experience!. Our team of 4 escaped with 19 seconds to go! And we didn't stop laughing for hours! You have to use your brain, but you need no special knowledge... its all about powers of observation and logic. The whole set up is well thought out, with the emphasis on fun! The company are moving to premises in Liverpool Street soon which will make it much more accessible. I will be back with lots more friends :-)

Brilliant!. Had a fantastic time, four of us took up the challenge. Just made it out in time. Challenging but not to hard that you give up. Great idea fir a birthday and a rainy day. Will certainly visit again when new room added.

Great alternative day out; clever and fun. I went on this with 4 other friends, all in our 30s. We had no idea what to expect, but it turned out to be absolutely engrossing and great fun. You are put in a locked room and given 60 mins to escape, using just your wits! We just managed to get out in time, but it was close! As they say in the introduction, no special skills are required; just use your intelligence and curiousity, and a little bit of lateral thinking. Would be great for a small team-building activity, or birthday/celebration event. The location is a little far from central London and situated on a business park in Tottenham, so could be more accessible, but they are opening a new branch near Liverpool Street station, with new challenges and puzzles, which sounds great - sign me up!

Can you escape...? WE DID! :). 4 of us went to this live escape game and we managed to get out before the hour was up! It was fun and challenging and we would all highly recommend this for an occasion like a birthday.

DO THIS - you wont regret it!. I m always looking for new ideas for fun things to do with friends, booked through Groupon for me, partner and 8 yr old son (also 4 yr od but she stayed with us and played on the iphone instead) and invited friends to come too. As an avid Crystal maze fan I thought this sounded similar. Truthfully I thought this might be a bit gimmicky and partner didn't want to go at all. We went in with the "well its a day out isn't it". We couldn't have expected to enjoy it so much. Its all brain teaser stuff, a mix of logic, cryptic and problem solving. Its not easy - we didn't get out in the time though our friends with 2 teenage boys did, but so so much fun. Our 8 year old loved it. interesting how young and old brains work differently, he got some clues that we didn't. Its different, its fun, its really well set out and they help you along if you get stuck. We compared experiences with our friends all the way home. Cant go wrong with this one. Highly recommended. They are opening new rooms soon and plan a twin set up so you can race against friends - I ll be there for both :-)

One of the best things I've ever done. ClueQuest was absolutely fantastic. I've jumped out of planes and been swimming with dolphins but ClueQuest was on another level. So so rewarding and exhilarating! I did it with one other friend and we got out with just 20 seconds to spare. If I owned a business I would use this as part of the job interview process. Amazing and well thought out game. Thank you!!

Cannot Believe How Much We Enjoyed This!. Booked this through Groupon and so I was naturally sceptical, but had no idea what a "live escape experience" was and figured it might be fun to try.Gabor and the rest of the team were incredibly helpful from the very beginning, assisting me with finding a convenient time and sending us all the information we needed prior to coming.I don't want to give anything away about the actual experience, but the whole set-up was brilliant - the clues are fun and challenging, the time flies by and anyone can enjoy it. I went with my 50+ parents and my teenage brother and we all had a fantastic time (despite the fact that we were absolutely terrible!)Super excited for the new rooms - we will definitely be going back!

Brilliant!. Booked this for myself, my husband and my daughter & son in law, had no idea what to expect. We were visitng my daughter for the weekend and having done most of Londons attractions previously, we wanted to try something new, and I had come across the reviews for this on trip advisor so throught we would give it a whirl, so glad we did. Without giving anything away it was brilliant, we all thoroughly enjoyed it. The ClueQuest girl was lovely, very friendly and funny. When we first entered the room, we did think what are we suppose to do! But we soon got into the swing of things and the time flew by, great fun, we all said we would definately do it again if they had a different room. Apparently this is big in Hungary, very clever idea who ever thought of it.

cracking fun. Went here as a suprise birthday present. To start we were wondering what on earth are we doing here, as soon as the door was opened and we got stuck into the clues it was amazingly good fun. Really well thought out, if you are looking for a different experience I highly recommend this.

Surprisingly fun. I was recommended this by a friend. I booked it for myself, my girl, her sister and boyfriend, we had a better time than any of us imagined we would have. I can see this business growing rapidly in the UK.

Awesome experience. Had no idea what to expect, but it was extremely well thought out experience that myself and friends were talking about for a long time after.
Carefully crafted and the right level of difficulty, friendly organisers, HIGHLY recommended.

Great fun, very clever!. We had so much fun and have been talking about it all day. The puzzles are very clever and we were very excited about solving each one and progressing. It's a really creative activity and as soon as there are more games to play we will be straight back! I will definitely be recommending this to everyone I know.

Great fun!!!. I was a bit skeptical before we entered the game with friends, but it was actually very absorbing. The game is constructed in very creative way and it's not so easy like I was expecting. We had great fun, thanks for a good time ClueQuest!!!

Incredible. Once of the most enjoyable hour's of my life.. You must visit! I enjoyed this so much.
Fantastic value. Best £19 I've ever spent.
I cannot wait for a new game to be devised.
