A great activity with friends.. Five of us went in and five of us came out with five minutes to spare. It was a great activity to do and you left the venue feeling buzzed and ready for another one. The central location was great too.

Hen do outing. The secret studio was so much fun, brilliant idea to do for a hen do, party or just for the fun of it! Defiantly worth the money, Oscar who works there, was so helpful and friendly. Highly recommend doing it!
Simply, do it!. An amazing experience over any expectations, the ambiance is well cared for and puzzles chained with the story, lot of surprises, don't hesitate, do it!
Hen do. Exceeded all my expectations on this very special day for me. We all had such a great time. I would definitely recommend it 100%.

Absolutely Fantastic. The best escape the room the I've been to. The clues were original and fun to solve and then it also started getting quite scary towards the end. You should definitely give this a go!Ed

I hope they create new ones!!!. We did the impossibly difficult version. There were 5 of us and we nearly got out. It was well thought out with a good storyline. The staff could see we we were just short of getting out...and they actually let us go over by 2 minutes so we could finish our escape, which I thought was really nice. I loved the whole experience. It's exciting and really gets your brain ticking and is an excellent team builder. I can't wait to do another one!

Great fun still talking about it !. We went as a group of six, which I think worked well - especially as most of us didn't have any experience with escape rooms. The host was friendly and professional - didn't rush us at the briefing and put us at ease. The props were great - you will have to see for yourself (!) and the atmosphere was very believable. Everyone enjoyed it immensely, and we all want to do another! I can imagine it can become quite addictive! Many thanks for such a fun day!!

Amazing Experience!. You have got to hand it to the creators of this experience. You are up against the clock to find a way out of the studio and we are still buzzing about the whole thing. Intelligent set up with intriguing puzzles which was perfect for our group of 4. If you do one thing a bit different this year we would highly recommend Secret Studio. Well done guys!

Fresh and exciting. I have nothing to fault. The staff were professional yet friendly and the actual set is really creative. Really enjoyed the experience and would recommend to do with some friends! Personally, I think 4 people is the perfect group size :)
Great fun from start to finish.. We had a wonderful time. Very professional, friendly hosts and everyone in our group enjoyed themselves. You really should try it.

Birthday outing . I don't want to say too much as you need to go with no clues but we went in a group age range from 70 to 19 and we all thought it was brilliant! Basically you have to solve puzzles to escape, the hour goes really quickly and you must work as a team, no physical elements and the games master will give clues as you go to keep you on track, will say no more but if you do this you will be talking about for days!

secret studios. this was great fun! and even had to use a few brain cells.great welcome from very friendly staff and a very different way to spend an afternoon. would love to do it again with a new "mystery"!

Great fun, really nice people, would 100% recommend. We did this as a team bonding/night out type exercise, and having been in a meeting from 10-4 all day none of us were exactly brimming with excitement! However we got there, and it was fantastic from start to finish. Really good fun, a lot of scary parts and helped us bond as a team fantastically. The guys running it were fantastic too. Would 100% recommend

Laughed a lot, great fun. We visited the Secret Studio as two groups of four as part of a work social and team bonding. It was such fun, it really makes you work as a team and think a bit differently. Our first team were able to watch the second team complete the challenge and we were laughing about some of the funny things each team did for hours afterwards. Some of our team were a bit sceptical of it but everyone had so much fun. Don't let the creepy voice at the start put you off! The occasional tense and jumpy bit but mostly it's about thinking and logic and working out puzzles to be able to get to the next bit of the games. Would definitely recommend.

Great team building experience. Great fun, would definitely recommend. Can't say too much as don't want to give anything away but was great fun. Expect to tested from the beginning and lots of surprises too!
Team event. It was a super day out, a challenge that reqiured everyone to join in. A lot of fun and highly recommend it to everyone.

Challenging, intricate puzzles - and a right laugh!. I competed in a team of four, and all of us, having played a few other escape games in other cities before, agreed that this was the best game that we've played! The game itself was difficult and intricately put together, with an engaging story and a spooky atmosphere. We escaped in 55 minutes.Very highly recommended - thanks to Tice the Game Master for a great afternoon.

Great for team building!. We had heard great things about secret studio and we were not disappointed! Without giving too much away it was really great fun - with quite a few surprises along the way! It tested our logic and practical nature as well as our attention to detail and creativity! There were loads of props and activities. The host was really good and very supportive. The only disappointment was that now we have done it, we can't do it again.

Birthday Fun and Epic Win!. I booked 'Secret Studios' for my birthday. I did not have any expectations, having never tried an event like this before. I purposely didn't tell my group of six what we were doing and so that added to the fun.My team was made up of 30+ ages, yet we had an awesome time. If you progress through the game, you get to do some pretty great team bonding things.I advise having at least three team members, as I cannot imagine making it through without my whole team. We completed the task with 4 seconds to spare!!! Thank you for an awesome night Josh!
So much fun!!!. Went with 5 other friends and had such a brilliant time!! The staff is super friendly and the experience challenging but loads of fun. Definitely recommend it!

Excellent escape game with variety of puzzles and technology. This place is awesome! Its a great activity for friends or colleagues. I loved the variety of puzzles, the variety of old and new technology involved, the way the team was encouraged to work together, the way we were given tips at just the right point to make sure we could get through it and the great attitude of the guy running it who was giving us pointers (and didn't seem to get exasperated with us, even when things were right in front of us and we hadn't realised!). We finished it just within the hour and were completely absorbed for the whole time. I strongly recommend visiting and having a go!

These guys' energy is contagious!! You have to try it! . I was taken here as a surprise birthday celebration with 5 of my friends and it was AWESOME! My boyfriend was the 7th of the party and chose to watch the six of us inside. The layout and the storyline were amazing and the difficulty of each puzzle was spread out amongst us. These guys are running an absolute Gem and were wholeheartedly dedicated to playing their roles as energetically as possible. We had so much fun with them, there was great interaction between them and the group and also my boyfriend! He had a blast watching us scrambling for ideas! I couldn't have asked for a better way to spend my birthday with some great mates!Definitely will be up for giving escape rooms another go!!

Brilliant, brilliant, brilliant!. My mum had organised this for me for my birthday. The experience starts from the moment you get to the front door (there will be no spoilers in this!). There were 7 of us so we did two groups, one of 4 and one of 3. My group went first and loved it! You walk in and you think "mmmm what now" then as you get involved you are totally engrossed in the game, James was brilliant making it interactive also!Then the second group went in and we were able to watch them, this made it even better as we were watching them almost neck and neck to where we were. James was brilliant and even let me get involved in the second groups game to add another touch to it. Couldn't have asked for a better birthday surprise!I'll be back with my work colleagues!

Great fun, awesome staff. We've been to several escape rooms around the world, and chose this one because we read it had great atmosphere and also is very central. Cal was super nice and got into character even before we stepped in, when we just rang the doorbell, which was quite funny. We supposed to be a party of 3 but ended up doing this as a couple, which was still ok, I don't think that's the reason we sucked (even though it always helps that others have different points of view). The game was fun and quite innovative, and they did manage to surprise us with some of the elements. Cal was watching and giving feedback the whole time, which was quite different than what we are used to, it definitely helped and we couldn't have done it without him. Nevertheless, getting constant feedback sometimes gets in the way of independent thinking, so we're not sure how we feel about it, we ended up feeling that we really sucked and a lot of this we didn't think of ourselves. Bottom line - it was a great game and we enjoyed it, would definitely recommend this one.

Right mixture of difficulties and fun. Did it with a bunch of girlfriends, escaped right on time and we all had a big laugh and loved it! Having done a few similar things like this before, this feels like the right level of difficulties and excitement for playing with family or friends with different skill sets, especially great for escape room beginners I personally feel.

Great birthday night out. What a great night out. Was a great laugh. Never done it before. Was such fun. We were a mixed group with teenagers for a 15th birthday. Will definitely be doing it again. Really clever concept. Don't think about it.... Book it. Such an experience. Thank you to Josh that welcomed us at the secret studio and gave us a night we can't stop taking about.

Such an amzing experience. This was a team bonding activity our company organised for us and it was sooo much fun. so well organised, bit spooky but just the right amount, great team behind it, really cool headmaster. I highly recommend it! it was tough though...

Great fun and very well thought out. We visited the Secret Studio escape room as a group of 3 and the whole experience was very good fun. The experience itself has a narrative running throughout and all the clues very cleverly fit together. There are a number of different things to do so the whole group was able to be involved. The hour flew by and we found it a lot of fun. Would definitely recommend this highly.

Great Immersive Fun!. This was great fun! Oscar and the team made us feel very welcome. We battled against the clock to solve fiendish puzzle after fiendish puzzle to escape in time. Clues were on hand if needed, but even some of the clues were puzzles in themselves. Setting the experience in the past was genius. It felt really immersive. We played a few and this was one of the better developed ideas. We solved the mystery... just! With less then 2 minutes on the clock. Perfect for friends or even small corporate team building events. All told, a great day out.

I will never stop making fun of my friend now. First thing's first, this was amazing fun and I would definitely recommend it to anyone in London looking for something to do. Now, without wanting to spoil too much, I feel I can reveal that the entire thing is accompanied by an eerie vibe that keeps you on edge a little as you progress through the Secret Studio. But there is one bit that is truly scary. I happened to miss it actually occurring but my friend screamed. We have yet to stop making fun of her. Thank you for this great gift.

Incredible atmosphere. This was my first go at an escape room, myself and four friends had an amazing time and managed to escape with 4 minutes to spare! The puzzles were creative and challenging without being so difficult you think you'll never solve them. Helpful hints were given but weren't so obvious that they spoiled the game but the highlight here really is the atmosphere they create. The music and lighting certainly give everything a scary overtone and set you on edge in the best way (although I am such a jumpy person that I was of practically no use to my teammates in the second half). They even gave personal congratulations to individuals who solved a particularly hard puzzle making the whole experience feel very personal and friendly. Would definitely recommend as a fun activity to do with friends!

Fantastic Family Event. 6 of us visited Museum Street. Oscar was great, and the amount of help pitched just right, ensuring a great time was had by all. Our group had first, second and third timers of escape rooms. All enjoyed, and reckoned it was the best one.Well Done

Great fun - a must do in London!. Great experience especially for beginners to this kind of experience, gets you in the mindset right from the get go, also very friendly staff and look after your first every needs (especially those a little afraid of jumping)! A must do for anyone visiting London looking for a great thrill experience!-Matt, Tash, Holly, Aryton & Lesley

What fun!!!. The hour flew by!. First time in an escape room really had no idea what to expect had so much fun and got totally absorbed in the story excellent for all ages would definitely recommend!!!

Exciting, fun and thrilling!. Secret studio had everything! It was tricky, slightly spooky, innovative, surprising, clever and more than anything so much fun! If you've lived in London forever or your just visiting for a few days this is perfect for everyone. Highly recommend doing secret studio! You won't regret it!

So much fun! Secret Studio is a must do! . Secret studio was my first escape game and I can't believe how much I enjoyed it. Everything about the experience was superb. Can't recommend it highly enough! Brilliant idea and executed perfectly. A must do!
A lot of fun. These guys have a really fun escape room. It's worth the visit, check them out. They have some very original puzzles and a great vibe. Check them out!

Good laugh, better than expected!. We did this in a group of three and were on edge the entire experience! This escape room was challenging and innovative, a lot harder than previous escape games any of us had ever played! The staff were really friendly and we will definitely be returning when new games are added!

The intimidators !. What a laugh! A group of 60 year olds ( or nearly ) took on the challenge , all working collaboratively to get out in record time . We all loved it! Well planned brain teasing clues with great variety so everyone could contribute . Good props and very atmospheric . Great for young and old and would definitely recommend . We were buzzing when we came out and couldn't stop talking about it and looking for clues long after the game was over . Have a go , it's great fun !

Great fun with friends, doing something a little different!. From start to finish our experience was fantastic. The staff are great fun and ensure you have the best time you possibly can. I loved the theme and the rooms are brilliantly decorated to make you feel completely immersed in the experience. The challenges & puzzles you have to solve were just the right amount of difficulty for people to work out as a team.A great way to spend some time with family, friends, or a team building exercise. Highly recommended!
Better than I expected. We did this in a group of six. Very entertaining. A true collaborative effort by the team and a super job by the staff.

Excellent on-edge experience!. As an avid escape the room player, this experience stood out as a well formulated and managed game. Both challenging and at times frightening, the suspense was high throughout. Excellent team behind this game and I'd recommend to all who enjoy these games.

The best escape room we've done!. This whole escape room had such fantastic atmosphere, making us feel more immersed than anywhere else we've been. The production quality was outstanding, the puzzles were varied and reasonably challenging without being punishingly hard.

Great fun! Recommended. We took part as a family of 4, and only our eldest daughter had done anything like this before. Wasn't sure what to expect, but had a great time! Very clever, with a few scares and surprises along the way, we all really enjoyed it. You get an hour, and we finished it on 59mins 59 secs! 1 second to spare. Go for it if you want something really different.

So much fun. Went on Saturday with 3 others and had such a fun time. Tice, our games master, was really fun and entertaining, and the whole experience was great. I wasn't sure what to expect going in, but I want to go again!The storyline was a bit weak, but that didn't matter - the puzzles in the room were great and Tice's little hints and tips on the TV screen were great. As a bonus, we made it out in time!

Great fun. Challenging and entertaining. This is our third escape room adventure and the best so far. There are a good variety of high and low-tech puzzles and some interesting surprises. The end-stage of the game is very atmospheric.

Absolutely awesome. We did this a part of a friend's hen-do party and it was excellent. The puzzles were challenging but you do get clues if you get stuck. The people running it are very friendly and professional. I would defo recommend it

Really good fun. Secret Studio is the first escape room style game I've taken part in. I wasn't entirely sure what to expect but it was such good fun I've immediately started looking for other similar experiences to try. I booked this one because it's one of the very few I could find that allow teams of 6 people. I can understand why many don't as some parts of the game got a little overcrowded for us but it wasn't an issue at all.The game itself follows an interesting story and was very well produced. The puzzles are tricky but from our point of view not too hard. We managed to escape with about 2 minutes to spare! I don't have any other escape room experiences to compare this to but if you're a new player like I was this is a fantastic game to play.
Brilliant fun. Was given Secret Studio visit as birthday present and really enjoyed the experience. Well thought out scenario with fun but challenging puzzles to solve. Would recommend.

Totally engrossing!. This was the first Escape the Room thing that I've done and it was awesome. The whole storyline, props, puzzles, set and overall experience was very professionally and expertly put together. Highly recommend, great value for money and even greater fun. Completed with 7 seconds to go on 'Impossibly Difficult' haha
Brilliant. We went here for my 40th with my kids. It was brilliant it was so much fun. Really well thought out and the team behind it are so welcoming! Would thoroughly recommend!

So much fun!!!. We visited for a friends 30th and just found the whole experience amazing and so much fun. The concept is different, imaginative and I would absolutely recommend this as something to do if visiting London

Great great great fun!!!!. Absolutely brilliant!!!We wasnt sure what to expect but after a few minutes of being locked up we were well into the game. It was great fun with lots of twists and surprises.The team were very welcoming and let us watch our second group the littleuns (which was absolutely hilarious to say the least ) A must go for anyone and everyone.Thank you to the team at secret studio for a fantastic afternoon

Fantastic. We had a brilliant time. We went as a (well behaved) hen do and separated into two teams. My team went first and the challenges were genuinely challenging! As it went further and further (not giving away any hints!) we got more and more into it and worked as a team to solve some problems and jumped quite a bit at the scary parts!We were also allowed to watch our second group (without them knowing) and got to see the behind the scenes bit (not sure if they do this for everyone). The chaps were really friendly and welcoming, I would definitely recommend this!

Fab Locked Room Game with fun twists and lots of dashing about!. Wow, didn't know what to expect when we turned up to laughter on the intercom and a lot of building work above it but once in the reception room we were briefed in a fun but informative way and was eager to get going. once in some who had played other games before went on a hunt whilst some of us just opened everything going 'whats this? is this something? OO ITS LOCKED' but quickly came together to solve the puzzles. we found the TV screen interaction just about right to prod us in the right direction without giving anything away and the props and atmosphere was spot on. As it went on we started getting a real feel of what to be doing and eventually solved a lot of the clues so the final twist caught us (well, my brother in law) by surprise and was a great ending. Thanks guys! what a great thing to do in London with a bunch of friends/family. would recommend these guys full (as you can have 6 in a team) as I know there's lots now in London but this was a good one!

Amazing fun day out!. This is the best Escape the Room adventure I have done. The technology involved is clever, unique and the storyline is really good fun. Tice was an excellent host too which made it even more enjoyable. We did it in a group of 6 and, during the task, everyone still managed to find things to do. The challenges were varied, some more difficult than others and very witty. Can't wait for the company to do the next incarnation!

An amazing way to spend an hour!. We booked this a surprise for our 15 year old son. He has done a couple of escape rooms but my husband and I haven't so we were not sure what to expect. We absolutely loved it and we all agree that this was the highlight of our whole trip to London!! Staff are super friendly and helpful and the room set up is brilliantly thought out. We are so glad that we booked this. If you are swithering...just book it...It is fantastic and quite unique! ☺

Just do it,. This was our family's first escape room experience and we all loved it (our sons are 17 and 15). Everything is very professional in terms of booking and instructions. Very friendly, personal and reassuring briefing from Andrew (our games master) and then a superb hour - we overran by six minutes but were allowed the extra time to complete the challenge: which we appreciated. Great storyline with lots of clues and surprises along the way. Would recommend for families with teenagers. Can't say any more without giving anything away. Team Watkins

Intriguing entrance but exciting team game. As this was booked as a suprise when we were greeted with "have you ever been locked in a room for an hour" I was very unsure about what was to come. What a fun hour it proved to be. 4 of us were locked in a room laid out as an office of sorts and had to find clues around the room, whether it be in the form of items or written clues, to formulate a rescue. Don't want to say too much otherwise will spoil the challenge for others but suffice to say you need to work as a team, have a sense of humour and be up for the challenge. Brilliant fun and challenging too!

Amazing experience and great fun. My first experience of an escape room game and I must say it will take a lot to top this! Superb fun, great narrative, excellent clues, and amazing people. The guys are super friendly and make the experience extra special. I have never written a review (at all!) before but believe these guys definelty deserve it.I would definely return if the game changed and no doubt recommend if you are into puzzle solving. It's great fun for any groups of people - those that know each other and those that don't!

Definitively recommend, great fun!. We went on a team building exercise and it was great fun, I would definitely recommend. Really clever and the guys who work there were brilliant. A must activity and reasonably priced.

Highly Recommended !. A very unique experience for an escape room, loved the narrative and storyline. Been on a hunt for a great escape room in london for a while and have to say this is one of the top, if not the top. Highly recommended for a thrill and a good time. The game masters made it an enjoyable experience.

Brilliant start to hen do. Secret Studio was a surprise stop on my hen do. It was the first time any of us had done a 'locked room' game and it was brilliant. From the story set up to the detail in the room it was really well done. It was challenging enough to get us thinking but not so difficult that we ever got really stuck so the story and time rolled along nicely. There were some really clever clues/touches that I loved and showed that real thought had been put into it. Highly recommended for a group of friends or even team building.
Secret studio rocks. We had a great time and would definitely do something similar again. It surpassed all our expectations. Love the Games Master

A MUST activity in London! . It was my first room escape experience and I have already decided that it is the best out there. My cousins and I went in expecting that it would be a fairly easy challenge but it wasn't — and we haven't even signed up for the impossibly difficult level! We loved the whole vintage theme of the place. The puzzles were great and the whole thing was executed excellently. Few scares and exciting 'reveal' moments made the experience even better!Our host was Olly, super nice and welcoming! DON'T MISS OUT ON THIS PLACE.

For sheer enjoyment for your buck.... We went as a work team of 6 colleagues, and had a blast. The room was detailed and atmospheric - really telling a story through its setting. There was more than enough for everyone to do, and many little 'twists' and wow moments. We managed the pretty good time of 45:42. Comment if you beat that and I'll give you a slow clap.

Super fun and great experience!. We went here for a hen do and were in 2 teams. Team 1 got to watch the second team on a monitor and it was hilarious! We had such a great time and the hosts were extremely nice and funny. Definitely recommend this to anyone!

Exceeded expectations. I did this with my husband and friends for my birthday, and it was the first escape room for all of us. We had such a great time solving the mystery together. It far exceeded my expectations, particularly as it really got all of us involved and working together, rather than competing to beat each other at clues. We spent the rest of the evening talking about it!
Amazing!! . We had an amazing time. We escaped might I add...great friendly staff. Very spooky we jumped a few times even held hands we were that spooked!! We loved every minute!! You must go!!

Much fun!. We played this game as a four. Great location just near the British museum. The surroundings of the secret studio are a little surprising, not quite what you might expect. The welcome and briefing was friendly and informative, that game itself good fun. I won't give too much away, but the props were really good quality. At one point I thought to myself we are never going to solve this! The closed are well timed however as are the surprises!A fantastic laugh and I wish the team that looked after us every success.
Wicked time!!!. Had an awesome time here the team were fabulous and the game was great - really theatrical - couldn't recommend enough!!!

We escaped....just!. Had the best time doing this escape room, I have none to compare it to but I would 100% recommend. The activity is very cleverly planned, and there are so many clues which lead onto the next ones. Worth the money as it's a very unique experience, great for team work...and makes you feel a little like a detective yourself! Everyone running it/acting for it were fantastic - do not miss this!

Not just an escape room - it's a tense and atmospheric story too. I've done over 30 escape rooms in London and I'd rate this in my top two.The story is that weird things have been happening in a film studio and someone has disappeared - and you need to find them. So, you step into a plausible cutting room, set about trying to solve the mystery and the story develops from there.This room isn't a question of solving a sequence of puzzles written on pieces of paper to open locks - it's a varied set of problems that are all in keeping with the theme, and plausible as part of the story. It's got probably the coolest prop I've ever seen in an escape room and a couple of really magical moments.But the thing that really sticks with me is the atmosphere - as the story develops the tension rises and the music and the set combined to raise goosebumps and make me genuinely nervous about what was going on - not for the faint hearted, perhaps, but fabulous for anyone that enjoys immersive theatre and a huge addition to an already good escape room.

Birthday treat. We teased our 24 year old son for ages , over his secret birthday treat , he had no idea what to expect ! It was the best birthday event ever for everyone he loved it . Great fun , brilliant bonding , laughter , screams , team work . Fantastic way to spend an hour for a totally different and memorable experience that will be remembered and talked about for many hours after . We all can't stop telling everyone about it . We will definitely be booking more . You will not be Disappointed !

Great fun with friends!. I can't really add anything to what other reviewers have said other than this was a really fun thing to do with friends on an afternoon out in London! The staff were great and the escape room was fantastically well thought out - we 'escaped' with 2 mins to spare so came out feeling very pleased as it was a real team effort and one that everyone was able to get involved in! Will definitely be looking for more of this type of activity to do so thank you for a great first experience!

Brilliant brain teaser.. When we first entered Secret Studio, there was a moment when all four us stood there, looking at each other, no idea what to do. Then, our brains clicked into action and the puzzle adventure began. For the next 55 minutes (I believe you're allowed up to 90 minutes), we became completely immersed in solving one intriguing puzzle, after the next. On the rare(ish) occasion we did get stuck, the 'games master' was on hand to nudge us in the right direction. Adding to the overall experience, are the extremely atmospheric rooms you find yourself in. After solving the final riddle, the sense of 'job well done' was fantastic. Very, very highly recommended.

Fantastic fun!. The four of us (two couples) had a real scream trying to solve the mystery at the secret studio, so much so that the downside is that once you've cracked it you've pretty much ticked the box on ace things to with your mates in London. This will take some beating! The devil is in the detail, its totally interactive and immersive and the puzzles and clues need teamwork, tenacity and your wits to solve. The creators have gone to great lengths to create atmosphere and authenticity and if you are lucky, clever and not too inebriated to make it to the end then it is fantastic feeling. just do it! (Team Squid 55.36)

A fun quirky activity full of surprises. Wasn't sure what to expect having never done an activity like this before. It was really really good, excellently done with fantastic surprises. Would highly recommend!
Team building event - success!. Used this for a team building event based on recommendations- worked really well and we had loads of fun!
Very fun evening!. Great hosts and really good fun. Highly recommend, especially before a night out - great talking point! A few hidden surprises and thank god for some clues from the hosts!

Fantastic and utterly brilliant. Secret room is genuinely the best thing I've done in London for ages. It's so well thought through with ingenious twists and turns along the way that kept us all talking about it for hours afterwards. I can't stress enough how much of a great time I had! The staff were super friendly and slick, the clues had us laughing and scratching our heads at the same time and the end (which I will not ruin) was brilliant.

Great, creative, scary escape game. This is the third escape room I've done and, by some margin, the best so far. The puzzles are creative and reward different types of thinking; it's tricky, but funny, and also very scary! Theatricality and atmosphere creation are brilliantly used and the staff are delightful. Plus it really couldn't be much more central. Go!

Best escape room we've tried. We've escaped from countless rooms, all over the UK and the USA, and this may be the best.Excellent story, set design, puzzles and atmosphere. Refreshingly few combination locks, instead a really novel puzzle idea that ties in to the story.It's a little spooky which is brilliant fun.Also really friendly staff, great to chat to before and after our experience. I hope they do another room soon!

The BEST 'escape room' in London!. A surprise for our 'Bride to Be' on her Hen Weekend..we were searching for something away from the obvious Hen Celebrations, and this was PERFECT! 9 of us, split into two groups (due to room max. capacity), some had been to escape rooms previously, others had never done anything like it before. Two of our girls had done 3 or 4 escape rooms in London before and said this one was the best they'd been to, as it had the extra element of drama, as well as simply (or not so simply) finding clues and trying to escape in time. This experience was a full immersion into an old film set, perfect as many of the bridal party are actors, including the Bride to Be. The staff were so accommodating and amazing throughout booking to the end of the experience. We wanted to make it extra special, so they allowed the Bride's team to sit in with the Games Master and watch the second team, which was HILARIOUS & made us all incredibly competitive! Can't wait to send my husband and his friends to do it. 100% recommended! Go go goooo!

Great family fun. 5 of us went through this and we had a superb time. Looked after really well and just the right amount of hints and tips to keep us on course. Many thanks. A different sort of entertainment but highly enjoyable.

Great Surprise!. Booked this a surprise for my sister with my parents and from the moment we arrived it had a great element of suspense! Such a fun experience as there are loads of shock moments and super interactive that you get lost in the puzzles. Great staff and an excellently planned escape rooms, definitely recommend it.

A spooky mystery for a Sunday afternoon. A group of 6 of us took on the Secret Studio for my friends birthday.Having never done an Escape The Room game before I went in blind (other than knowing we had to escape). The story is brilliant and the set very good. A good number of clues to solve and the 6 of us worked well together to escape with 2 minutes to spare.The added 'shock' elements were very good (even if I did jump out of my skin and caused a chain reaction of screams behind me). The guys who run the game do offer you little hints if you're getting stuck, and as it was all (bar one) our first time these were really appreciated. I'll enter these games next time with a more strategic eye to solve the mysteries presented to us. The ideal number of participants is probably 4, as with 6 you all end up spreading out looking at different things and may get distracted from the main task you are supposed to be following.This was a brilliant way to spend 90 minutes on a Sunday afternoon and highly recomnended to anyway fancying something a little different.
Didn't really rate it. Good concept but some completely illogical/trial and error style puzzles ruined it for us, as well as being able to hear the staff sneaking around behind us.
Ardvark Challenge !. Have done Escape the room before so new what to expect. However, this one had lots of unusual twists. Really well thought out and great hosts. Would certainly recommend :)

Lots of fun!. My partner and I booked this for our friends birthday. We went as 2 couples.We'd been looking for something different to do for a day out.It was so much fun! We kept talking about it for a couple of days!It was definitely a bit spooky and kept us on our toes. The games master was excellent. We managed to get out the room at 58 minutes! It's a shame this company have one got the one escape room. We will be looking for more to complete! Team McKsweeney Toddith

Best escape the room in London. Really fun escape the room. Bit different to others in London, which is good for those who have done a few. Did the easier room, so look forward to coming back for the more challenging one! Thanks Olly and co.

Excellent Spooky Escape Room. We have done several escape rooms with our group of friends and this one was by far our favorite. Everything seemed to be so much more relevant and connected rather than the obscure clues and puzzles in other escape rooms. It was well thought out and the puzzles, storylines were riveting and you really had to play close attention to find the hidden truths. Their were some frightful moments which added to the overall game play and the enjoyment factor. I can't recommend the Secret Studio highly enough.

Secret studio London. A super game! A little spooky, great fun, it really made us think! A great interactive game for the family or a group of friends. We really enjoyed it and the time ticks away so quickly so you have to work fast! We would definitely recommend this.
Brilliant adrenaline rush!. We had such a great time! It was constantly intriguing and well thought out! Will definitely be recommending to friends

Time of our holiday. It was so good and so fun! We had used most of our day traveling to London from Denmark, and we were all kind of tired. Well that CHANGED, when we entered The Secret Studio!!! It was so well planned, and we had a blast!! Everyone should take their time to try it!!
Team Really. Great fun would highly recommend. Staff off the hook and were very and I mean very helpful lol. ggod fun and challenging but overall just a laugh.

so much fun. really really enjoyed this and it left our team laughing for ages! would deffo recommend for a family outing or a party also really good for people similar to my age (16). Only thing i would say is that i think it would work best with a team of 4 rather than 6 so that everyone could participate fully. This was such a brilliant experience and it was not predictable or boring in the slightest.

Fun night out for friends and couples. We have only done one escape room before (in Amsterdam which was great) and didn't know what to expect here. The staff was very welcoming and fun from the start and we had lots of surprises that kept getting more exciting!! Would definitely recommend and the more I think about it the cooler it truly was!
Amazing experience. Been to quite a few 'escape' type games in London - this one was by far the best storyline and atmosphere.
what a great adventure. we had such a great time - bringing all four members of the family together to get out under the hour. Recommend it - a great birthday adventure for my 17 year old.
Brilliant . We had such a good time and were seriously impressed. I would recommend this to anyone. Team of 4 or 5 is probably best. Thanks from Team Rosetta Stone!

Best escape room I've been to. We had a great time at Secret Studio, the game was fun and dynamic with lots of variation in the puzzles which all fit well into one story. The staff were also incredibly friendly and enthusiastic

Book it!!. I wasn't sure what to expect when my partner booked this for my 30th birthday for 6 of us. It was the first time we have done an escape room so i have nothing to compare it to but we had such a laugh and were talking about it for the rest of the day! Owen and the other guy (sorry i don't know your name) were fantastic hosts and i agree with the other reviews that the thought and detail that had gone in to it was brilliant.Do not hesitate in booking this you will definitely have a fab time.

Best Escape room so far. This was only my second experience in an escape room. but this one was far superior to the other. I was excited to begin with having done one before but i had no idea what i was in for this timeThe Puzzles/Skits were far more inventive and placed your whole team in panic.It wasn't just some slapdash box room with a few pin codes; but felt truly inspiredit opened my eyes to what makes a good or Great experience in escape room. Would highly recommend.(although maybe don't bring your kids)

Great fun!!. Me and my work colleagues, did the secret studio, and was such an amazing time. we had good fun, and really enjoy ourselves. It's a nice way to work as a team and get people close to each other. Definitely recomend it.

Epic. These guys have their escape room setup nailed. The story was good, the puzzles very clever and gentle hinting mechanism pretty much perfect. There were 4 of us which felt like a great number as we were all participating without getting in each other's way and without anyone dominating. Brilliant - highly recommend. Appletinis.

Brilliant Game Experience. I have been to 3 escape games and this has to be my favourite. From the host all the way to the end runs a strong story line that would keep anyone engaged. The setup is creative with varied puzzles you will need all your team to help solve. Highly recommend it!

AMAZING escape room Experience. The host was just great, really made it special and welcoming. The experience is really immersive and mysterious, loved every bit of it. Highly recommended, and I've done quite a few attractions of this type. I'd say it's one of the best in London.

Secret Studio Escape room. I went to this experience as part of 70th Birthday Never played Tomb Raider or computer games apart from pac man so not sure what to expect. I must say that I had little idea of how to play but the secret studio team sent me guidance on the tv screen and sometimes on the phone. The team are really good and ensure you come away enjoying the hour. So for experts it's a great challenge without help and for people like me you will still have great time with guidance given at level required to give you chance to escape within the hour

A Hitchcock-esq mystery! . I have been fortunate enough to do a number of escape rooms and Secret Studio really stands out as something very special! First of all, the overall experience has been the best by far - from the very start where you have to find the venue (secret doorbell to ring and say the secret password) all the way through. The staff were so lovely and enthusiastic, which was highly infectious and really put us at ease and got us in the mood. More so than any other room I've done they seemed genuinely pleased to see us! The room itself is fantastic, if you are a fan of classic cinema, there is a huge amount to appreciate and admire. There are plenty of excellent conundrums to get your mind going, which area a nice mix of using your brain and searching skills. Some really fresh ideas that I haven't seen any other rooms do. Difficulty wise, I would say it was on the easier side of normal, everyone in my group bar me and one other were newbies and we managed to escape, once we found our feet. Throughly recommended. If you haven't done an escape room before, a great way to start and see how much fun they can be! If you've done a few, a great way to see some new ideas! If they ever open a second escape room, will deffo come back for more!

brilliant fun!. Went here for a friends birthday. Had a great time . It was good to do something different and we all really enjoyed ourselves. Definitely lots of fun as well as a challenge. You do get clues too. Organisers were BRILLIANT too - loved it all

Tricky and Spooky Fun!. Went here for my sister's hen weekend......Wahoo! Lots of scary fun and characterbuilding stuff! Really super time was had by all and really recommend the Secret Studio for such a memorable experience...we are still talking about it!
Totally recommended. We had a perfect time there, The room master guided and helped us perfecty well and finally we made it. Really fun, you can't miss it!!

Unique- an excellent game that does something a bit different. We were five friends who did this and loved it. It was atmospheric and fun and we will be recommending it. Thanks for an awesome time, guys!

We beat it!. I was a little underwhelmed when I walked into the small basement office, but the staff were friendly and helpful, and as the game unfolded it became clear how much thought and effort had gone into it. We had a great time and beat the game with a minute to spare.
Great fun. Had a totally excellent hour here, would recommend it to anyone. Really fun, everyone was involved, imaginative and silly. Definitely go!

Different slant on a brilliant entertainment genre. We visited Secret Studio as part of our research for our own escape game in Kent so have done quite a few around Europe. I want to start of by stating that the customer service was excellent. We had an issue with our original booking and Oscar went out of his way to accommodate us. We arrived in what appeared to be a block of flats, surprised top actually find an escape game hidden below. The greeting started theatrically and this theme continued throughout. After a quick briefing we were in the game, set in an 1979 film studio. I won't go into detail of what was involved as I wouldn't want to spoil any surprises, but I will say that this is very different to any other escape game I have done, with far more going on than it originally appeared. If I had one negative to say it would be that often we found the game quite linear, with one person solving the puzzle and the other team members watching and waiting. Overall however this game was very good and I would highly recommended it.

Excellent experience . I've been trying escape rooms around London quite a bit and this is one of the very best so far. Great narrative, fun puzzles and thoroughly nice blokes who run it. A wonderful night out

Sunday Society! . My boyfriend, his sister and I have visited 4 escape rooms and I think Secret Studio is just about my favourite! The staff (Owen and I'm not sure of the second workers name) were super inviting and even went to the effort of sending the three of us a personalised email after we'd left. The room itself was challenging, but still achievable and provided us with the opportunity to engage with a range of different technologies. We'll be keeping an eye out to see if Secret Studio open a second room!

Hen do morning after the night before! . We did this on my hen do and what a fabulous amazing thing to do!! We are all still raving about the experience it was fabulous, frightening, funny and sorted the leaders from the followers!! 100% must do, the guys are amazing and made us feel really welcome!!! Thanks again! X

Fantastic fun... Full of surprises a must visit. We were on a hen weekend and this was an activity planned through a recommendation from the brides sister and what a awesome time we had... Laughed and squealed lots.. If you want a memorable adventure we all would highly recommend you go! We escaped with 1:45 seconds to spare... Excitement from start to end...

AWESOME!. The guys here are great and friendly. Mrs. Stokes is a nice lady. We have done 3 other escape rooms from other companies and this room was one of the best we have done for sure. Can't wait for them to make a new room! Cheers guys
Gather intelligent friends!. We really enjoyed this experience. It was fun to work together and try to escape. The staff are very helpful and guide you if you are truly stuck. Well worth a visit!

Great fun. From the start this was an excellent experience. My email was answered very promptly and they went out of their way to be helpful. None of us had tried escape rooms before and on arrival the theme began. The games master was welcoming and got us into the mood with some laughs before it began. We managed to escape and everyone spent the evening raving about the place. A great time and thoroughly recommended to anyone who wants to give it a go.

Can't stop smiling and laughing.... I will say that not being a very competitive personality or superbly skilled at puzzles I was a little hesitant going in. My fears were quickly allayed - this turned out to be the funnest 60 minutes I've ever enjoyed with my group of friends! There was a group of five of us and everyone was able to pitch in. Even if we didn't break any records, the game has left us laughing and chatting for hours afterward, and I'm sure we'll be talking about this experience for a long time to come.
So much fun!. Great fun, fully recommend it! 5 out of 5 stars. Well worth the experience. Can you make a new room so we can come again?!

Wow. Just an amazing experience genuinely one of the best attractions/activities I have ever done. If you are thinking about doing it , don't think Just do it. I did it Friday and it's now Monday and we as a group have not stopped talking about it.

Such good fun.... Great experience. My first of a room escape game, I was there with my husband and grown up son (the only one with a previous experience of this type of game). We had a slow start but soon started to get up to speed and finished just over the allotted hour (annoying but still great fun). Callum gave us occasional hints and tips, there were surprises and some scary moments but definitely a game for all ages.
60 min of fun. Great scenario, amazing time with my friends. The voice leads you through the game when things get a bit tricky. Excellent organisation

FREAKING AWESOME!. I cannot explain to you how much fun it was. Seriously! From the moment you're outside the building trying to get in, these guys kept up the story. I would highly recommend this for a small team night out, a date, stag/hen or just as part of a fun day out. The story is fantastic and the effort that's gone in to it is just top notch plus the two guys we met where great. I don't want to give away too much but it's certainly an experience and an adventure.
Brilliant... Such great fun event well laid out and brilliant value for money. Certainly tests you and your team, but also aids your team efforts. Thank you guys for a great fun visit.

Something different and lots of fun.. This was a lot of fun and something a bit different! It's really well put together by the guys at Secret Studios, constantly entertaining and interesting. I'm recommending to anyone who will listen!

Great fun!. This was such good fun. Cal, who welcomed us, was fun and instantly put us at our ease. The game was challenging, but for that very reason we really enjoyed it. Great way to spend an hour, and a very good team building exercise. If the guys put together another game, we'll definitely be going!

Excellent, something a bit different!. Excellent set up, it starts when you ring the doorbell. Thoroughly enjoyed the experience with friends, and we completed within time!Staff very professional, very welcoming clearly explaining instructions and offering hints along the way if needed. A must for a different experience!Well done secret studio.

High intensity fun!. This was a first time for me at a Room Escape. And it won't be the last!Tice, who was our 'game master' and looked after us , was very friendly and really enthusiastic and keen that we really enjoy ourselves. After an orientation we began the challenge. It was really well themed with a keen attention to detail and cool variety of puzzles, clues, problems to solve and things to discover. As we was really, really keen to beat the game (we were told its around a 50% pass rate, and we wanted to be on the winning side) it got quite intense especially towards the end when time was running out, which for me made it all the more entertaining and special (when we did in fact escape!). Had a great time and hope other outfits are as fun and well run as this one.

A must for those who are looking for something different to do in London. Had an activity day out in London with some works friends last weekend. This was by far the main event. The lay out is superb, cleverly done, challenging but most of all fun. Watch out for the hints and tips that pop up on the screen from time to time.

Great evening doing something a bit different!. Secret Studio is absolutely brilliant! It was my first escape game so I didn't really know what to expect, but the whole thing was absolutely fantastic and I really hope they open another room soon because I can't wait to do something like this again! Our games master Josh was brilliant and the game was really clever - you didn't know what you were aiming for or where it was going to end so you had to move quickly and keep your wits about you. Brilliant activity as part of a night out in central London.

Great fun, excellent hosts. I booked at a Saturday afternoon to go that same night while me and some friends were in a bachelor party. Let me just say that it was beyond the best expectations. The game was awesome, even for non english people, and the host was incredible. They are a movie production company and they know what they're doing. We really felt immersed in the game.Top experience!

The Best "Escape Room" experience in London. Having just returned from the "Secret Studio" I have to tell you what an amazing time we've had. If you want a brilliant experience lasting just over the hour with clues to solve in a mysterious way then look no further!I've done a few different Escape Room experiences before and this is the best by far. Get a team together, make plans and book to visit the Secret Studio

An Amazing and Fun Escape Room. This would be our third Escape Room Puzzle and this is by far one of the teams favourites. It certainly had something for everyone. What was really good was when a team member had a good idea or suggestion and the Games Master would send the odd message or two back up the suggestion. Puzzle after puzzle and very cleaver with a few surprises hear and there. A great thing to do with Friends and Family.

What a great time we had. Would highly recommend it!!!!!. Didnt know what to expect going in, but must say it was BRILLIANT. It got you thinking, it made us jump and it was entertaining. Something for everyone in our group of 6 to get involved in.

We had a fun and thrilling night and escaped just in time :-). We were a team of four. It worked perfectly, both in size and in terms of cooperation.Even though we are no native speakers of English, we had no problems solving the puzzles. Hints on how to proceed came always at the right time, not too much and not too early.We had the late night slot at 23:30, which made it extra scary. But it doesn't have to be. Just tell them before what you can take... :-)The staff was very kind and caring, and even made our booking at short notice possible.Thanks a lot for the great experience!

A fun and scary escape room. Slightly different from the norm!. Had a fun and scary evening locked in a room trying to solve a mystery. The production was well done with lots of different puzzles and challenges. Some definite scary and creepy moments that are well done. Happily recommend this.One tip is that whenever you want to listen to certain things that happen whilst in the room, momentarily turn off the AC if it's on, as it's a bit noisy and makes it hard to hear.

A thrilling day out!. Having no idea what to expect, I was in no way disappointed. There were twists, turns and a few scares to give everyone a real treat. From the get go the experience was brilliant. Our games master Callum explained everything clearly so we were able to get the most out of our time there. What an interesting and innovative way to spend a couple of hours with friends! The huge amount of effort that is put into the whole experience is astounding. Well done guys! Keep up the good work!

Great day out!. Secret studios is a fantastic idea for a day out. I went with three other people (I wouldn't recommend many more). The staff are great and it really gets your heart racing! Can be a bit scary/jumpy at points (I'm a wimp with that sort of thing) but still thoroughly enjoyed. Wish I could do it again!

Unexpected!. Had no idea what to expect as I'm not a gamer but I certainly wasn't expecting this!It was pretty tense at times but enormous fun. Bootcamp for my flabby brain! I'd recommend that everyone has a go!

Find out who your mates really are!. A fantastic birthday surprise. Laughs, shocks, teamwork, stupidity. A few moments of inspiration. I found out I am not as smart as my mates and that in event of scary things- one of my mates runs away and leaves the rest of us to it.
Unreservedly recommended.

Awesome !. A Fantastic way for a group of friends or family to do something together that is going to get the heart pumping and adrenaline going.
So much thought and detail put into the secret studio, really is an experience like no other......seriously !
Highly recommend it for a great day out.
WOW!. The whole thing is fab, from arriving with secret phrases to working through the challenge, few surprises along the way and really great memories made....really very recommended!

Great way for a group of people to work together and still have a good laugh !. There were 7 of us ( this would be the max. number in my opinion) None of us had been before and were slightly apprehensive.After our introduction to the game and it's objectives we were looking forward to getting started .Without giving too much away it was a search for clues and avoiding the red herrings . I thought that an hour would have been too much time but our group escaped with 4 minutes to spare which to our surprise was actually a good result .All enjoyed the feeling of achieving something whilst having fun.Tip - Listen carefully to the instructions.

Really fun day out!. Had a great time! Really clever and well run game. Would definitely recommend. Fun logic puzzles, lots of team work, got the adrenaline going! Fun storyline, and great location for museums/cafes after!
Brilliant, well run and slick.. The studio is very well run, the staff great. This is a great night out with a difference. It's very well run and the studio is totally engaging.

Amazing unique experience. I was invited to be part of a group of 6 to go to secret studio. I had never done anything like it before. It was so brilliantly thought out. The clues were hard, but just right. Real team work was involved to solve the mystery. A great deal of thought had gone into how it all came together. Absolutely loved it and would highly recommend
A brilliant hour.. Good central location,really well thought out and very interesting; completely different and very unexpected.

off the chart!Everyone should go!!! so much fun!. I recommend everyone to do this! its such a brilliant concept and is so much fun! We didn't know what to expect and the lead up to the event was also made super exciting! great for a bunch of friends as well as maybe a team building. Cant let too much on, but all should try! Go on do it!!!!!
Great challenging fun!. Really fun day, unexpected twists, would highly recommend. We went as two couples and will now buy as a gift for my children.. Great concept!

Fun, excellent, and memorable!. Highly recommended! It was my first time doing an escape game. We were 4 friends and that was lots of fun. The experience was full of surprises and thrilling. The organisers were super friendly, guided us when we were stuck, and even managed to handle the fact that we spoke French throughout the session... Fear, thrill & laughters: This escape game is a must!
Great experience!. I didnt know what to expect but it was a really fun night out, a lot of laughs and we escaped! Would definitely recommend to all.

Fanbloodytastic. Such a great game with lots of twists and turns. If I say more it will spoil it so just check it for yourself. I went with family and grown up children and the games masters were fantastic too. I have a big family so we will be back.
A great way to spend 90 mins!. Atmospheric, challenging, fun and really well thought out. Highly recommended for those that like to have their lateral-thinking muscles stretched.

Amazing time at Secret Studio! Highly recommended!. It was our second escape game and it was really fun! The experience is amazing, the set up is great and the game was challenging! I would definitely recommend it to anyone.

Out of park birthday for 14 year old son!. Stumbled across this for my 14 year old for his birthday; he and his "gaming" generation mates were blown away. I wasn't allowed in, just took them to the door and I thought they might be too cool for school, but they were totally absorbed and raved about it all the way home. Great communication before with the Games Master for me I had agreed I wouldn't take part - and whatever it was they got up to in there it beat PS4 hands down. Thanks again guys

Brilliant experience . This was the first time I had done anything like this so I didn't know what to expect. However, it was a brilliant experience to go into with friends and family. The set up was great, and the game really tested me. It was so much fun, and I would definitely recommend it to anyone.

Highly recommended!. This was a great fun! We had never done anything like it before, but we are definitely coming back for more! The game had a great set up and managed to engage the entire family! The host was friendly and helped making the evening into an unforgettable experience. If in doubt just do it.
Amazing!. Such a great experience! definitely will be coming back as soon as they incorporate "The sequel"!Strongly recommend it!

Brilliant experience . We had never done anything like this before therefore did not know what to expect however this turned out to be the highlight of our trip to London. Very well produced and great value for money also! Such great fun and we spent a lot of the time laughing! I would definitely recommend this experience to everyone of all ages. It is a must do when visiting London.

So much fun. We did not know what to expect as we had not taken part in anything like this before. The staff were friendly and welcoming, they explained all the detail we needed to know and answered all question we had. We were a group of five of different ages, we all took part and worked as a team to solve the 'mystery' I use the word mystery as I don't want to give anything away. We enjoyed every minute of the experience, it tested us all, it made us laugh, it scared us a little and it is definitely something that we would look to do again - if we can find other events like this being run. We would all recommend this and suggest that it's suitable for team building, family, friends and teens, we were a group of family and friends

Fun for all ages!. We booked Secret Studio for my brother's birthday-a potentially tricky thing to get right due to the mix of generations but everyone thoroughly enjoyed it! I've done a few escape games in recent times and I do think this is the most imaginative. I'll definitely be recommending it to my friends :)

Awesome!!. Had so much fun! We had never done anything like this before and weren't sure what to expect, but Secret Studio blew whatever expectations we had out the water! Awesome setup and great hosts, will definitely be telling my friends about this!
Great Activity. Loads of fun for everyone! Excellent room set up with a lot of twists and turns.Host was really welcoming and friendly.I strongly recommend!
This was awesome.. Really happy we went to Secret Studio, the staff are amazing and the puzzles are great. Highly recommend.

Fantastic corporate team build event!. I took my team here for a team-build event, leaving it as a total surprise for them. The fact the venue isn't visible or marked from the outside adds to the mystery.Once inside, we were greeted by Zo who really looked after us and briefed us on what we had to do, and then we were off to solve the puzzles.There were lots of things to figure out and just the right amount of support along the way. Some very interesting and novel ideas, and a few great surprises too.Highly recommended for families and small teams (6 or less).

Brilliant Fun!. Fantastic fun if you love solving puzzles. Excellent set up and hosting. I particularly loved the attention to detail and all the retro pieces in the room. We did this as team activity after work and everyone throughly enjoyed it!

Excellent fun & great team building. Very well judged setup, great hosting & just generally brilliant. First time I've tried this sort of thing, but now keen to try again. Ours was a group of 5, not sure you'd want any bigger.

Shockingly good!!. We were all first timers for this sort of activity - but are hooked now!!The staff were very friendly, the plot was brilliant - just enough clues as and when required to help us out.All had great fun and would love to do more - but are worried this has set the standard too high for others to compete

“Exceeded Expectations”. My daughter booked this for our family of 5 for my husbands 65th birthday. Not having done any escape rooms before, I did not know what to expect. My son, daughter and son in law have all done other similar experiences, however they all said this was the most interesting and enjoyable one they had done. We all thoroughly enjoyed the entire experience and managed to complete the challenge with 50 seconds to spare! A great activity for families of mixed ages!

Great Family Afternoon out! . Had a great time with my husband and teenage kids. good fun! Would highly recommend! We really didn't know what to expect but everyone got stuck in and we beat the clock! You have to try it out.

Brilliant experience!. Had a brilliant time with my work colleagues at secret studio. The setup is very cleverly done and you are given just enough clues to keep the pace - not a boring moment (a few scary ones too!). Highly recommended !!

Brilliant night . Participated in the event as a couple (specifically requested for just the two of us) the event is well thought through with a good story line. Immersive, yet also leaves you to your own devices with the odd clue to help you along. We had a brilliant night, the staff were excellent and made the experience even better. Was challenging yet not too difficultHighly recommend!

Great Experience. This is a great idea and well thought out! I didn't know what to expect and it was fantastic. We had 2 groups and luckily I was in the first team and we made it out within the hour plus got to watch on to the second group do it ( absolutely hilarious). I would recommend this place and staff very friendly.
Unbelievable Jeff. Fantastic fun in a changing immersive environment. A challenge for the mind and soul!From start to finish it was glorious.

Awesome fun, highly recommended!. So much fun, it's really well done! Wasn't sure what to expect but had a great time, challenging enough without being too difficult. The guys have put in a lot of effort, well worth a visit!

One of the best games!!!. We have done quite a few escape games and this is literally one of the best ones we have done. 5 mid to late twenties friends took part in this game and it really challenged us. It made you think outside of the box and it was incredible. The atmosphere was great and Tice was a great host. It is a little jumpy but not in a bad way (as someone who really doesn't like jumpy things) it just really added to the whole experience. And there were some twists I just didn't expect.Well worth the money and time... Such good fun x

Fabulous Clue Solving Fun !. First visit to Secret Studio for me (age 50) and my children (18 and 21) . Had no idea what to expect, but great fun from arrival to finish. We were greeted at the Secret Studio by Zo, who was very friendly and engaging. He gave us a pep talk on what to look out for and played a video, from there on we were shown into a room and left to our own devices..... Lots of clues to solve and hints/ prompts and encouragement given via phone and tv screen to keep you on track. Well thought out and flowed along. All three of us contributed to working out puzzles, questions, tasks etc. Thoroughly enjoyed the teamwork element - great bonding experience. Would highly recommend.

Great night out! Really fun would recommend to anyone. Secret Studio was brilliant fun. I have been to a few of these types of things and secret studio make it all about you (and your group). The level of detail and the thinking that has gone into the game is amazing. They help you out where they need to, to prod you in the right direction, but utlimately it's up to you and your team to figure it all out. I went with my team from work and everyone loved it. We got out with 3 mins to spare!

Fantastic experience, great fun. This was so much fun. I had no idea what to expect and it was excellent. It is really well designed and the staff make sure it progresses at a good pace. The staff are really nice too. You will definitely be talking about it for a long time afterward!
Best fun ever. As a family outing with grown-up children this did not disappoint - we were still laughing about our incompetence over dinner some hours later!

Great Fun, Great Experience.. I had done Cluequest before, but other than that this was one of my first escape rooms. It won't be last. The second we spoke the secret message and entered the basement, the experience was mysterious and exciting. We were a group of six teens and this was the perfect option, as cinema trips were becoming bland. Whilst this was more expensive than the cinema, i would pick it over that, anytime. Special thanks to our gamesmaster Tice. He made the experience all the more enjoyable. If you like riddles, if you like puzzles, if you like mystery and if you want the satisfaction of escape, then Secret studio is well worth a visit.

Awesome experience!. Went with colleagues as team activity, first "escape" for all of us. We were really impressed by how well done this was, with a great storyline and setup, all confined in a room. We expected a brainy puzzles thing but nope, it's the real deal, looking for clues and put them together.There's lot of thinking and "try this, do that, oh no wait, this and this together" going on, good fun and excitement! We felt quite smug at the end as we managed to escape :)The staff is super friendly and totally in the game. We had an awesome time and kept on "revisit" the whole thing over dinner. Highly recommended.

Fantastic . A thrilling escape game thoroughly recommended to those who have a more adventurous side to themselves. Welcoming staff, great design and a fantastic escape game make this one of my favourite things to do in London.

Secret Studio was great!. It was our first escape game and we managed to escape with 40 seconds left on the clock.It was very exciting and not too hard with some hints on the way.Thanks for an amazing experience!

Brilliantly terrifying... Highly Recommend. This was the first 'escape the room' type activity myself and my uni housemates had done and we couldn't have had a better time.The story aspect of the escape was great and kept us hooked from the beginning, and whilst we often looked at each other with no idea what was going on or what to do next the hints provided gave us gentle nudges in the right direction (and often we'd figured something out before the hints came!) We're all a bit on the jumpy side... So for anyone listening it may have sounded like we'd all gone a bit crazy with the amount of screaming that was going on, but it all adddd to the excitement and suspense this game builds.I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a truly immersive experience - just make sure you've worked out where the closest pub is for when you're finished as you'll definitely be needing a large glass of wine to calm the nerves!

Excellent Fun. This was our introduction to escape room games and what a great introduction it was too. Extremely well set up, friendly, excellent value for money, a brilliant way to spend time bonding, team building, teasing our brains, intense fun, racing against the clock to find the clues and finish the game within the alloted time. A well put together and thought out clever game which has got us hooked. I thoroughly recommend giving it a go.

CHALLENGING ENTERTAINMENT. My team and I had a great experience with Secret Studio. The Game was well structured with clever surprises and challenged us even though we have completed several of these before. The staff were friendly and helpful and their engagement made the experience all the more fun.Thanks, would definitely reccommend!

An awesome experiece!!. This was amazing! Me and three other friends didn't know what we were going into. We got into it straight away and just got fully immersed into the situation. Without giving anything way, just work together and fast :) Secret studio pulled it off, and hats off to the hosts for giving us a good laugh!!

Great Fun. We were looking for things to do in London and stumbled upon this on Trip Advisor. We saw it had great reviews so thought we would give it a go. We all had a great time and I would thoroughly recommend it to others, particularly families. It is great for bonding time!

Brilliant!. I cannot rate this highly enough - we had a brilliant time and loved every second of it!! We'd been looking for one of these escape style games to do and can totally recommend this one!!We got out in time - just - and were totally wired by the whole experience!! We have told so many people about it as it's great. Staff were friendly and helpful and made us feel relaxed and ready for the challenge. They also kept in email contact before and after which was personal and made the event feel special. You will love it!!

A lot of work put in to a great game!!. Having done a couple of room escape games, it can be difficult to try new things and stand out from the competitors but Secret Studio does it brilliantly. Four of us played the 'difficult' game. There is an 'impossibly difficult' one to play but we didn't know what to expect so played it safe. From the moment you book there is a warm, personal and friendly approach from the staff allowing you to understand the details required prior to arriving. Without giving anything away, as you play the game, you notice the hard work that has gone into it. There are a few jumps and scares along the way which are excellent and go well with the story. There is also great use of TV screens and technology used in the room to make it more than a basic room escape. We got out with 7 or so mins to spare and glad we picked the 'difficult level' as probably would have struggled on the harder level.Thoroughly recommend this as one of the best ones I have done of this type. Definitely book this!

Loved it. Went with a group of 5 of us which seemed like the right amount of people for the puzzles you face. Close to British museum but google maps struggled with the postcode, but putting in the name we found it ok. First escape room experience and loved it. Didn't know what to expect but secret studio has left me wanting more! Definitely recommend it!

The best hour of fun you will ever have. From the point of entering to leaving it was one best 60 minutes of fun we had ever had. It gets you thinking, gets you laughing and really gets you throwing yourself into what the event is. Not given anything away as it would spoil the experience. The staff that look after you are excellent.Give it a go, you will not be disappointed.
We got out. Excellent activity for my birthday. Our team of five worked in perfect harmony (!!!) and solved the mystery. Great fun - Highly Recommended.
Brilliant. Honestly a great experience. Constructed really well, providing a challenging and enjoyable experience. The game gets you thinking ALOT. Recommend going in a group to share the experience.

Such a good time! 100% recommend. I booked this for some friends from school - and we had so much fun, and are still talking & laughing about it. The studio and props were fantastic and so much effort had been made to make it feel really immersive & authentic. Thanks to Olly for putting up with us and making it so great! Already planning on coming back with another group of friends for a birthday!

Beyond Awesome. We were all so excited to do this I was afraid it would be a bit of an anticlimax... I shouldn't have worried, it was everything we wanted it to be and more!!!! The attention to detail was amazing and the rooms were challenging but not impossible. Our maze master Boris made us feel totally at home, kept us all amped up and really made the whole experience just a tad more epic. if I could give this more than 5 stars I would!!! The only piece of advice i can give is dress for heat and book this as soon as is humanly possible!!!

Fun family time. booked this as surprise for my sons 21st birthday. The level of difficulty is just about right and there are quite a few bits that may make you jump and get your adrenaline going. Would definitely recommend as a family treat or team building exercise, you would get to know your colleagues strengths and weaknesses pretty quickly! Also big thanks to Callum who made the whole experience so enjoyable.

So much fun!. I had such a great time here today. We organised to go as a family as a surprise for my brother today as it is his 21st birthday. I definitely wasn't disappointed as it was even better than expected with lots of cool twists and surprises. It really was so much fun - thank you to the lovely, friendly staff especially Callum for making today so special :).
Highly recommend. Really fun, would recommend to anyone who is up for a bit of a challenge and something a bit different! Staff are great as well

Super fun with surprising details!. This was my first experience with something like this and I absolutely loved it. The room was well put together and the story line and the clues were really well thought through. Can't recommend it highly enough, it was good fun and the staff was great.
Looking forward for the next room to come along!! :)
Great Fun and great Host. Very imaginative games and puzzles and great set, took a while to get going but with good team work we got into a good rhythm. Highly recommended.

Excellent escape experience. My friends and I had an excellent time in Secret Studio. We managed to just get out in the time- the level of complexity is just about right.
I would say its not for the faint hearted.... we had a few screams while we were there!!

Can't recommend highly enough!. Myself and three friends visited Secret Studio today and were blown away by the experience! We were quite nervous at first but we soon got into the swing of things and were on our way! The attention to detail was really impressive and the clues were inventive and covered a range of skills.
