The team that looked after us were brilliant and I would highly recommend this experience to anyone that is up for a laugh and a challenge!
Everything was perfect!. The room was one of the best one I have ever done. Lots of surprises and many small details who makes this room really well built and well thought! I very much recommend!
Amazing experience. The attention to detail in every aspect of this game is phenomenal. I can't recommend this highly enough.

Brilliant Experience - Highly Recommend. I went to this with 5 colleagues and I cannot recommend it highly enough! It's a whirlwind of fun and excitement from beginning to end, packed with problem solving and mystery. It's a fab experience for all ages and I would recommend for couples, groups, families, colleagues....I don't want to give too much away because it really is just something you have to experience for yourself!

One of the top locked in a room experiences. Attended with some friends from work - a brilliant experience totally immersive, great storyline and atmosphere with a very creepy set. I would recommend it to anyone. The experience starts with the email instructions - so follow them carefully!!! We got out with 3 mins to go - so pretty happy
Best experiance ever!!!. We came with no expectations at all. the team and the settings are brilliant. an hour of pure fun. Go for it...

An amazing group experience. A couple of college friends and I went here over Spring Break. The excitement begins as soon as you arrive to the building. The staff was extremely helpful, both in explaining the game and providing clues. The set is meant to be a bit creepy, but it only adds to the experience. We were able to finish on the lowest difficulty, but it was still challenging. Our entire group had a blast, and it was one of the best experiences that we had in London. I would recommend this to all ages. Its very well done and is worth every last pound. My friends and I for sure are planning on going on another experience such as this one.

Totally awesome . Can't reccomend this highly enough The fun starts from the first email instructions and just gets better and better A good amount of clues and pace, combined with great props means it's a totally immersive experience The retro feel is brilliant , and it's exciting from the moment you step in the room Totally totally loved it This was our first ever time room - but we soon picked it up and escaped with seconds to spare Really cleverly done - hats off to you Oscar was brilliant - really enthusiastic You must try it

Retro riddles in a packed hour. Phew! We made it out, so able to write a review... Excellent retro fun on a film theme. Time passes quickly and lots of good atmospheric props and twists to keep the team busy. Great central location. Host made us feel really welcome. Will come back again.
Recommended. One of the best we've done, really felt part of a story from the opening static of a 1980's TV to the.... well try it and find out!!

Birthday visit! Perfect fun!. Was searching around to find an escape room which had availability for up to 10 people or one which had two spaces next to each other. I found secret studios did! The guys who worked there were great hosts! They let the first group watch the second group trying to escape. All in all, great fun, couldn't recommend more!

Totally engaging, really satisfying and genuinely creepy at times! BRILLIANT FUN. I love Escape Rooms, I've been to a bunch of them, but this is one of the most well thought out, best designed and most entertaining evenings of the lot. I CANNOT RECOMMEND it highly enough. It's fun, cryptic (but not too hard so that you waste ages on clues that only Rain Man could solve) and really spooky. However, I am a wimp and could handle the scares so don't let that put you off. Honestly, it was just a brilliant fun. We played with five which felt like a great number but I can see how all group sizes would get a kick out of this. Book now...

Birthday Event. This wasn't my first time playing. I had played 3 games before this, but my 5 other friends had never played before. Well designed game. Added edge of suspense and horror, which not all escape games have. The game was challenging but fun. There was also a lot of unique media and design that I have never seen before. Team gave a good service. Resolved a small issue after a few emails. However, the venue is quite small, which meant that we had originally got sent away when arrived on time. To a certain degree, the difficulty is slightly frustrating as it feels as though its not completeable without hints. With that being said, I was more than happy to take the small pointers to keep us going. Overall, it was enjoyable. All my friends liked the new experience and I was impressed having played a few before hand.

Probably the best, most immersive escape room in London. As a seasoned escape room goer, I had high expectations for SecretStudios after being recommended to it by a friend. I was not let down. This escape room was the best one I've done in London out of a good handful. It was a truly immersive experience and the puzzles were well made and challenging. The production value was also extremely high and way more impressive than other escape rooms. We did the "impossibly difficult" level and just escaped with 7 minutes to spare. 5 stars. Highly recommend.

Properly brilliant escape room..... This was our first escape room experience. We had very little idea what to expect. Josh, our brilliant GamesMaster set us at ease and quickly laid out the rules without giving any real help, and we were off. I can't give anything away, but our whole team were engaged and enthralled the whole way through and the feeling of achievement when we escaped with few seconds to spare was immense. We had to go to the pub immediately afterwards to discuss and process an intense 60 minutes over several pints. If you'd given me a chance, I would have gone again immediately afterwards! Great fun, really well organised and supported - loved it and can't wait to try one again.

Fantastic fun. As a group of old uni friends we wanted a night out with a difference rather than the usual meal or boozing so we tried Secret Studio as our first escape game. We had a brilliant time. Olly and team made us feel very welcome and totally set the mood. The challenges were original and fun. Great background story and entertaining clues. Would definitely recommend.
Really cool!. We loved Secret studio, and would love to so the extra difficult one later. Not sure if you want to go? Do it! Can't imagine anyone would regret doing this.

Great fun - best one yet!. This was the 3rd escape room challenge I have been on and I must say that it was the most enjoyable in terms of having fun. I thought it was very original and well planned out too. Loved it and definitely recommend to all!!!

Great fun. This was our first Escape room, and we thoroughly enjoyed it. The whole experience from booking until we escaped was very well planned and thought out. The back ground story was great and solving the clues was good fun. We needed a few prompts to help us alone the way but managed to escape with minutes to spare. We were all on a real high for the rest of the afternoon.
Wicked!. What an experience. Absolutely superb. If I didn't know how to solve the clues I would definetly go again! Thanks guys for a memorable visit

Fun and Engaging :D. This was my first experience going to an escape room and have to say was blow away by how enjoyable it was :) Highly recommend Secret Studio's escape room for anyone thinking of trying one.

Amazing!!!. I have done numerous escape rooms all over the world and this is by far the best so far. Really creative and interesting...other rooms can be quite 'samey'! Would definitely recommend, really good fun and well thought out! Thanks guys

Great fun for the family. A really creative and fun escape room. We were six and failed to escape in the target time. Quite a tough one but really good fun and full of surprises. Remember to take your reading specs - I forgot mine and struggled at times!

OMG . This was brilliant. We did two of these escapes in London on the same weekend and I'm so pleased we did this one second it topped off our weekend nicely. From the reception you get when you rock up you know it's going to be good. I'll not throw any spoilers but it did not disappoint! We did manage to escape with 2mins left to spare. The guy who looked after us were great. Throughly enjoyed it. Would do it again but that would be pointless ;)

Great experience!. We did this escape game with six people. Some of us had done an escape game before, while for others it was the first time. But it didn't matter - we all had a great time! We escaped with seven and a half minutes to spare, but did need a few hints along the way. The puzzles were challenging but not ridiculously hard. My girlfriend was worried it would be terrifying, but even she thoroughly enjoyed herself! Would definitely recommend this one.
Nice challenge. Went with 4 friends and really enjoyed it. It was a good challenge and something different. Would definitely recommend it.
Great from start to escape. The guys had us laughing from the moment we buzzed in!! Will not be the last escape room we do. Well done Zo and staff keep up the great work!!!

Excellent, fun and innovative.. This was lots of fun. Friends have done quite a few immersive escape games but this one really stood out for its rich use of different types of media and the variety and depth and tasks and puzzles. The background story was excellent and there are some really good twists, turns and surprises. You know you're onto a good thing when you forget you're playing a game, and this is was very much the case with Secret Studio. I'm coming back again with a different set of friends. Really good value and great location - lots of of eateries and pubs nearby.

"Fantastic!!". I went to London to celebrate my 50th birthday and wanted to do something completely different with my friends. After reading all the great reviews I couldn't wait to go and it certainly didn't disappoint.We had a fantastic time from start to finish. As soon as you walk into the room you feel like you've gone back in time and then the fun starts with so many different kinds of puzzles and challenges to find the next clue.We left on such a high and was talking about it for days. I only hope there is another room soon as I cant wait to go back.

Brilliant fun. My first try at an escape game and I loved it! Was fantastic, cant say too much otherwise it would spoil yeh puzzles and clues. All I can say is you must try this! It's so much fun and really outs your brain into challenges. Great fun. The staff here are super!
such fun. The second escape game we've done. Highly recommend. Never known an hour fly by . Lots of fun .. We had a blast.
Great fun!. Went in a group of 5 in February 2016. I thought it was well organised and thought out. Challenging and fun with great staff!
Fantastic experience. Enjoyable, fun, lots of laughs. Very friendly and accommodating to change in group numbers.Would recommend to all. Solved with only 1.49 mins to spare!

Loved it!. I went here with two of my friends and I have to say it was an amazing experience. We managed to escape in an hour and 9 seconds, which was not bad, considering how useless we were. Staff are friendly and very helpful. Its very different, I can guarantee you will enjoy it! If you want to try something new in London, this is it! I will definitely be going back for the sequel!! Can't wait!
Amazing. Plenty of clues given if we needed them, but not too many. The game was so much fun. All of my friends loved it too.

Both fun and scary. This escape room was very fun, it is very much possible to reach the end with the help of staff now and then. highly recommended!! should be noted that there are a few surprises and at times can be quite scary.

Excellent Service! See my london escape room recommendations below. This was my 10th escape room and I was starting to feel a bit tired of the same format but this really changed it up with a few twists and surprises. This is definitely one of my favourites and the customer service was excellent as they helped organise for my friends to join us in the escape room as a surprise.For those of you looking for escape room recommendations. My favourites so far in no particular order are:- Secret studio- Mystery cube- Cluequest blacksheep- Time runFor either a small group (3 people only) or beginners I would recommend cluequest but all of these were great with unique story lines and fantastic clues. For larger groups I would recommend mystery cube as there was a lot to do in the room at the same time. If you want to get completely immersed in the story, secret studio or time run are fantastic. I would also recommend enigma escape, cluequest plan 52 and if you don't mind being fed lots and lots of clues, hinthunt.

Well thought out. Lots of clues and plenty of help and hints along the way if needed, to make you feel like you're making progress! Different types of puzzles to keep it interesting and a few surprises.We really got into it and had a lot of fun, I would definitely come back to take part in Secret Studio's next project.

Good fun for a group activity. I booked this for my girlfriend's birthday and we went with some of her friends. it was good fun. It was simple but well organised and just worked. We managed to escape with 5 minutes spare.

A fantastic way to spend an evening. I went recently with a group of friends to Secret Studio, and had an absolutely fantastic time. The background story to the experience is great, and presented very well. I found the puzzles in Secret Studio to be challenging and very entertaining. At times it can be a bit difficult to solve to the puzzles, especially under time pressure, but the moderator is very good at providing the odd clue where needed to keep things moving along.All in all, I found Secret Studio highly enjoyable, and I'd recommend it to anybody looking for a fun and interesting activity for a group of friends.

Absolutely amazing!!. This is my 3rd escape rooms and this has been the best! I've done Clue Quest & Hidden Rooms both were really good but this topped it, simply for a couple of surprises along the way. We didn't quite make it out (1min 16 over) but we were so close & it was so obvious when we realised what we struggled with. It was a little hard to find the building but I think that added to the experience of the game. Elliott was really good at welcoming us, I was a bit worried what we'd let ourselves into when we got into the building but the game was amazing! Would definitely recommend this to others. Thanks for a brilliant day

Best family day out!!. Has the most amazing time, out games master made the experience brilliant. It was so exhilarating and loads of fun. I want to do another one already! Amazing day out would recommend to colleagues, friends and even a good date location!!

Absolutely amazing!. Went here for a friend's 21st surprise birthday tonight and we all had such a wonderful time. The staff are great and everything was really well run. I would definitely recommend this place.

Great experience and very friendly staff. I was planning some fun experience for a group of 5 on Chinese New Year's outing to London--and we seem to be very fortunate to pick the Secret Studio. Usually room escape games are quite rigid in terms of schedule, but the staff was obviously trying to make it as flexible as possible. Although leaving two hours in advance (normally the train takes 1 hour from Cambridge to London) we were still, very unexpectedly, stuck somewhere in between due to train breakdown and arrived nearly 2 hours late, but the staff was very kind to shift our slot to the afternoon. As for the game experience, it was absolutely fantastic. We were amazed by the level of complexity and logic; and the location is very convenient too (right at the centre of town).

Great fun, good quality experience!. From start to completion I found this experience an enjoyable one. The scenario was well thought out and had different levels of challenging puzzles to solve and items to discover. It encouraged team work through investigation and physical co-operation tasks that were fun. My personal likes were the use of the vintage typewriter and machinery that added to the context and setting. There was laughter, bewilderment and excitement as we made our way through the challenge and I would certainly recommend this activity!

Amazing experience! So much fun!. I loved this experience. I've never done an escape room before, and being quite skeptical I was really surprised. We had clues when we needed it but it was also quite cryptic. There are a few spooky moments. I had so much fun and would definitely recommend it without a doubt.

One of the best in London!. I've played over 30 different escape rooms, and this is one of the greater ones: boasting great integration of story, perfect build up of suspense and a wonderful variety of challenges. Very recommended!

Tense, stimulating and rewarding. Was lucky enough to take part in the Secret Studio for my stag do. It was immediately atmospheric and very enjoyable, with tons of great little touches and details that really added to the experience. My only real gripe is that, while the plot was full of twists and turns, there was very little explanation as to what had really happened. It was tremendous fun but a bit of exposition after successfully completing it would be the cherry on top.

Really fun. We went to take part in the secret studio yesterday as two couples. We had a such a fab time, we managed just about to crack it and we had work as a team, it was good fun and the hosts were 9fun guys! Can't wait for the sequel I would defiantly return and highly recommend.
So much fun. This gane was so much more fun than I thought it would be. Truly fantastic night, absolutely loved it.
Challenging and fun . Fantastic location with fun puzzles and atmosphere. Highly recommended. Best of its kind in London or anywhere!

Immersive, Puzzling, Great fun!!. The studio is tucked away down a side street, only a stones throw from the British Museum. From the moment you ring the buzzer the fun begins. We descended in to the basement and things started to get, well slightly creepy...After a brief intro our team got to work and started solving the mystery. The puzzles were great fun and really varied, they also involved some cool vintage props (I won't spoil the surprises). With only a couple of helpful hints we did manage to escape, it was a close shave! I've not done an escape room before but it reminded me a bit of all the best parts of the crystal maze. I was with a team of work colleagues and we all really enjoyed working together to solve the mysteries of the Secret Studio. Definitely recommended!

Fun fun fun!!!. I visited Secret Studio with a group of colleagues a few days ago. We had a GREAT time before, during and even after the game (taking photos!). The game was brilliantly set up, keeping us fully engaged throughout the hour! As a new member of a team, it gave me a great opportunity to get to know my new colleagues. If you are looking for something off the beaten track, whether you live in London or are visiting, definitely give Secret Studio a go!

Great fun!. We had a great time at the Secret Studio this afternoon. Excellent puzzles to solve and good hosts. Perfect location in central London, easy to find. We would recommend this escape room to adults of all ages.

Fantastic Personalised Experience. I've done several escape rooms with my girlfriend and Secret Studio delivers everything and more. For my girlfriend's birthday I wanted a personalised experience, and the Secret Studio guys were so enthusiastic about my request. Without revealing anything about the room I was able to give my girlfriend a fantastic surprise which really made her birthday.About the room itself: some rooms, in my experience, seem to try to challenge you by giving really abstract clues in random places that don't really make sense, so you just have to rely on the hints provided and I'm not even just talking about the ones at the bottom of TripAdvisor here. Secret Studio wasn't like that; the clues made logical sense, the puzzles were fun, and the room had one of the best atmospheres I've experienced, as well as a completely original quirk too. A good way to test if a room is any good is if you make it out just in time - if you're really struggling, or you make it out in too much time, there's something wrong - and Secret Studio really fit the bill here; we made it out in just enough time to give us the tension and a great feeling of accomplishment.One other thing of note - this room is really handily located just by Holborn station in Central London. There are other great rooms out there, but you'll often be walking 20 minutes from the station to get to the location.All in all, I would absolutely recommend Secret Studio, both for the room and for the great levels of service these guys provided. Looking forward to seeing what they come up with next!

Most fun I've had in ages!. Visited Secret Studio for a fun team building evening with my team. This was my first escape room experience and I have to say I am now worried that I have been spoiled for the others as Secret Studio was just awesome. I was totally absorbed in the story from the start and the time just flew by as we worked together to solve the clues. Love the twists and turns in the story and the unexpected surprises and it was a great way to break the ice with some of the new people in the team. Fabulous!!

Best team activity - EVER!. We decided to go and try Secret Studios as something different for a team activity. I was slightly apprehensive about it as I had never heard of the idea before but I absolutely loved it! The experience starts as soon as you ring the doorbell and our quizmaster Oscar was fantastic. He explained everything really well and off we went. The attention to detail in the set-up was so good and everyone really got in to it - so much so we continued to discuss the clues after the game had finished! I would definitely recommend this as a team activity to everyone!!
Nail Biting Excitement. Wow! What a great place to go with family, finding the clues and solving the mystery was something new and fun to do.Can't recommend this highly enough.

So much fun!. Went earlier this week after work and have to say it's one of the best team building activities I've been part of. Really enjoyed the various tasks and the amount of effort and attention to detail that the team have gone too. The time went by so quick (in a good way) and would love to do it again! Bring on the sequel!

Something different. Was a good experience with a number of cool aspects to what the guys have created. However, without giving too much away, the game required the 'gamemaster' to be walking on the outside of the room and obviously they were manipulating things within the room depending at what point in the game we were. This was a downer on the experience as you could hear them very clearly and thus 'expected' things to happen. Something to improve on maybe? Overall though good effort and worth a visit!

What. A. Night!. So, I went to Secret Studio with my parents and my girlfriend. Can honestly say it was so much more challenging than I anticipated. Which is awesome. Puzzle player or not, all who enter will love the game. An epic adventure that brings out the detective in you. Will be back for the sequel!

One of the best!. This escape game is one of the best, and most frustrating I've played.I will tell you nothing here, I couldn't possibly spoil it for you, but GO, GO, GO. It's fabulous!The atmosphere is one of the best. The games and puzzles are well constructed and infuriating.. Not the place to take a nervous player, or a particularly new player, but if it's your second game and you want a great experience, this is the one for you.I'll be booking in again very soon.

Team building with a difference . After having experienced (and loved!) Secret Studio with friends, I returned for a corporate team building event (not that the experience is in anyway 'corporate'!). As I was familiar with the game I got to watch the rest of the team, observing how the team communicates and works together. It was terrific fun and is a fantastic way of removing any hierarchy in a team. We had so much fun and learnt a little bit along the way as well. I would highly recommend this as an opportunity for teams - new or old - to get together and solve a fun mystery! The Secret Studio team are wonderful and made it a very warm and personal experience. Easily the best thing we have done together as a team for a while!

Absolutely fantastic - best escape game I've done. I did this as part of a work team event and it was brilliant. The storyline running throughout it is very well crafted, the challenges and puzzles are great fun and the twist at the end got us all. Big thanks to our Games Master (Oscar) for guiding us through with just the right amount of explanation and nudging.Having done other escape games before, I can't recommend this one highly enough.

Great Fun!. This was my first escape game and didn't know what to expect beforehand but thoroughly enjoyed myself and would recommend it to everyone! The whole set up is really well thought out and the staff were super cool! Many thanks to our game master Olly!

Spooky mystery evening. Great fun, but with moments of genuine alarm! You'll certainly need to have your wits about you to escape in time. The attitude of the staff all helps to set the (slightly scary) atmosphere. Very much recommended.

The Great Escape.. I went with a group of friends after work. From the moment we arrived the experience began with a superb host (in character) giving us the brief. I've never had an hour go so quickly as it did, The interaction with props, our host and each other was great and I could easily see this working for a work team building exercise. It was a frantic ending trying to beat the clock but even though we failed I REALLY enjoyed it. If like me you enjoyed the Adventure Game TV program you should enjoy this. Just don't expect to bump into Uncle.

An immersive and exciting experience!. Well thought out puzzle which requires teamwork to solve, lots of fun and a few frights to be had along the way! Staff were excellent and made the whole experience run smoothly, highly recommended.

Great mystery experience!. Really well orchestrated staff members and convincing set, i really felt as if I was part of a real mystery solving expedition. Would have really liked to come with colleagues as I think Secret studio would be good to boost relations and bring a team togetherAll in all a great experience - would do again if I could forget the clues!

Extremely well thought out and lots of fun!. Everything from start to finish was highly enjoyable and a very friendly member of staff to accompany it. Highly recommend for anyone who enjoys a mystery!
Amazing!!!. What an amazing experience! Thinking out of the box and teamwork is a must to solve the mystery in time! Absolutely loved it!

funny experience with friends. That secret escape from studio was a perfect activity to do during our visit to London. I have never done anything like this before. Staff is young, very friendly and you really feel welcome at this place. Before we arrived, some of us were worried about the whole thing and the difficulty of the puzzles. But afterwards we were all euphoric and excited about that what happened. Although we were not native english, we managed to escape the Secret Studio :)I liked it very much and definitely recommend this game here!! Especially the staff was very friendly and very professional as well!Thanks for that adventure ! :)

Excellent!. I've done lots of escape games and this one is up there at the top, very professional with some great puzzles and a strong narrative (which I find often gets lost in other ones) all the way through. Excellent communication of clues at the right times, they can see and hear you, so very slick which really helps to make for a fun game.

Excellent family Christmas present. None of my family had done anything like this before, so we weren't sure what to expect. In fact, my Dad wasn't very keen on the whole idea before we arrived. However (!) once we got going, we all LOVED it. There was something for everyone in the room. My parents are in their 50's, I'm in my 30's and by brother is in his 20's. We all work in different ways and handle challenges differently. That's why this was so perfect. Some challenges were mental, some were physical. It tested us all in different (fun) ways. There were some challenges that involved all four of us working together, literally! Don't worry if this doesn't instantly seem " your thing", or if you are reluctant about the puzzle element of it. You can select the slightly easier option, or the harder version. The other great thing about this is that your team gets to work on its own in the room. I really liked the fact that we didn't have to play the game with strangers. The small team who run the experience are there to help you, and they are really nice!Completely recommend this experience!(I've had to select an option below for "what sort of visit was this?"... I've had to select FAMILY - TEENS... but I think you would need to check the age restrictions, if any.)
Fantastic. Fantastic activity to do. Never done anything like this before. Would definitely recommend. Staff are really friendly. We went their for our daughters birthday. Was a great surprise!

Top Notch Family Fun!!!. Excellent escape game, best I have done! Well propped without it being too difficult to escape (at the right level). We took our niece and nephew who both loved it - think they have a new found hobby! If this place expands into a new room, we will be back, no doubt!Thanks guys!
Brilliant!!!!!. This was the second 'escape' game I've done and it was AMAZING! Such good fun we are still buzzing hours after. Lovely guys who were running it too.
Great fun!. We had a brilliant time trying to escape, great theatre and adrenaline rush for this challenge. Awesome idea for group activity. I would highly recommend this to anyone!
Absolutely brilliant! Had us gripped right to the end!. Great location, great storyline, really helpful colleagues! Would recommend to everyone! Such great fun for adults and teens alike!

Great hour. Great location. Great fun. Great set up
4 of us went whilst having a day out in London for my son's birthday,first one any of us had done,didn't know what to expect,we were put at ease straight away,we had a great time,much better than w e expected, throughly enjoyed our time there,

Secret Studio. The experience was great fun, fab family activity! We weren't quite sure what to expect, having never done anything like this before but we thoroughly enjoyed working together to solve the mystery. Callum and the team were great and made the whole experience good fun. Would highly recommend to anyone, great activity to do with family or friends in London.

A brilliant escape game in the heart of London. I organised a group of 5 of us to have a go at the Secret Studio escape game in late December and it was a fantastic experience. I've done a couple of other games in London, and this is probably one of the most professional, imaginative and slick games I've played. I don't want to spoil the experience for others, but there are a few surprising moments throughout the hour!! We managed to finish with 11 seconds to spare....! A great way to spend a couple of hours. There's also a pub next door if you need a drink/food before or afterwards that's pretty decent.

Fantastic experience. Our group of six all had a fantastic time at Secret Studio. It was full of intrigue from the start, which quickly built into an incredibly exciting, challenging, and fun event. Really well organised and thought through, with some very clever puzzles. The Secret Studio team were brilliant and directed the event superbly. The atmosphere it created was amazing. An incredible event, brilliantly produced, and highly recommended.

Inventive, immersive, memorable. Took my daughter for a birthday treat (age 15) and 4 of her mates and fair to say they are still talking about it and are now looking for other ones to do. Very clever game solving clues, riddles and codes with a couple of unexpected twists. You are prompted and encouraged if you are on the right track with the aim (in our case) of completing all the tasks in 60 mins or under - I'm glad to say we did it which gave the girls a real sense of achievement. Glad I booked

Absolutely awesome!! . The best thing we have done in ages! Very clever scenario and clues that really make you think and work as a team whilst having great fun. We have been talking about it all night and will no doubt continue to....everyone must try it!! Oscar and team were fab....thank you for making a family day out amazing!!

Great fun!. This was my fifth escape room and it definitely offered something different. Its back story was unique and had some challenges I haven't experienced before. Without giving too much away...there's a great twist at the end. Well worth a visit.

Fantastic night out. This is a really fun and inventive thing to do with a group of friends. Don't have too many drinks first though as you need to keep your wits about you! The theme of the event is fantastic and there is really good attention to detail. The team at Secret Studio 'lock' you in the studio and as you search for clues to find a way out they gently prompt you with advice and tips which tailors the evening to the abilities of the group.Highly recommended.

What a brilliant experience!!. We had a fantastic time doing the family challenge. So absorbing and exciting! All of us had the best time and we're still talking about it now. There is so much to do in the time and it is very clever and the detail was amazing. We smashed in just under the hour - just over a minute to spare!!
Brilliant fun. Don't want to give away too much but this is a really exciting and fun evening which provides the right mixture of suprises, challenges and excitement. Strongly recommend...

Amazing!. This was a really unique and enjoyable experience. It is the first of these escape rooms that we have attempted, so we weren't really sure what to expect. But, the staff were really friendly and the set up was great. There is lots to do throughout and if you get stuck they do give you a couple of hints so you can keep going! Completely recommend.

Fantastic!. We went over Christmas and it was really good fun. I didn't know what to expect but on arrival all the safety aspects were explained and any concerns disappeared. The whole experience was so well done and afterwards we couldn't stop talking about it. It's quite difficult to review it in detail without giving too much away though!

Best escape game!!!. I absolutely loved it, from start to finish. Secret Studio is the 3rd escape game I attend. I started with Hint Hunt last year, game a try to the Escape Room Experience a few months ago and finally booked Secret Studio following on from the great reviews I read on TripAdvisor. I took my parents and boyfriend. I don't regret it and couldn't be more enthusiastic about the whole experience. It's different from the other 2 games I have experienced in that it's unique and the setting, though similar in essence, has a few very enjoyable twists of its own. I won't say more as I don't want to spoil the surprise so just go and see for yourself. There's only one room (you can either choose between 'difficult' or 'impossibly difficult') and they're in the process of getting a second one (I understand it will be an easy one). You've got an hour to get out, it took us just under 53 minutes (showing off I know).Thanks Zo and team, we had a blast!

Great fun. Went for a Christmas family activity; well organised and friendly staff. Original ideas and worth the money as it continued to keep the family entertained! Thoroughly recommended for a good laugh and a bit of competitiveness!

Amazing!. I had no idea what to expect when we visited with friends. It was recommended as a fun thing for my husbands birthday and it exceeded all my expectations.Cleverly designed and created with wonderful attention to detail. I loved every minute and have found it really hard not to tell friends every detail as can't spoil it for them....... A totally brilliant experience......go!!!!

Get right into this. A brilliant, alternative way to spend a couple of hours with mates or work colleagues. It didn't take long for all four of us to get completely immersed in what we were doing. London needs more of these!
MUST DO ACTIVITY. Secret Studio is absolutely amazing!! Truly a team effort as well as everyone solves different bits. Definitely definitely go - many thanks to Oscar the amazing games master.
Great Day. We went for a team Christmas activity and had a great time. The activity was well organised and the staff were very nice. Would visit again!

Fantastically immersive!. Cannot give to much away but this escape room is amazing! Theme, puzzles, challenges and atmosphere. The best yet! We're use to being out in half hour and this one kept us on our toes! Good luck to you and let us know when you change the room and we'll try to get the number one spot :-)
Really fun!. Such a fun time! Totally recommend! We organized the activity as a team building event for work and it was a real success!

One of the best London "Escapes". The concept is excellent, and the thought and passion that has gone into this game is obvious - and some of the equipment used within the game is fantastic.The theatrical atmosphere is very well constructed, and some of the puzzles which, when solved to reveal the next step, are undeniably brilliant...almost to the point of having a "supernatural" feel.This is one of the newer games in London, but has a more "traditional" - or European - feel to it in its creativity. (You never forget your "first" - but this was probably the closest to it that we have found.) A team of 4 is about right for this room, it is a lot of fun, and extremely well run throughout, enabling every team to be treated on their own merits. It is slightly more expensive than the others - but there is only one game running per time (that I am aware of), and when you do it - what turns out to be only couple of pounds extra is more than made up for in concept, content and execution.Highly recommended.
Total blast. Had a a great time, did solve the puzzle, well worth the cash and time. Think adults or it kid would enjoy it
very fun!. A unexpected and fun adventure, unlocking codes and discovering new spaces. A great secret that should be shared with everyone!

Brilliant night out. I wasn't sure what to expect but this was amazing. It was great experiencing this with a group of friends and i would recommend it to anyone who fancies a bit of a challenge and a lot of fun.The organisation and briefing was very well done and I've decided to arrange a trip for my sister as a Christmas present, I loved it so much. Thanks all at Secret Studio.

Thrilling and ingenious. Our group had never done a locked room experience before and were a bit nervous about what to expect. It was just fantastic!! one of the best things we have ever done. We were totally absorbed in the task. So many different puzzles needing different skills, a surprise at every turn,nothing was predictable and we were kept on tenterhooks to the very end. Secret Studio - I wish you had a different room to unlock every week - I would be back like a shot. Have been recommending this to everyone I meet. And special thanks to the uber-cool Oscar our brilliant game master.
So Amazing!. I went with some work friends to the studio and had the best time. Never done anything like this before but i'd recommend it to anyone, had the most fun i've had in a long time!

Amazing. I went to secret studios with my work colleagues for our christmas party and now I'm recommending it to everyone I see. I had never been on any escape experience before but I've become completely hooked and I will be looking to do more in the future. If secret studios create any other games I will be the first one there escaping all over again.
Nice experience. We went to Secret Studio in our company's Christmas day out and we had a lot of fun as a team. Really well produced.

Amazing time. We had an absolutely fantastic afternoon at Secret Studio. They were very friendly (despite an 'incident' with the 'thing' - you'll know what that means once you've done it and once again WE'RE SO SORRY!!) and the whole thing was well organised and well executed.The puzzles were challenging without being difficult for difficulty's sake and I wish I could do it again! Would defeat the point of that though.Anyway 6 20-something guys had a great time and were talking about it all evening. Perfect birthday activity.Thoroughly recommended.

Amazing fun!!. We went to secret studios for a friends birthday and had a brilliant time! Very well organised and such a laugh! Would recommend it to anyone looking for team building or just a good fun night out up town!

Superb!. This was our first escape room experience, and it was excellent fun! It made the perfect work team Christmas surprise. We were given just enough hints to progress at a good pace and the twists were genius. The only trouble will be finding something half as good and original for next year's Christmas do now that the bar has been set so high!

Very well organised and proffessional. I participated in their midtown game. When it first started I was sceptical -however I was soon drawn into the game. As it is a game it would be wrong to say anymore except that try it for yourself- If you enjoy solving clues you will not be disappointed - Excellent!!!

Absolutely brilliant. This was a great hour of fun; the whole set up was very clever and we had a great time. We had such a laugh as well but we cant say much without giving it away so just go and experience it yourselves, you will not be disappointed!

Great Experience!. We decided to go to Secret Studio for a friends 30th birthday. It was an amazing experience, we all managed to work together and work through the very well thought out clues and challenges. Highly recommend to anyone who is looking to try something different in London. Thanks Secret Studio!
Brilliant. This is great for either group of friends, work colleagues or a family group. The tasks are challenging but fun, there is

Great Fun in the heart of London. A group of us recently tried out Secret Studio and it was a fantastic experience. The design of the game and the puzzles involved were very creative and challenging. Unlike some other escape games, a lot of care and attention had gone into creating a believable setting so it felt that you were fully immersed in the story. I would definitely recommend this to others - either as a fun trip with friends or colleagues.

So much fun. I went with a group of 5 and I've done a few escape rooms before, it was one of the best ones I've done! Lots of attention to detail and excellent storyline with lots of surprises. The puzzles are really thinking outside of the box as well. Sometime a bit scary but that added to the atmosphere. Please open another room!

Excellent. This was my first "room escape" adventure and I thoroughly enjoyed it! I am a lover of all kinds of puzzles and was so excited to try something different and this lived up to my expectations. I came with my daughter and her fiancé and we called ourselves Team Optimist as we were aware this might be a serious challenge and it rcertainly equired team effort and plenty of lateral thinking. The task comprised lots of different kinds of challenges from word analysis, code breaking, observations - all kinds - something to keep us on our toes at all times. The room sets were very atmospheric and realistic. All in all it was so much fun. Highly recommended!!

Fantastic Fun. This was enjoyable from start to finish. We came as part of a work team building event. The period design of the room was great with such attention to detail from the props to even the light switches. Our games master gave us encouragement if we were on the right track and helped us keep everything moving. We all had a real laugh and this was a really fun quick moving experience. The clues were all integrated into the rooms design and we really had to work together to get out. It was a great event for team building I would strongly recommend it!

Excellent experience & good team game. This was a present for my 60th birthday and was easily the best of the events planned by my family for the weekend. Great team game, well thought out clues and scenery and, by all accounts, much better than the equivalent Escape Room in Edinburgh. Well done to the team.

Sooooo much fun!!. I visited Secret Studio on a Sunday evening with some friends who were visiting London. None of us had ever done a live escape room before so we were all newbies! We were put at ease from the moment we arrived...everything was explained to us clearly, the rules, etc. without giving away too much about the escape room! Once inside, we had to work through a number of puzzles to escape the room in time...the puzzles were so well thought of and put together. We had an absolutely great time! We weren't sure what to expect at the beginning but by the end we were hooked and can't wait to try another escape room!

Best game puzzle game yet!. As a group of four who had done two games before - ClueQuest and HintHunt - we thought we'd go straight for the Impossibly Difficult option, and managed to complete it first time, being just a few seconds over.We'd agree with the info on the website, it might be tricky for a group of 4-6 to complete this on Impossibly Difficult unless you've done a few similar games before. FYI there's only one puzzle room, so presumably the only difference between the choices of Difficult and Impossibly Difficult is the number of hints you'll get.The group agreed this was definitely the best puzzle game we'd done to date, primarily as there was a MUCH better story line, coupled with a lot more different elements and environments involved than in the other games we had done. It's hard to explain in more detail without spoiling the game so I'll stop there!If another room opens up, we'll definitely be the first ones signing up as this was pure genius! Thanks for the fantastic experience Jo and co! The Awesome Foursome

Nothing is as it seems. Had a great time, tips were perfect - more encouraging that you were on the right lines than giving anything away. No matter what you may initially think, there's lots to do, so split up and keep talking to each other. Very atmospheric.

Great fun!. I have to admit, there were a few moments that were quite scary for me :) since it's a very mystique kind of room :) I'm generally not good with scary things, but apart from this, I have to say: this was great fun! so engaging, and so many interesting puzzles. It's a great way to spend time with your friends! I would highly recommend it! We were 5 girls who managed to go through the quest in 57 minutes. It gave us lots to talk about after this :D

This was great fun!. This is a great escape game! The game is funny and sometimes even a bit scary and the puzzles are really enjoyable and clever. This is good for a team outing, as you need to work together to get out of the room. We had a lot of fun, the hour flew by.

An imaginative and fun escape room, with unexpected twists!. This was a really well-thought out escape room with imaginative, fun puzzles to get the whole team thinking and working together. The storyline was good and there were some unexpected twists which makes it different from other escape rooms! The puzzles were in tune with the story and made the experience really immersive. There were some fun props to play with that you don't get with other escape rooms (but I won't spoil it!) Staff were friendly, helpful and clearly passionate about what they do. Highly recommended - one of the best escape rooms I've done. My team made it out with 42 seconds to spare!
Excellent great fun!. Friendly staff and the game was really good fun, certainly gets you thinking & tests the team work. Overall such a good experience!

Fun and engaging!. We didn't really know what to expect when we turned up at the front door but a thoroughly enjoyable experience was had by all. We were a group of three, which for us worked perfectly. The clues are well thought out and keep you thinking the whole time, building up nicely to a tense finish! The challenges require a good amount of teamwork and individual investigation ensuring everybody is thinking and engaged all the time. We were all smiling the whole time and the 58.5 minutes we had in there felt like 5! It kept us talking about it for the next few days. Oscar was really friendly and hosted the experience perfectly! Highly recommended. - Team Flatfoot.

A lovely experience!. It was such a fun experience, all of us enjoyed it very much. The game is smartly designed and the game master gives useful clues and hints if you are heading towards the wrong direction, so that you won't be stuck on the same problem forever. It requires a lot of thinking, talking and exchange of information between the group members. It is truly an amazing team work experience and extremely rewarding once you successfully escape from the game! Absolutely loved it and I would recommend it to everybody.

An evening with colleagues with a difference. This was a great evening. we went in two groups and the second group got to watch the first fumbling around in the dark, blissfully ignorant. the puzzles are tricky enough to require the odd clue, and the pace was excellent, getting very tense toward the end. A really worthwhile experience, excellently put together and executed.A great time had by all. do it, you won't regret it.

Brilliant . This was brilliant - the best thing we have one for ages (was even more fun than the Dynamo concert we went to the night before!). The whole idea - from start to finish - is extremely well thought out and executed. Very impressive.

Brilliant experience!!. We were group of 5 friends, decided to come here due to great review here and convenient location! The reception is a bit small (just like normal office reception really) but the game itself is really cool and involving quite a lot "vintage" stuffs (sorry i won't tell you what exactly they are) and some spooky effects that freaked one of my girlfriends throughout the game (or maybe she was overreacting?!). Overall it is definitely worth the money as the game master was very good and the game was well-designed. The game is, as the website said, quite difficult therefore if you never been to an escape game before you might get stuck and terrible things might happen if you couldn't complete it within 60 minutes....
AMAZING. Went for my 16th birthday - was brilliant. Slightly scary but appropriate for halloween, I guess. Go and do it, wish I could go there again -_-
Bloody fantastic. Amazing awesome wonderful - do this an incredible hour spent with the family doing something we were all engaged in thank u xx

Team United wins!!!. Had a brilliant time with my husband and teenage daughter. We worked together better in that hour than the whole of the rest of the weekend put together and didn't stop talking about it for days afterwards. Was great fun and Oscar played his part really well.

Go and do it - it's brilliant. We came as a team of three and the scene was set from the moment we arrived with the secret password to get into the building.Without giving too much away, it's a brilliant and exciting experience, you get just enough hints to keep the game moving and the puzzles are really varied, so there is something for everyone. You really do need to look at everything in the room to solve all the puzzles, we made it out with only a few minutes to spare.

Fun with friends. Friendly games master to welcome us. Purpose of game well explained. A challenge but a fun challenge. There were only 3 of us and we survived. Lovely way to spend an hour. Would definitely recommend to anyone.
A Brilliant Afternoon. We weren't sure what we were letting ourselves in for, but we had such a fun time - would definitely do something like this again - brilliant!

Great fun. Set in a great location. The hosts were really friendly and welcoming, explaining in detail all that is involved. The quiz was lots of fun, imaginative and great fro team work. Really recommended!

Unique!. Secret Studio is an exciting and unique experience that you and your group will love! I went with a group that each member has completed multiple escape rooms and we all agreed this one has elements none of us have faced before! Everyone had a great time, the puzzles were fun and the story was great! Certainly a highlight to our trip in London!

A brilliant team building experience and great fun too!. We were looking for a team building exercise but also wanted to do something away from the day job when we thought to give Secret Studio a try. It was a total success. The storyline was engaging with some fiendish challenges, very soon after the door closed we were working together and having great fun at the same time. In the day we run social work services in a London borough so are used to stress and times things can get fraught. Secret Studio offered some total escapism but really justified in the way it brought us together. It is clear that the team who created Secret Studio have spent time to make sure the technology and decor come together to deliver a really memorable experience. Please open another room soon.

Brilliant 50th birthday treat!. Our group of 6 friends of 20+ years duration enjoy any excuse for a celebration and our visit to Secret Studio for Jane's 50th is definitely one of our best outings to date ... Can't recommend it highly enough, perfect fun experience for all ages, and very good value!

Really Fun and Exciting. We went with as a group of 4 and none of us had done an "escape the room" type game. The story behind the escape was well thought out and provided us with plenty of laughs for the journey home. Could not recommend this enough!! It was brilliant

I always wanted to be Crystal Maze.... Loved every second, such a good laugh. Perfect for friends, family or a work event - get every body to work together. Brilliantly devised, had us screaming, laughing, running.. Be part of the secret! Really great staff too, from start to finish a great experience.

Great totally different experience, well worth a visit. As first time escapees this has been a brilliant experience. Not only was the game interesting, exciting and well thought out, the guys that put this together were extremely professional and made it great fun. Big up to the ZoMaster and also thanks to David. Think we're gonna be addicted now to this sort of event. Cheers everyone for a great afternoon!
Great night out. Our girls night was such a treat, thank you!!!This was very well organised and super hards - we solved it all just in time.

Worth a Visit. I went to Secret Studios with 2 friends. You arrive at a secret location about 5 minutes walk from a tube station and have to give a password to enter a building.The game started with the games master showing us a story which was a bit weird and was quickly forgotten as soon as you're in the game. There was plenty to do and a few cool new ideas compared to most escape but the puzzles did not make sense to the storyline.Overall a good addition to the London Escape rooms. Worth a visit

Great fun and laugh!. First time we all did an escape room and the experience was amazing from the start until the end. Would definitely recommend it to anyone who wants to have a great time out with friends and have a good laugh! Customer service was great and were really nice explaining everything and making sure we were having a good time :)

Fun and engaging. This is one of the best escape rooms I have done to date. Basically without giving too much away the story is based around a murder. You have to work your way through by working out puzzles to solve the mystery. Sometimes some of the puzzles need all of you to work on it at the same time. There is more than one room that you get to experience and solve clues in. Its all very retro. If you ever get stuck with any of the puzzles then Oscar is on hand to help and guide you just ask him a question and you will see his typed up response on a monitor. He also praises members of the team or the whole group if you are doing particularly well. We escaped the room in 57 minutes. I highly recommend to anyone that loves escape rooms, a good story and retro items.

One of the best escape games in London. We went in a group of 6 for a friend's leaving do. Cannot recommend this game enough. Two of us have done quite a few escape games (eg cluequest, hint hunt, escapeland plus some abroad) but this is definitely amongst one of the best. The hosts are amazing, really get you into the game, the props are amazing and a great storyline that flows. Without giving anything away, it goes to another level and has so many things that none of the other escape games have. We all had such a great time, keep up the good work and can't wait til you have another room! Thanks again.

EXCELLENT FUN, GREAT CHALLENGE. If you love a challenge and enjoy working as a team this is a must for an excellent way of having a fun time in London. Take an hour and a half to do something completely different. You will be so glad you did.

Enjoyable and great customer service. We originally booked for four people but a fifth person came available at the last minute and they let us wait for the for fifteen minutes. The game was well thought out with a good use of visual effects and a well constructed storyline. There was a glitch with the computer at some point which took about ten minutes to fix - this did not affect the enjoyment of the experience as they added on the lost time and in addition offered a full refund. Great customer service, would definitely recommend!

Excellent, creative and fun!. Out of all escape rooms we've been to, this is the best one. The effects are the most creative, the equipment very impressive, and the puzzles fun and clever.If you didn't go yet, run!!! :)))

Something for everyone!. Fantastic experience. This was our third escape game and by far and away the best. Amazing mixture of old and new technologies, constant surprises and plenty to keep everyone involved... The clues were perfect - it was difficult but not impossible. I can't tell you more, no spoilers...JUST GO!

Like being a kid again. This was such a fun and unique experience. From the moment we got to the door until the moment we left we were completely immersed in our new roles. If like me you're jumpy or easily scared this is especially thrilling. It reminded me of childhood games where everything was staked on completing your mission.It's also wonderful spending an hour exploring and being inquisitive and using logic to unfold the mystery.
Unexpectedly amazing.. A rollercoaster of intense intelligent and collaborative fun. We went in as a group of 4 and left more satisfied and excited than we could have ever imagined.

Excellent. I must say that the experience was most excellent.. After a few seconds our group really got into the role and had an amazing time. I would certainly recommend it for a fun 1 hour that is different !

Secret Studio - Room Escape. Everyone of us had a fun, challenging time when we recently visited the excellent Secret Studio located in Central London. The staff were very friendly and it was obvious that a lot of time, money and effort had gone into providing this stimulating activity. We are still talking about our trip and wouldn't hesitate to recommend a visit to Secret Studio. It's something you'll never forget :)Team - Go For It

Get your cogs turning!. This was my first ever room escape and I love every second! The beautifully designed space takes you back in time - each prop, sound & visual effect creates a very distinctive world you are excited to explore.Our games master Zo was great - informative, professional & funny.The game itself is just the right level of hard - you have to work for it but the rewards of solving the clues are so worth it.I shall be telling everyone about Secret Studios!Zita (Team: The Dudes)

One of the best. Seret Studio's creator's come from a theatre background... and you can tell.This is a really good escape room. It's one of the more expensive, but it's worth it. The props, clues and puzzles are well thought out and original, and I think this one is branching out a bit from the traditional escape room format and trying something new, and it really works!It's a challenge as well, my team completed in 59m 47s! If you give it a try, you won't be disappointed!

60 minutes of adrenaline and fun!. I can't recommend 'Secret Studio" enough! It's 60 minutes of adrenaline and fun! We laughed, we got scared, we got excited then anxious and we almost didn't want it to end.It was my first time in a room escape game, and I had the best time ever. Brilliant atmosphere and art department contribute to making it a very unique experience. A must!

An absolute must visit. I went with my partner, and three grown up children and it was an absolute brilliant time. Hard enough to keep us on our toes but not so hard you want to give up. Best 60 ish minutes I have ever spent.

Absolutely the best one ever!. My family and I have played a few different room escapes now, this being our 4th and it was by far the best! The puzzles within the room as well as the back story makes it so enjoyable, every twist made it even better. Couldn't recommend this more highly.

This is the best we've done so far!!. if you are an avid fan of escape rooms, this is a must! the atmosphere, the props, the plot, the suspense! fun, clever, exciting, perfect! and Oscar is the best game master of all....don't miss it! Team LikiLiki24!

Brilliant fun!. We have done several escape games before and this was at least as good if not more so! It incorporated different things we have not experienced so could not recommend it highly enough. We are hoping Josh and his team develop more games in the future for us to try. (We are a family with adult offspring, not teenagers - no category applicable on Tripadvisor.)
one hour of fun. Had a really fun hour for a friends hen do, woke us up and gave us some good conversation! Really good structure and story to the game

Fantastic fun. This was my first room escape challenge and now it certainly won't be my last! We were warmly greeted by the staff who explained the challenge and the story behind the challenge. The design and decoration was very well done and the puzzles themselves were excellent. I can't wait for them to release more games so I can return!

Simply amazeballs!!. Think you've seen everything London has to offer? Think again. I went to Secret Studio not knowing what to expect and came out not knowing how to top the previous hour. The game is an absolute thrill from start to finish, and the people that run it are charming and wonderful too. I just wish I could do it again!

Great inquisitive fun........ The 3 of us had a great time. A well structured and challenging game with a constant element of suspense! Will definitely visit Oscar again once their next game is ready for release. In summary; definitely worth attending.......
Great day out. Went for a birthday event in a group and had a great time. The staff where very friendly and the location is convenient.

Absolutely brilliant time !!. From the moment we arrived the fun and thrill of it all started. Our quiz master Oscar was so brilliant. He told us what to expect and a few tips and he said he would be helping and giving advice as needed. I wont give anything away but this really is a must do in London. Something different and good for all the family. You wont believe how quick an hour can go and with 3 minutes to go I did not think we would escape... But we did it. Hopefully this 'secret' studio wont be secret for much longer, everyone should experience it!! Fantastic games-masters.

Great team building activity. Came here with a team from work, really well organised experience that set the scene from the moment you rang the doorbell. The quizmasters enhance the experience and provide support without detracting from the dynamics within our team.

Secret "GREAT"studio. Oscar adds to your experience with the secret password to get into the place and then you head into the world of make believe ,where things do not always seem right.I can not recommend this enough,I have been to hint hunt and found out that this is a more enjoyable experience ,it could be a thing that we completed it.With the time ticking and the puzzles are confusing at times and then bloody obvious when you find out why what is where and why this does that.Parking is hard around this area with permit during the week,but we went at the weekend and found a place in Bedford place.The NCP close by 24 pounds for 4 hours so beware .Lets hope that this venture is a success and that the men hold another event and I am already looking forward to it Well worth well done .The only clue is the hour goes so quick and get all the clues in the right order

Amazing!. Highly Recommend Secret Studio! We had great fun! The puzzles are original, well designed and fit into the story. The whole experience is very unique and exciting. There are fun twists through out the game. The game master did a great job giving directions and keeping us on the right track. Will definitely go again if they developed a new room!!

Great experience!. It was a great start to a hen's party! I'd never participated in one before and I didn't know what to expect but it was lots of fun and provided lots of laughs! The concept is very well thought out and the props used were great! I'd definitely recommend a visit with a group of friends or work colleagues!

Another Room Escape hit in London!. As part of a team of tried and tested room escapers (with several under our belt) I was drawn to Secret Studio by the theme (no spoilers here) and it didn't disappoint. This is one of the newer escape games in the capital but it already works seamlessly and there's enough of a challenge in the puzzles to keep even the most avid of room escapers feeling pushed. There are some lovely little surprises/shocks too which put a fun twist on some of the usual room escape elements, and I particularly liked that at least one of the challenges really means the whole team has to work together. Highly recommended as great fun in a brilliant central location. We'll definitely be keeping an eye out for Secret Studio to come up with new rooms! Thanks Oscar!
Brilliant fun!. This is a great activity to do with friends and family. It kept us on our toes and provided lots of laughs! It is really well run and we thoroughly recommend it!!

Great fun!. The game was well thought out, kept us all entertained and there were plenty of shocks in store to keep us on our toes! We went for a friend's birthday and it was a great small group activity to do. We had a lot of fun and if I didn't now know how to escape I would definitely go again. Once the game for repeat visitors is finished I'm definitely returning! The gamesmaster and team were friendly, helpful and really added to the whole experience.

Fun team activity with work colleagues!. Having read previous reviews from other customers I was quite excited to try Secret Studio, and we had chose this escape game as it was very close to our office. Although this place is still establishing itself, we were very impressed with the game and the story line was great and well thought out. The props used were well fitted with the theme of the game and nothing was done cheaply. However, we did feel that there weren't as many puzzles to solve and things to find as another escape game we've tried, but if there were more we probably wouldn't have escaped on time.Our games master was brilliant and really added to the overall enjoyment of the experience.Myself and my colleagues had a really good time and can't wait for Secret Studio to create a new escape room as we would definitely come back!

The best attraction I have been to in London. . Highly recommend Secret Studio. Visited today as a group of 4 with friends and had such a good time. I don't want to give too much away and spoil it for others but it was brilliant and great fun. We weren't set-up to fail - the level of challenge was just about right and we very very nearly completed the 'difficult' task in the set time - 4 seconds over. Staff are professional and have the interests of you having a great time at heart. We were a group ranging from 28-36 years and none of us were disappointed.

The poor Mrs Stokes!. Visited on 5th August 2015 Having done an escape room before in Hungary, I knew kind of what to expect. Saying that, this escape room was completely different, and having done another one since I can say it is unique! It really was a great hour, and we did escape with just 7 and a half minutes to spare! Without giving too much away, there were moments where our hearts were racing and we were apprehensive to proceed!I would definitely recommend this room and will be returning when secret studio have developed their next room! I'd even go as far to say that maybe you should attempt the extremely difficult version of the room that secret studio offer!

Great Birthday present for my husband. I was recommend to visit the Secret Studios by a friend as I was struggling with ideas for my husbands birthday & wanted something different. We have never done anything like this before so it was all a new experience.There were 4 of us my husband & I along with our two girls 18 & 26.Team name Bants all day !!!The first few minutes in the reception were a little weird & we didn't really know what to expect but once we went through the door it was amazing.Oscar was there if we needed help with little clues to steer us in the right direction, but he also said "NO" when we tried to do things that would not help or hinder our progress ( chalkboard Oscar !!) You have to work as a team to solve the mystery & escape in time -- we made it in 57 minutes.At one point our 18 year old Ellie was a little scared & Oscar was there with words of encouragement so she could get passed that bit & move on with the team.We haven't laughed so much as a family in ages so it was all in all a great day out.Thanks Oscar from team Bants all day !!

Exciting and fun!. The escape game at Secret Studio was a load of fun! It was challenging and nerve racking with just the right amount of tension. I'd absolutely recommend going and experiencing it for yourself!
A blast! Go!. We had an absolutely amazing time. I don't want to reveal to much, but go and do it. An engaging, clever and exciting escape game that sets the bar high. Recommended!

Ssssshhhhh....tell everyone.. I have done several of these now and it certainly ranks high up. Very well crafted puzzles that tie into the overall scenario rather than random puzzles that just give you a code or key. It's strength was its cohesiveness regarding the storyline. There were things for the individual and things for a group to do. I took some first timers who loved it. Olly, the guy running the session was helpful and enthusiastic. They are doing half price tickets at the moment because they are relatively new kids on the block. Best bit... More technical and mechanical - not just code and key. Lots of very cool surprises. Tip...When you book check your junk box.

"Well you're certainly the only one's who took the lamp" - Jerry Spritzers. I have really struggled to find words to explain how amazing an experience this was. Really great fun and extremely challenging. Harry was really great and made the game very fun and entertaining. I particularly liked his words of encouragement as we went through the game!Being a group of Dungeons & Dragons players, this was so perfect, it really felt like all our dreams made a reality. Especially the looting. As others have said I won't put much more because I don't want to spoil the fun, but I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a challenge!

Best hour I've spent on my London vacation. Wasn't sure what to expect going here, but I certainly didn't expect it to be much fun. The puzzles are clever and entertaining, and arranged in such a way that you can solve many of them in your own way. It's open-ended, so you can mostly solve them the way you see fit. It requires a team approach and is a great thing to do with a bunch of friends. The setup and the equipment are very innovative and enjoyable to interact with. Even more importantly- the staff at Secret Studio go well beyond the call of duty to ensure an amazing experience. My girlfriend and I had our appointment inadvertently double-booked. The way they handled the situation went beyond excellent and into the realm of some of the best customer service I've ever received. I cannot recommend Secret Studio highly enough as a way to have some innovative fun.

Best Escape Game we've done!. A group of six of us (friends) visited last Friday. We'd done two other escape games elsewhere in London and this was by far the best! Great storyline, great experience for the whole time and so well thought out. Highly recommended to friends, colleagues, families. Well worth the money and Josh was a great host and you could tell he wanted to make the experience the best it can be.

Absolutely the best. Experience started before we even arrived, so got us in the mood and ready. Excellent friendly staff who guided us well with just the right amount of hints. The room was fantastic - far superior to others we have done. Good mix of puzzles and it flowed very well too. We were a family team of 5 (Pugway Army) and we found the level just right for us. Lots of things for the whole team to be involved in. Twists and turns all the way - brilliant ! The whole team agreed this was by far the best game we have done and we escaped in just over 49 minutes. An excellent experience and if/when they get a 2nd room we will be back in a shot. Well done we had a great time.
Great fun!. Well organized, good fun day out with friends! I would recommend for anyone that likes to try out new things

Great fun - Team S.S. Enterprise escaped (just!). Great fun from start to finish. We did this as a family with older teens and there was plenty of challenge, plus the odd helpful hint (thanks Josh!). An hour's great entertainment and the staff could not have been more helpful. If, like us, you have never tried an escape game, this is a perfect start.

Super team night out!!. We did this as a team night out earlier this week, and it was absolutely brilliant. We cannot recommend this enough for any team or corporate fun day out. Dave and the team were all so friendly and helpful, from the booking until we left, buzzing from the experience. It is something different and definitely a laugh!

Best Fun - Team Thundercats. If you live in London or are just visiting you have to visit Secret Studio. Staff were fantastic and couldn't have done more for us. You have to work out how to escape from a room with a series of clues. Got the old grey matter working but had a great laugh in the process. Highly recommended.

Incredible fun - Jerry Spritzers. Team Jerry Spritzers had an absolutely brilliant day at Secret Studio. Harry was welcoming and friendly upon arrival and set the mood perfectly for the puzzles and games to come.I won't spoil any of the game itself but if you've got a group of friends who have a passion for brainteasers and working together it's well worth it. Loved it.

New and amazing group/ family activity. If you're looking to do something different and fun in london as oppose to the usual clubbing, parks, shopping and cinema then this place is great way to spend your time in. Its a fun detective/ mystery solving game where you will be locked in a room for 1hr trying to find clues and follow hints given to you from the game coordinator in order to solve the mystery. Its fun, engaging, can get quite you quite jumpy which adds an interesting dimension to the whole experience. Definitely recommend it.... ( HURRY AND MAKE THE MOST OUT OF THE TRIAL PRICE, AS WE WERE TOLD THEY MAY INCREASE THE PRICE IN THE FUTURE)

Great hosts, Great fun, excellent experience!. Secret studio were really good from the moment I booked till even after the game when I contacted them. Customer satisfaction is there priority and is the reason why, along with my reviews, there are so many happy groups. We booked for a group of 5 and had one additional guest who we added on arrival, this was absolutely no problem. The game itself was extremely fun and very fast paced. I don't want to give much away in my review so will say no more. For people who have never tried escape rooms before this is a must. I also wish and hope secret studio will have different game rooms too soon.

A unique and memorable way to spend an afternoon in London.. So much fun, we did it in groups of four which seemed ideal. The less you know going in, the better! So well planned and executed, a really good team-building exercise and if you pull it off you'll feel so accomplished afterwards! Highly recommend. Thanks guys from your new Irish pals!

Great family fun! . This was our first time trying an escape game. We arrived 15 minutes late due to complications during the tube strike, but they did not rush us through the experience (possibly due to cancellation of later bookings because of the strike). Our game master Oscar gave us good instructions before the game and helped us along the way when we got stuck. They had some technical problems, but solved it in a creative way with paper notes under the door - we though this a part of the game and it did not detract from the experience. It was a thrill all the way through and a real rush at the end. We all love it, and would love to check other escape games. Recommend others to give them a shot, during the preview we got half off - but even at full price it would be well worth both the time and money.Thanks for a thrilling afternoon!

First timers and it didn't dissapoint. We were greeted by our great games master Mo on a beautiful Friday evening in London. The 4 of us in our 30's had no idea what to expect and we loved every minute of it. There were a few times we got a bit frustrated but that was all part of the fun. Good luck getting out in time!

Good experience at a discounted price. Overall, the game was fun. However, the first part was significantly complicated and then it sped up a lot. We went 4 people with a 50% discount which makes it a very good deal.Final hint: it does scare a little bit ;)

Bundles of fun. We had a brilliant time at this new attraction in London. It was a fantastic experience and we thoroughly enjoyed following leads and making connections between clues to solve the mystery. Team work and communication was essential!! Will recommend to friends and add to Great Little Place.
