Fun with wow!. Fun activity for small groups of adults but leave the drinks for after the game: you'll need all your brain potential to escape ;-) ps not for faint hearts. Great fun!

Amazing game!. My boyfriend and I do alphabet dating. It was my turn to choose the date for the later 'E', so we came to try Enigma Escape. I read great reviews and it did not disappoint. Really loved the added touches! The clues helped, but didn't give the answer so we still got the satisfaction of discovering the answer. Interesting story and logical. Good quality props. Felt longer than an hour (in a good way!)Can't wait to try the new game. We will certainly be paying another visit. Well done on excellent entertainment! Perfect way to spend a Sunday (and any other day!)Host was great as well :) Lisa and Ben

Great fun. This was our first escape room experience and we all loved it! Hon was a super host, explained everything we needed to know and even provided some snacks! Will definitely look to return once the next room is open.

The most amount of fun!. We had a team of 3 attempt to escape the Killer Room at Enigma Escape. Having done a few room escapes before and some being not so good, I am always a little nervous that they won't live up to expectation. This far succeeded expectation and in my opinion should be rated higher than third on trip advisor for 'fun things to do in London'. Hon (our 'games master') was fun, welcoming and made the experience even better. I don't want to say anything to give things away but it was challenging and exciting from start to finish! We can't wait to come back when the next room is ready. Thank you very much. Ps. We got out with 7:59 to spare but the blood was pumping the whole time!!

Exhilarating room escape game. This was our first room escape game. Me and my two sons aged 16 and 14. We all really enjoyed it. Really friendly and helpful host, game put together well, there's a way that hints can be sent to you if you're completely stuck, which we were on one occasion; we got out successfully. I've been playing flash games like this for well over a decade, it was weird and amazing to be in one in real life! Of course we can't go again, but I'd definitely recommend it. All three of us found it really enjoyable.

Brilliant Birthday Bash. This was my first live escape room, and I will definitely use this company again. It was appropriately mentally and physically challenging, and had just the right amount of adrenaline. There were no red herrings in the game, which was good because we didn't waste any time. The only thing that kept this from being 5 stars was that the introduction video was a bit silly and pointless (either lose the video, or make a better one). I am a long time player of hidden object games, and viewer of The Crystal Maze and Fort Boyard; so I'd been training my whole life for this!

Our first adventure room experience and it was superb!. We are a family of 4 (our two boys aged- 9 & 12) and we're looking for an adventure room experience. Enigma Escape took some finding to begin with. Maybe that's part of the game? Once there though, everything was great. Han is a great host and though the game starts slow and the set up video animation could have set the mood better, the game itself is well thought through and fairly exciting. We all had a blast and would definitely come back for their next game room.

Our favourite so far!. Me and my boyfriend visited today and we had the best time! Hon, the host, was brilliant. Very welcoming and engaging. The game itself was thought out well and the puzzles were all very logical and fitting towards the background story which is presented brilliantly before you enter the room!It is our 5th escape room but the first time we did one as just a couple. We were worried we might struggle, but found it great to do as a couple!We look forward to coming back and trying the new room when it opens up soon...keep up the good work! :) Also, it is super easy to find and easily accessible from Kings Cross!
Brilliant. Excellent puzzles, just the right amount of scares, really nice host, and very well organised. Would 100% recommend!

Great birthday present . Had so much fun here with my boyfriend, brother and parents for my brother's 30th birthday. It was an exciting hour, everyone had something to offer in solving the puzzle and escaping and WE DID IT!! Very satisfying - we will definitely come back to try the next room that is opening soon.
The Killer Escape Game. Went as a couple to play this escape game! Few games out there are only for 2 players but this one worked really well! Would really recommend, had an awesome time!
Excellent first time escape room. Everything was perfect for a good experience of an escape room! it was our first time and everything was explained so we had a good time!
The great escape!. Don't bother reading any more reviews and book your experience ASAP! It was brilliant, absolutely brilliant! All the little things really do add up!

Terrifyingly Brilliant!!. Awesome escape game!! Totally worth the money!! Very well thought out puzzles and guidance always on point for those who struggle. Soo glad I took the Mrs to this as an anniversary treat as she loved every second of it (even if she did end up screaming twice!!) Would love it if there was a second or third room, so hopefully the Enigma guys won't keep us waiting too long!! Would definitely recommend to others!!
Great fun. An hour flew by like nothing, fantastically fun, really keeps you engaged and thinking and really satisfying to complete!!

Terrific Fun. This was my first escape room experience, and despite having high expectations to begin with this managed to far exceed them. Got stuck a couple of times, and the host gave us a good amount of time to try and get past it before he gave us hints (which just appeared on a TV screen in the room, rather than coming through a tannoy, which helped to maintain the atmosphere of the creepy setting).We were told that they're planning to open up a new escape experience in the next couple of months, and my friends and I will certainly be coming back for that,
Brilliant. Fantastic unique way to spend some time out in London,the room was very intelligently designed and kept you guessing throughout

Absolutely brilliant!!!! . Done a few escape rooms and this was by far and away the best!! Can't give anything away but it's a great scenario and a brilliant balance of skills required. Really well thought out and brilliant fun

Great fun breaking the enigma. Four of us visited the Enigma Escape rooms and were met by Hon who introduced us to the game. We were given a short introduction to the background story to the game and how we had become trapped. After this we set about making our escape as quickly as possible. We had great fun working as a team to figure out the various puzzles and surprises along the way. Hon and his team have created a game with plenty of interactivity and a variety of puzzles which have to be solved. Apparently they are looking to expand with a second escape room so we'll definitely visit again to attempt to escape the next room.All-in-all lots of fun!

Buzzing! Great host and great fun!. We visited Enigma escape on a Friday evening (2 couples). We were welcomed by the lovely Hon, who is an amazing host who sets the scene straight away.The room was absolutely brilliant. We have played many before throughout London and this was definitely one of the most enjoyable ones. There is a very clear storyline and the puzzles are very 'common-sensical', which just keeps you on a constant high as you go along. Fantastic experience. Would highly recommend.

Luna's Babes take on The Killer game. Myself and a few friends visited Enigma Escape last Sunday and took on the Killer Challenge - we all absolutely loved the experience!We've done quite a few escape-the-room games now and were really impressed with the strong storyline that ran throughout the game and also the fact that the game was more physically involved than many of the other games around (think scary Crystal Maze)! Hon was a great gamesmaster and really set the scene before we embarked on the room.Would 100% recommend this game to both people who are yet to try an escape-the-room game and seasoned gamers!Luna's Babes x
Amazing escape room. Thank you :D the game was very interesting and very fun one of the best escape rooms I've been too can't wait for the next ones to be outMany thanks

Brilliant experience, definitely worth going!. Without giving anything away, I can safely say that this is one the best and most unique experiences in London! Our host Hon was brilliant and really friendly, and the game itself was epic. I would definitely recommend trying out Enigma Escape, I can't wait to come back and try out the next game they come up with. Make sure you don't read into it too much, it's best to go in not knowing what to expect.
Great fun!. We had a fab time at Enigma Escape. Hon was friendly and helpful, and funny, and the game was brilliant - we would definitely go back and do another of their rooms.

Thrillingly exciting. Haven’t had this much fun in ages. Realistic gameplay, challenging but not impossible puzzles. Hon our game host was charmingly entertaining, if you were ever stuck he is the guy, who will drop you hints. I would and will recommend this game to anyone. It’s guaranteed fun for both couples and friends.

What a high!! Great Fun!!. This was the first time I tried an escape room, OMG it was SO much fun!! I highly recommend it to everyone! -couples, friends, co-workes, and family, I am definitely coming back for more excitement at Enigma Escape #newhobby
Killer review. Really fun experience! A little bit scary and was great fun! Would definitely recommend for others to do!
Birthday cracker. Such a great time strongly recommend it friends/family. I don't want to give anything away just go guys!!!

Excellent escape game!. Have done a fee of these but really enjoyed this one. It was a lot more common-sensical than others... The plot was easier to follow as well! We were really into it and did not see time go by. Thanks for a very fun evening!

Fantastic experience. Incredible experience. Fun game. The perfect difficulty level - not too easy, but not impossibly hard. Many surprises and different types of puzzle solving required. Recommend this to any groups of friends who enjoy problem solving and team building exercises.
Fun and well spend time. The game is fun and the riddles are clever. Some are easy and some are more tricky. We had a good time.

So much fun! . Had a brilliant experience at Enigma! The owner/host was incredibly welcoming and friendly and the escape game itself was incredibly well thought out and clever. Lots of skills come in to play and the hour goes by so quickly! Would recommend to everyone who likes a challenge!!

Intelligently designed. The game was very well thought of. I liked the way it was designed and how every clue made sense. No randomness, no non sense. Solving so many puzzles in a matter of 60 min was never such a joy. Yes, you get sweating and tense, but the feeling of escape just few minutes before the end of time is exhilarating.

Excellent fun, money well spent. A friend and I went to Enigma Escape having never been to an escape experience before. We were welcomed by Sam, who set the scene excellently and made sure we understood everything we needed to before starting. The game itself was excellent, a good combination of challenging, fun and suspenseful. I look forward to the next game to be done by Enigma Escape, as I will certainly be going back.Thanks for a great experience!

Enigma escape: What great fun!. Me and my partner visited enigma escape as an anniversary date, ( I know it's strange but don't do bog standard dates). I'm glad we don't as this is so much fun and completed with a few mintues to spare. Couldn't recommend it enough.

Most unexpectedly rewarding and fun experience!. This was my first escape game and I did not have high expectations, as I wasn't sure how much I would enjoy it. From the moment my team and I stepped into the Enigma Escape building, we felt like our experience began. Sam was an incredibly attentive and supportive host and prepped us for the game really well. My team and I enjoyed the game so much and it was a very good team bonding experience! After the game, I raved about the experience to all of my family and friends and would definitely recommend it!
Great way to spend an hour!. Without giving anything away, this was a carefully crafted, intelligently thought out Escape Room. I would definitely recommend.
Great Escape Room Experience. Fun, good and logical hints and puzzles, interesting story and great room, nice host. All great - would recommend!
Fun time. We were in London for a week and wanted to try something different than the standard tourist attractions. This was exciting and fun. I recommend to all.
Great time had by all. And we escaped! . Really enjoyed the experience. Very challenging but with some good team work we did it! Would highly recommend it. Gives you a real buzz.

Loved it. 2 of us completed the Killer Room yesterday although we were a few minutes over the hour. A warm welcome on arrival followed by some great scene setting. We were immersed the moment the clock started. Well thought through storyline pitched at a satisfying difficulty level. Would thoroughly recommend for 2 people. Can't wait for the additional room to be up and running. Thank you so much for making our experience a great one.

SO MUCH FUN. My boyfriend booked a game at Enigma Escape as a surprise for my birthday, and though not the most stereotypically romantic of activities, I loved it! The host was very friendly, funny and gave us just the right amount of 'hints' when we were struggling. Would definitely recommend as an alternative to the usual cinema/dinner/theatre kinda dates. Can't wait to go again when the new games are finished!

Great first room will definitely go back for more!. Went with my wife as a group of 2 on the 20th of April for her birthday to play The Killer room. It was great that you could play as a couple, needed a few hints when we strayed down the wrong track but was not too difficult overall. Having already played at least 4-5 other escape games in London and elsewhere in the past, this was definitely the most enjoyable one. Once we completed the game the feeling of having gone through an exciting story was much more entertaining than just randomly rushing through locks and codes and upturning every prop in the room simply to get out. Will definitely go back when new rooms open up.
Escape Room. My first time i did a escape room. A fabulous experience. Nicely done and made. I would certainly would go back when the other escape room is finished. We did well with only 1 hint.

A real life thriller!. It was just how I had hoped it would be- it was super fun, exciting, nerve racking and intellectually challenging all at the same time! Definitely recommend it with a group of friends.

Couldn't cracking the Enigma Code. I went to Enigma Escape along with my girlfriend in May. Neither of us knew what to expect but we absolutely loved it and will definitely be playing the new game there when it launches!! A great combination of puzzles, surprises and humour and all presented in a highly professional way. Would definitely recommend for all!!
Loved it! : ). Highly recommended! Hon was a fantastic host and it was a well thought through and logical game. Great time!

Killer Fun!. My boyfriend booked The Killer room for me as a birthday surprise and it was great fun! I wouldn't want to spoil the game for anyone but there were a few screams... Definitely worth going! You won't regret it... unless you don't solve the game and get locked in with the Killer...Massive thanks to Hon for an imaginative escape game! We will come again for other rooms!

good fun , nice host. The game was very fun and the host very welcoming. Nice start with popcorn and a chat to put you in the mood of the story. Also good that there is a story behind all the codes and riddles.

Enigma Escape. Hon was our host, he was friendly, accommodating and genuinely wanted to ensure that we all had a good time. One of our group was heavily pregnant, he gave us enough information without giving anything in the game away, so that she could make a decision to participate or not. She decided not to take part, so Hon let her watch us play the game alongside him, so she was able to participate and enjoy that way.The game itself is a combination of physical and mental, uses technology well. The game is well put together, challenging and is very linear, therefore moves very quickly. There are some nice surprises en-route also, we had a great night out, and are looking forward to their new game.

Exciting and Linear. Well designed room with lots to keep you challenged. Different obstacles to what we have come a cross before and hosted by friendly and helpful Hon. Can't wait to go back for the new room.
Great fun. A great adventure. More physical than most locked room adventures. We had a great time and would definitely recommend it

Great activity . Went here with my boyfriend as a surprise for his birthday. It's one of the few locked room puzzles where you can go as a team of 2. We had a great time (and escaped - just!). Definitely recommended!

Awesome. Had the best time at Enigma Escape yesterday! I went with my boyfriend and would definitely recommend for other couples looking for something a bit different. Our host Hon was lovely and welcoming and really made the experience great from start to finish. Loved all the little details that really added to the Immersion and can't wait to try their next room in a few months time.

Really good fun. Thoroughly enjoyable, just the right level of difficulty, not impossible, but a decent challenge. Really exciting and interactive game, which keeps you gripped and involved the whole time. Very friendly staff too!

Fast paced and fun. The Killer is definitely one of my favourite escape rooms so far! It's fast paced, well put together and has none of the tedious number puzzles that bogs down other games. Plenty of physical stuff to keep it interesting and it's just the right amount of tricky! My bf and I had a great time and have been recommending it to all of our friends. Thanks Hon!

Would love to do it all over again!. Hon was a fab host from beginning to end. Very welcoming and explained what to expect before going in. The experience was so much fun and couldn't fault anything. I can't imagine how long it takes to design the whole idea. I can't wait to try the new one when it opens! The only thing that would make this 5* would be, if they could send u a video of you doing the whole experience because I reckon it could be pretty funny to watch back on!

You've got to try this.... A fun, well thought out game that encourages lateral thinking and teamwork. Some clues are very subtle, but others are so frustratingly obvious that you don't expect them! Lots of fun and gives you plenty to talk about for a few days afterwards.

An hour well spent.. I played "The Killer" at Enigma earlier today. It was my first escape room experience and didn't really know what to expect. I was not disappointed. Not much can be said without spoilers, but this experience is thoroughly recommended.. From being welcomed by Hon, through to thankfully escaping we were entertained and challenged and left with massive smiles on our faces :) I can't wait for the new room in a few months and will be booking very soon.
A thrilling hour. I've done one escape room before and and this one was of similar difficulty, but this one had more of a story to it. It was great fun. Would highly recommend.

Great afternoon out. Very clever and unique. Great fun!
Something a bit different from the norm.
Look forward to the next game!

Awesome escape game!. We've played escape room games before and enigma escape is up there with the best. Really well thought out story, helpful hints but not too helpful. Great mix of both puzzles for your brain and puzzles needing a bit more physicality! And a few shocks along the way. Well worth spending an hour, or less if you manage it, at enigma escape.
A different type of escape game. Really fun and a break from standard puzzle solving you might be used to with other escape rooms. Go and try it!
Great fun. Had an amazing time here and highly recommend you experience this. Cannot wait for more rooms to be built!

Brilliant escape game. We had a great time playing the Killer themed room. The approach was different to other escape games I have played in that there was a more story driven logic to the problem solving rather than lots of random clues. It worked really well for what was an intense hour. Looking forward to their next one!

Great escape room! Would recommend.. Really enjoyed this escape room! Has lots of hidden secrets and challenges within the game, which made it ever the more fun! Liked how Sam introduced the experience by making us watch a short video at the beginning and even providing SNACKS! Would definitely recommend! x

Great experience. Me & my wife visited here yesterday and it was a great experience. We didn't have a clue on what to do once we entered the game, but things picked up after we got our first clue and from then on, I have no idea how quickly the time went. It is a 60 min experience, but time will fly once you get into the game. A great experience indeed.
Must do. Hon was great. Awesome experience. Can't express great this was. Keep up new games. Son and I had a blast.

I never thought I'd say being locked in a room was fun!. My Mum bought be a voucher for Enigma Escapes for my birthday, and to be honest I thought it sounded a bit silly! But I grabbed my best friend and we booked in a evening to go. We had such a fun time. It took us a little bit at first to get our brains into problem solving mode, but once we got going you couldn't stop us. We were almost a little disappointed when we escaped that it was over and there weren't any more clues to solve. Highly recommend, I would definitely go again, especially as our host mentioned they are looking at opening some different escape scenarios. I guess that's the only downside is once you've done it, you can't really do the same one again.

Brilliant!. Obviously can't give much away, but hat an amazing time! I preferred this to other room escapes that I have done, as this one was much more logical and flowed a lot better, you're not just looking for random things in random places. Go do it!
Team Parmar. Brilliant really enjoyed this Birthday Treat my wife arranged.Would definitely recommend this to family and friends

Super fun day out!. This was our first time doing anything like this and we had a great time. The puzzles were logical and fit in with the story which was extremely relatable, who doesn't love a trip to the cinema...?We had a great time and the special little surprises were a great finishing touch.We would highly recommend it, see if you can beat our time - we had 10:46 left on the clock!Good luck...

Fab experience. I booked the experience for my dad's birthday - a group of four of us completed the killer challenge - it was planned really well and we really enjoyed it. Highly recommend. Thanks again - Team Teds Escape.

Brilliant fun!!!. This was my second escape room and the first for my co-challenger, and it did not disappoint. The quality of the spaces and décor is very high, creating a very immersive experience. The puzzles were challenging and varied, with a few surprises also hidden along the way. We look forward to visiting future Enigma Escape rooms in the future!

Great team game!. I visited a similar escape room puzzle in Hong Kong and was pleasantly surprised that this one was just as good! We all had a brilliant time and managed to beat the clock! Would recommend it to everyone such a good idea.

Great experience all round. Hon was a great host, a very innovative and challenging room escape!! The ideas were current and the technological side kept up wth the ever changing life we live in. Would highly recommend for all! The only thing I have experienced in a different room escape that I would implement at enigma games is blindfolding the contestants before entering the room. I cannot wait to come back and play other games that Enigma Escape rooms develop.

Hugely entertaining morning!. I went with my boyfriend over Easter. This was the third escape room I've tried and the most enjoyable. Our host Hon was great and the whole set-up was so professional and modern - from the introduction at the start to the photo at the end (the emoji props were a great idea!). The game itself was really enjoyable and everything you'd look for in an escape game without giving anything away. I'll definitely be watching out for the next room - made all the more addictive by the collectible coins each time you escape. We escaped with 14 minutes spare though with just two of us - for those of us familiar with escape games and good with logic, a more challenging room would be a great addition.
Enigma escape!!. Amazing!!! Four 23 year old girls, we all loved it! Would definitely recommend!!! Was done in such a clever way, our first escape room experience. We are hooked!

Excellent!. this was our first escape experience, it was brilliant. Left feeling accomplished yet eager to go back for more. Our host Sam was attentive and informative and I wouldn't hesitate in recommending Enigma Escape to anyone looking for a unique way to spend time.Thank you Sam!!

Amazing experience, 100% would recommend!. Had an incredibly entertaining afternoon at the Escape Room, we were recommended by a friend and now we would 100% recommend it to others. The experience was incredibly immersive and we left feeling like we'd achieved something! Our host, Sam, was fantastic.If you're looking for an entertaining way to spend an afternoon, look no further, this is the future!

Great escape room!!. The best thing about this escape room is that the puzzles follow common sense logic and are not just a bunch of padlocks in random places.
Sam, our host, was very nice and explained every detail we needed to play the game.
We'll try his new room when it's available and recommend this one to all our friends!

Awesome escape game. Enigma Escape Game is a must do while in London. The game is so well thought out it will test all your brain power. Unlike some escape games, Enigma Escape has a great storyline and flows perfectly from start to finish. The owner was wonderful and clearly loves his business. I can't wait to try the new room the next time I'm in London.

Just amazing!. We enjoyed it a lot! We had a very good time trying to resolve the enigma and we got it on time! It is perfecto for a team building activity. The facilities are brand new! I fairly recommend it!

Best escape game yet. Enigma Escape has the perfect mix of realism and escapism and really felt like a well thought-out 'experience'. Having done a couple of other room escape games, this was definitely the best I've done so far. Very keen for the next version to be finished so I can have a go!

Wow ... what a ride !!!. This escape room experience has it all. Excitement ... Fear ... Intensity... Gadgets ... ... the welcome from Hon is so open and friendly and the added touches make this escape room experience one of the best I've tried. You HAVE to go !!!

Lots of fun. A fantastic way to spend an hour in London. Harmless fun. Sam really makes the experience enjoyable. Had never been to an escape game before, but will definitely be going back once Sam has his new escape game next door.

One of the best rooms! It was awsome!. Great experience! It was really challenging. We had a lot of fun! They have room for two players which is kind of rare... Will recommend for anyone who visits London!

Amazing . This is our third escape room and Enigma escape blew the rest out of the water, very creative and very enjoyable challenges that will leave you fully satisfied, all the puzzles have a great flow and make sense rather than just random puzzles. This room was well thought out by very creative minds along with great customer service, he took the time to wrap up the day with a talk about our experience and a chance for us to ask questions, really nice guy We really look forward to your next room
Great escape room!. This is a very cool escape room, you can see a lot was invested in the idea and the room itself. VERY recommended ;-)

Fantastic fun all round. Had an absolutely great time here when taken for my birthday. Just the two of us doing the escape and introduced by our host, Han. Really friendly. The escape is great fun. Really inventive with a nice narrative running through it as a background context. The puzzles are really interesting with a real sense of achievement when you complete one and move on to the next stage. Just the right amount of hints without it spoiling any puzzles. Recommended!

Really good time. Really well thought and prepared, this game is an amazing new experience. I highly recommend this challenge to anyone who wants to have a good time doing something new that needs a bit of thinking.

Awesome!. I only played one escapegame before, and it made me want to do more! I would definitely recommend this, plus our host Sam was very friendly. He told us they were developping a second game released in the following months, and we are totally doing it as soon as we can. :D
Amazing activity!. Very nice game game host. The escape game itself is well done, asks a lot of logic and escape skills. Nice activity to do with your friends.

Great fun !. Well thought, planned and prepared. We did The Killer Game and survived it, it was really great fun. I'd recommend to do it with a group of friends. It was tricky and challenging, definitely worth doing it once !
Amazing escape game. Was refreshing to find an escape game where couples can play. Great build up to the game, where the seen was set before entering the room. Will definatley go back for a new game.
ENIGMA ESCAPE. Thoroughly enjoyable and very well thought out challenge, plenty to keep four friends engaged throughout.

Great fun!. Hon was great. He was was very friendly and the game was fantastic. Clearly a lot of thought had been put into the entire experience. Would definitely recommend this to anyone who has or has not played any of these games. We wish him all the best with his business.

Conor Mullan - Saturday 8.30-9.00pm. I found the whole thing a lot of fun. I enjoyed mental numerical sort of challenges so more of those would be good, similar to the numbers on the wall and their name.
Brilliant. Excellent idea and way of organising clues!! We went in the Killer game and were pleasantly surprised with the experience. Some great surprises in store with this! Would totally recommend!

Amazing experience. Absolutely loved this - we were a team of three people ( mother and daughters ) and had to work together to get out of the room on time. We solved puzzles, gathered clues, screamed our heads off at some parts and laughed lots. It's a really good team building exercise, and you'll find yourself shouting 10 MINUTES ON THE CLOCK a lot, trying to get out on time. Hon from Engima Escape gave us an excellent introduction (with drinks and popcorn!) and explained all the rules and background before we went in. Would highly recommend this!

Good atmosphere, good puzzles. This was my first escape room experience, so I don't have much to compare it to. The setup was very nice, atmospheric with a real theme to it. We managed to get through the room with 20 minutes to spare, but from what I could see of other people's times we completed it pretty quickly.I would recommend this, especially if you don't want something too dauntingly difficult on your first go.
good game. I've done a few escape games, adding this to the list of ones I enjoyed. Original story line with good props.

Fun day out!. I booked this as a birthday gift for two to enjoy. We ventured out, having heard great things about escape rooms, but reserving scepticism of whether we would have the collective wit to solve the problems. With an additional curiosity as to how anyone could find so much enjoyment from being locked in an enclosed space with potentially no escape, I wondered how the process could take an hour. We were both pleasantly surprised and thoroughly enjoyed the whole experience - it passes by so quickly! I would recommend this to anyone and will be booking on to another in the near future with a group of four. I think the activity would be fun with either a small or larger group.

Brilliant puzzle game experience. We visited Enigma Escape in a group of four friends. The set up was very immersive and fun. The puzzles were challenging but not impossible. We fortunately had a range of skills within our group and worked them out between us without too many clues. Came out feeling extremely proud to have escaped and thoroughly enjoyed the whole experience. Hon our host was very welcoming and put us at ease. This is a really fun thing to do with friends.

Excellent Activity. This puzzle room is brilliant! There was a good mix of mental and physical challenges and our host Hon was wonderful. The venue even provide your tired mind with snacks and you can see a lot of care and interest is going into developing the game. I would definitely recommend this experience, great activity rain or shine.
Fantastic experience!. Absolutely loved the whole experience - Will recommend it to all my friends planning to visit London!

Fanastic!. We went today as a group of 4 with no previous experience of live action escape games - though 2 of us are avid gamers and 2 completely non-avid gamers.The room, puzzle and setting were all great, what really made it was Hon himself who clearly had thought out all the design aspects really well and was obviously passionate about what he was doing and gave us some of his time to chat at the end. The small details of the collectable medallions etc were ace and we'll all definitely be going back for the second puzzle when its ready. I had a sad face for the photo at the end but that was purely because its my favourite emoticon.

Amazing escape game!!. Booked this experience as a present for my wife, and it was definitely worth it! Everything, from the background story to the space, challenges and small details, was spotless and extremely well thought.Sam, the owner, was a fantastic host and super friendly.Overall, great experience, would highly recommend for anyone looking to have some fun in an escape game, and will be looking forward for the next Enigma Escape adventure.

That was good.. Didn't know what to expect but was more than pleasantly surprised. The experience not only gripped me but left me shaking with excitement and adrenaline. Would highly recommend for anyone.

Great game, lots of surprises!. This is my sixth visit to an escape type of game and would really recommend this one. The game has a storyline which really adds to it, rather than completing puzzles for no reason. The host Sam was great, you can tell how hard he has worked on the game and how proud he is! There's lots of extras that they have thrown in for free, that really make you feel welcome and remember this game over the other competitors. Location so great, right next to tube. Thanks guys!

Great first escape room experience. A group of friends and I visited Enigma Escape and had a great time - for most of us it was our first escape room experience, but the seasoned escape room-er in our group really enjoyed it too. We had fun with the mix of hands-on challenges and puzzles, and the room itself was well put-together. Our host Hon was very friendly and made us very welcome; I would highly recommend Enigma Escape to potential escape room-ers!

Energetic and exciting!. Such a fun and active game with friends - great for team building and just generally doing something unusual in London! Host was friendly and welcoming! Game was a thrill and extremely satisfying as we WON! Would definitely recommend for a mentally challenging activity! Lots of fun!!

Lots of fun. Had a great birthday treat here, didn't know what to expect but once the door was locked we both got straight into action trying to escape! Twists and turns but we made it out eventually with only a few hints. Will certainly come back to try the other escape room when it is finished!

Incredible entertainment. Firstly, Hon is clearly a great guy who has put a lot into this venue. It was our first escape room, and it genuinely was very immersive and made us think a lot. Very impressed and will be sure to go to their new one opening in the near future.

'The Killer' escape room!. As a group of 3 friends, we decided on this escape room as our first because the story was more of a horror, murder-mystery theme than others we'd looked at in London. When we arrived, we were greeted by the founder, who was really friendly and told us his impressive story of how this attraction came about. We're given refreshments and introduced to the backstory of how we end up trapped in a cage. The puzzles were just about right in difficulty for us, and if we got too stuck, a small hint comes through to help you along. It was a great experience overall and we'll certainly be going back when new escape rooms open!

Let the chaos begin. My 17 year niece and I did The Killer room, neither of us had any idea what we were letting ourselves in for, we're not gamers, hadn't watched The Crystal Maze .... Hon knew he had his work cut out with us two!! But we had a great time, we got really involved with the whole game and thoroughly enjoyed it ..... Thank You.

Killer room. I went for my birthday with my dad. He had reservations about it but he enjoyed it so much he wants to go back for his birthday. It was a great opportunity to bond and test our team working skills. We both had great fun and I will be returning with friends for their birthdays.

Fun escape game. This is perfect entertainment for a bunch of friends or in our case mixed ages within a family. It was hard enough but not impossible so not disheartening and a small hint comes through on a screen if you're getting stuck or going off on too much of a tangent. There were a good variety of clues to solve which made it fun and interesting

Great Idea, well exectued. I was taken here as a birthday treat and what a great experience it was. The host set the scene and explained everything we needed to know really well. The challenge itself was well planned with some really clever clues to solve. The time flew by and the experience was finished off with some photos as a memento. I would definitely recommend this as something a bit different. I understand that they are in the process of designing a second challenge and am already planning to go and try it when it opens.
Such a fun experience and actually pretty challenging!. Took my finance for his 30th birthday - great host, really good challenge and experience overall. Highly recommend.
Great experience. Two of us went to Enigma Escape and had a fantastic time. The event is good fun with the challenges and puzzles being challenging to they can be solved. Would recommend to anyone.

Brilliant experience . The experience was great. The host was great and provided us with refreshments at the beginning. Made us feel welcome. The game itself was challenging and kept us on our feet. It is harder than it looks! Great experience and will definitely be going back for game 2 coming out in May!

Well thought out and executed - loads of fun!. Am a huge fan of escape rooms but have been let down in the past by some places which have had poor execution or non-existent storylines. The Killer does both excellently! Great twists and surprises and great variety of puzzles and codes/locks, and we enjoyed unraveling the story as we went along. Definitely recommended!

Very thrilling!. As soon as we got to the location, the conductor was very quick and made us feel comfortable, providing snacks and laughs. It was a very good team building exercise as we had to nbunce ideas off of each other to find clues and solve puzzles. There were some shocking parts which made us jump. Overall very entertaining

Really fun. We had a great time completing 'the killer'. Lots of laughter, puzzles were fun and we liked the addition of physical tasks. We would really recommend it to other people, we were still talking about it later that day.

Such a cool experience!. In case you are doubting whether going or not, JUST GO! Trust me, you won't regret it! It's a great team building game, an exciting hour and an overall unforgettable experience. Totally worth it!
Great event. Immersive and very engaging- we had a team of 4 playing the game and had a great time! Was hard but we managed to escape :) can't wait until the next one opens!

Enigma Escape Couple. The attraction was an extremely enjoyable and immersive experience. We picked Engma Escape due to most escape attractions not accomodating groups smaller than 5 people. We went as a couple and had a blast. The venue is very nice with a set theme and the game is a very cleverly thought out challenge. Our host was great and even offered us refreshments during the briefing. Our host also told us there will be more themes coming in the near future and we will definately be returning to experience the other games. I highly recommend this attraction to couples or even larger groups!

Loved it!. We absolutely loved our trip to enigma escape, from the great hospitality to the intricate game set up. It makes the perfect birthday present and is really good value for money. If you want an adrenaline filled, exciting experience I would totally recomend it!

A taxing treat. We had lots of fun escaping the room! There was a great range of puzzles, some easy, some hard, and two people felt like a good size team although with one more person we would probably have got out a few minutes quicker! Hon was an excellent host and it was great chatting afterwards about how the game has developed over time. There are just the right amount of clues to help you along if you need them although we were kicking ourselves at a couple. Would really recommend this to anyone looking for a fun morning/afternoon activity.

Such great fun!. This was a great experience and something different to do in London. Hon was the best host as well, so friendly and welcoming. I won't give too much away but you definitely have to do this with friends! 100% recommend.

Excellent experience!. Really enjoyed the whole experience, right from when you walk in the door, the host makes you welcome and feel like the story has begun.
The puzzles are hard, but not unsolvable, hints are available, but once you get a hint, you feel silly you didn't work it out first!
Would recommend!

really enjoyed it. The host was really welcoming and we all had a great time. As long as you can work out logical clues and puzzles you will enjoy this experience. Suitable for most ages but maybe not for kids below teenage. You need to be able to move fairly freely but it isn't a physical exercise.
GREAT FUN AND WELL ORGANISED. Went with a group of colleagues after work and was a great challenge. The clues and set up is well thought out with lots of extras!

Good experience. When my boyfriend told me that my birthday present was an Enigma Escape telling me I had to escape from a locked room I was a bit afraid. After the experience, I wanted to play again and again. It was so much fun! I will recommend it to everyone and can't wait to play another time.

Immersive and impressive. I've done lots of room escapes before and this was the most immersive with the strongest premise and theme that really carried through, I find that often the theme is secondary and you almost forget about it. The strong theme made this a different type of room escape experience, if you let yourself you could believe that you were actually in the scenario and needed to escape. Very well thought out and executed, I highly recommend it. Certainly it's one of the best I've done. The host, Hon, was excellent as well and only gave us clues when we really needed them.

Super fun room escape, and works well with two!. I went with my girlfriend; we were a little bit worried that we'd get stuck because there were just two of us, but we managed to solve it in the end. Super fun way to spend an evening :)
Enigma Esscape. Hon was very nice, very helpful and the escape was a good challenge! Ours was the first slot of the day and they were fully booked for the rest of it - always a good sign!

Everything I expected and MORE!!. First time in London and I saw a countless number of reviews of how spending sometime at the enigma escape room was a necessity. I have to say that I cannot agree more!! My family and I enjoyed every minute of the mind-altering experience....can't say much because of course, I don't want to give it away. We were a group of 5; all well-educated and still took almost the whole time to escape the room! While the others in my group hadn't done anything like this, I had...and I still was mind-blown at the challenges.I'd recommend this activity to anyone in London...especially visitors looking to do something more and different than the typical tourist-y things. Also, easy to find with the instructions given...We caught the tube and walked the rest of the way; didn't take long at all.Can't forget that Hon was awesome!!! :)

Great host, fun game!. The host/owner (Sam) really has put his heart and soul into this game. Not only was it an intellectual challenge, but it was incredible fun. The Killer is the name of the game I played; it was well thought out, realistic (I completed the game with 40 seconds to go in a group of 2), yet had some pleasant surprises. I would definitely recommend this, and may even consider going for his next escape enigma it was that good! Hats off to Sam!

Fun for whole family!. Read about this escape challenge in Time Out London when searching for things to do with teen kids. Everyone loved it. It was one of the highlights of our trip to London. Great for all ages. Solve challenging mysteries and make progress to eventually make your way out. My kids are still talking about it!

Fantastic Expierience!. My partner and I have done a couple of different escape rooms now, but it is difficult to find rooms for just two players. This was great for us. I won't go into too much detail about the game because I don't want to ruin it for anyone else. I can say Hon was an excellent host, and the little details made it one of the best rooms we have played. I'm looking forward to returning in the future to play some even more difficult rooms.

Great experience. This is our second escape room challenge (our first being in Amsterdam) and we had a fantastic time. Clever challenges and a few shocker moments left us feeling exhilarated. Our host Hon was genial and friendly. Thoroughly recommended.

Awesome! Can't wait for the follow up! . We visited Enigma Escape earlier today and me and my friends had an amazing experience with 'The Killer' mystery solving game. With some great challenges and good flowing plot, we were kept hooked in it till the very end. Nice use of the multimedia, to which this was my first ever escape room but from hearing experiences of others this tops them all! Our game host, Hon was very friendly and informative and the touch with the popcorn and drinks as well as a prize for escaping was great! Only regret is I didn't eat my popcorn!Recommended very highly and will be back again with our team to do the next room when it is up and running! Can't wait!
Great location and amazing game!!. Set up here is wicked!!! Very professional!Would definitely come back and look forward to their new game.Loved the cinema style briefing :-)

Great fun!!. this was our first time of visiting an escape room, and I think I am now hooked! The attraction is easy to find, just round the corner from the Holloway Road tube station. The website recommends the lower age limit as 15, and I would agree with that, as there are scary parts! I went for my birthday, with my husband and 2 children, aged 20 and 15. Its a really good and totally immersive experience and I was so pleased that we managed to solve it. Really good for teamwork... I am really looking forward to the second room opening later this year, hopefully. Hon is a great host, and being given popcorn and drinks when we arrived added to the whole event. A really fun and different thing to do!

Super super super fun!!!!. Awesome escape game, our first experience of these and this one was perfect for a first timer. We were a group of 2. The host Hon was super friendly and put us at ease as we were a little nervous to start with! Won't give anything away but it was a really fun and engaging experience, definitely tests your minds and nerves and is a great team building activity. Would 100% recommend!
Definitely recommend. Amazing experience- absolutely loved it and would recommend it to all my friends! Great day out and very different to anything else in London!

Amazing Experience. Cant wait for the next one!. We did this as a four and had so much fun. we were on such a high when we came out at the end (with 2.5mins remaining!). Have recommended this to lots of people but cant wait for Sam to get the next game going as we will definitely be doing it!

Fantastic fun. My son and his friends played 'the killer' for a birthday party. It's a brilliant and original idea. They had such a great time that they excitedly talked about it for hours afterwards. The host and venue were also great. We would highly recommend!

Amazing experience!. This was my first experience of this kind and it was amazing! Great fun with my wife and friends, excellent host, a really thrilling time I highly recommended it as something different and for a memorable activity! Book it now!

Great Fun!!. Enigma Escapes is my second escape room. Having done my first room in Amsterdam I was really keen to see what London had to offer in this area. Enigma Escapes was incredible, they have managed to achieve a room that combines much more than just thinking puzzles. I could not recommend this enough, I will definitely be booking the second room once that becomes available.

First escape room experience! . I took my sister to Enigma Escape as a surprise for her 21st birthday and we had an amazing time! This was our first time doing a room escape game and Enigma Escape thoroughly exceeded expectations. The puzzles were all logical, fitted with the story, and were just the right level of difficulty. We were made to feel welcome as soon as we arrived - our host Hon was lovely, and the extra touches such as a drink and popcorn at the start and souvenirs at the end were great. And the icing on the cake - we escaped with just under 10 minutes to spare! We will definitely be back for their new room when it is ready :D

Great service and great fun. We booked this last minute as we had a few hours to kill in London and wanted to do something different, it was the best spontaneous decision we've ever had. We booked by email but then ended up running late due to our own incompetence. We phoned and they said this was fine and they'd just see us when we got there, very helpful over the phone. We paid about £60 for two of us which I thought was expensive considering the game is only an hour long but after we'd finished the game I decided it was completely worth it! Our host Hon was very friendly and helpful and the whole experience was exciting and a very clever concept, it was just the right level of difficulty. We throughly enjoyed ourselves and would recommend everyone should have a go at escaping! Thank you enigma escape, and best of luck with your new game, we hope to be back to try it out one day :)

Amazing experience. Enigma Escape was great and an unique experience for us! Really liked the puzzles, the atmosphere it created and the inclusion of devices normally not used. Sam really tries to be a little bit different than other escape rooms and succeeds in it! You really think, why didn't anybody else thought of that!All in all, great guy, great room! Check it out! :D

Excellent fun. Highly recommend. We went for a friends birthday not knowing what to expect. I had my reservations for a number of reasons: 1. I'm not a logical thinker 2. We would get stuck at the first hurdle 3. We might fall out due to either over enthusiasm or frustration 4. I'd get bored. None of the above happened at all. Hon the host was lovely and really made the scenario live. My friends and I really worked well as a team and over came all the challenges. It was so much fun. It got the adrenaline flowing . The game has the correct amount of difficulty to keep you engaged. I can't wait for the Enigma escapes to develop room 2 as we will be there.
Amazing fun!. This was amazing fun! Popcorn and coke to start, then into the room and away you go! I can honestly say that was the best fun I've had in a long time! Would thoroughly recommend it.

First Escape Room in London. Having done a few escape rooms in Australia myself, I can truly say that I've never experienced something quite like Enigma Escape. All puzzles were exceptionally designed and very unique, and were never too easy to solve. The rooms themselves were very creatively themed and there were many surprises along the way. Enigma Escape is certainly a must if you are an escape room enthusiast or even just a beginner, and being a 15 year old, I was immediately craving another one! I will certainly be returning when their next room is finally completed, hopefully with the same host as he was very enthusiastic and certainly established a perfect atmosphere for the whole experience, somehow making it even more enjoyable. Having done this escape room, I'm not too sure how many others will be able to complete!

Really exceeded expectations!. We went to Enigma Escape as part of a "hen party" day out..... We totally loved it! We were looked after by Hon.... Lovely friendly chap.... He explained everything and then the "game" began...... Very clever, very entertaining, brilliant fun!! We managed to escape with 1 minute 20 seconds to spare! We felt very chuffed! Can't recommend it enough for a great interesting challenging fun thing to do!

Amazing Fun. 7 of came yesterday, girls Vs boys.......unfortunately, the boys lost !!! I wasn't sure what to expect, as not really into puzzles and games like this, but it was the most fun I have had in ages. If you are in London and looking for something fun and different, give his a go. I can't wait to they have the second puzzle, as we will all be back. The part owner of the business 'Hon' was a lovely guy, just a shame we was an Arsenal fan, but hey ho, you can't win every time. Thanks again, brilliant fun !!

Highly recommended and so much fun!. This escape room game was absolutely brilliant. My friends and I absolutely loved it from start to finish! I'd highly recommend it if you are looking for something fun to do in London with friends. Our host Hon was fantastic and made it personal and lots of fun!

Awesome experience!!!. Such a great unique experience!!!
Really well put together!
The host Hon was also excellent!
Thoroughly recommend this to anyone!
Team 'Matt Damon' approves!. This was our first escape room experience, didn't know what to expect, it was amazing! can't wait to do another one.

Excellent. Having done many escape games I am always nervous to try a new place. Sam was a great host. The game was brilliant and very clever and captivated us... I won't say anymore but great great fun!!!

Amazing Fun. I booked for my partners birthday as he loves all these sorts of game son his phone. It surpassed all expectation. It was amazingly well thought out and kept us on edge the whole time. the story is great and all the puzzles to solve left us with never a dull moment. We would go back in a heart beat. Cant wait for their next adventure. A must do activity in London. 5stars. amazing.

One of the better London escape rooms. I was in a team of 4, and there was enough to do for each of us without one being left out which sometimes happens in other escape rooms.There are 2(and a half) rooms to complete. The story is original and smart, and I appreciated how practical the clues and puzzles were. Others have been too far fetched to figure out. The host was helpful and encouraging, and provided us with some popcorn and water before we set off.I'm looking forward to the new set up coming soon, and will defintely be booking.

Amazing escape game. This was my first escape experience and I was really impressed by it!The welcome with a drink and some popcorn at the beginning was a nice touch, and the host was very friendly.The game itself was amazingly thought out, with a range of tasks to get through in 60 minutes.Will return when they build their next room.

I can't wait for room number two. Enigma Escape provided me and my friends an amazing experience with 'The Killer' mystery solving game. With some ingenious challenges and a clever, logical plot, I was completely absorbed in it from start to finish.Our game host, Hon was very nice and we shared some good laughs with him.Guaranteed top quality entertainment, simply a must do.
Awesome night out!. This has been such an adrenaline rush! So cool, well planned and very challenging! Loved every minute!

Great fun and excellent host. I had never done an escape room before and this was great fun. Our host made us feel really welcome and did an excellent job at making us feel welcome.The game was challenging enough, well designed, well paced and full of surprises! I would really recommend.

Fun fun fun!!!. Lots of fun, easy location to get to and great concept. Some good surprises on the way and great room layout. I can't wait till some new rooms are created!!
Hon, the game creator, was so friendly and nice :)

Amazing birthday gift. Bought by my wife and came highly recommended from some friends. Hon was a great host from start to finish. We were offered popcorn and water before we began and he explained how it all works, without giving it away!The game itself was awesome, great way to socialise and work as a team. Would recommend to anyone looking for an adventure and considers themselves the next Luther or Sherlock!

Cracked the code!. I went with 3 friends and had a great time. It was very clever in how it was set up which kept your attention all the way through. The company were very keen to keep it fun and there was interaction with helpful hints if required. We definitely will be going back to do the next room when it's released.

Exciting Experience. It was a great physical and mental challenge that leaves your heart beating full of adrenaline even after you finished!! We went as a group of 4 people, I would definitely recommend. Host was friendly and welcoming

Great fun!. I have never done an escape game before so did not know what to expect. From the beginning hon made us feel very welcome and at ease. The game was well thought out and challenging but we managed to escape with 6 minutes to spare!
Amazing. This was better than what I was expecting. I had an amazing time. I can't wait to go back when the next room is ready.

First escape experience, loved it! . I had no idea what to expect but I'm so glad we did this. Went as a group of 4 which was just about right for the size of the space. I don't want to give too much away, but expect great surprises and clues of various levels of difficulty. The story was also better than I thought it would be and it really felt like things were unfolding as we went along. The host was really welcoming and the venue is well designed. I would recommend this to anyone but it might be worth checking recommended ages beforehand - our group were all mid 20s but it might be a bit scary or difficult for children.
Great fun. One of the most interesting and exciting date nights we've had. It's so well thought out and executed that we truly felt emursed!
Amazing experience. Extremely exciting, challenging puzzles that make you think! Something different and interesting that is available to anyone, seriously gooo!!!!!!
Great escape game. A really great experience, loved it from start to finish! Well thought out clues and some good surprises!

A great and exciting experience!. I was bought this escape game experience as a gift and how pleased with it I was! I was loving every second from solving puzzles, to deciphering codes. I highly recommend this to anyone looking to have a great time!
Amazing!. This was the first Escape the Room that I had done, and it was so good! Hon was really friendly, and the game was well thought through and logical. Would recommend!

Enigma Escape - Great!. We loved the whole experience! From the warm welcome and greeting to the well thought out touches during the briefing! The escape maze tested our logical thinking and common sense submerging us in the world of 'The Killer' - if only we could do it all again but we already know how!

Incredible experience with a lovely host. Best escape room that we have been to so far! A lovely host and a very immersive experience with a lot of attention to detail from start to finish. Highly recommend it!

Immersive, Exciting, Dramatic. What can I say about Enigma Escapes...Well from start to finish this was an engaging and exciting experience for all 5 of us that attended. The effort that the host Sam has put in is evident. From the setting, to the clues and the little surprises throughout this experience did not fail to impress.Sam mentioned that he's going to be opening a second room in the next couple of months and I will certainly come back once it's opened. I'd recommend this for anyone, whether it's a team building event, date night or a family day out this will certainly get the heart racing and you'll have a lot of fun along the way.If you're reading this review then what are you waiting for, book it up now!

Fantastic Adventure!. A really great escape game - lots of great carefully thought out details, good story line, right level of difficulty and topped off by a lovely host. Looking forward to the next enigma escape!
Simple but Really Effective. A simple concept executed really well. With the odd clue at the right time the game was challenging but fair. Really entertaining hour.

Fantastic experience!. One of the best escape rooms in London right now. A bit more physical than other ones and that brings a new excitement to the experience. The storyline is correct and the difficulty is average if you've played some other similar games before.They are going to launch a new game soon so for sure I'll try it.

A Great Activity. I played the enigma escape with a team of 5 work colleagues. We all had a great time and everyone contributed to solving the enigma! Would highly recommend. Sam is a great host and we thoroughly enjoyed it.

Fantastic Escape Room!. I went to the Enigma Escape with work colleagues. We all had a great time and found the game challenging yet doable although we did need a hint! Great sense of achievement at the end and was an overall amazing immersive experience! Would definitely recommend! Sam was a great host!
Fun experience. Well thought out! We had a lot of fun - Sam, the host, was very nice and welcoming. Look forward to the next puzzle!

Incredible Experience. This was great fun! The hour flew by and really got us thinking. We played 'The Killer' in a team of 4 and the host was lovely and friendly. I would recommend this highly, it is really well thought out and cryptic! Really good fun! Would love to do it again, can't wait until Sam opens up his second game in a couple of months.

Dream come true. This was a great experience with good friends. We are avid room escape game players on the internet and this real life version, a first for us, was everything we expected and a bit more. Sam was a wonderful host (and founder!). Definitely do this - you'll leave buzzing and wanting to do more and more! Thank you, Sam!

Wow. Amazing experience. I got taken as part of my birthday surprise and I had such an amazing time. Sam our host was fun and even gave us free pop corn and drinks to start the experience. We were all buzzing afterwards and wanted to do it all over again. Definitely worth a visit- the hour goes so quickly!
Amazing!. This was a very good and well thought out experience - which is a great credit to Sam as we managed to trip over ourselves a few times, but it was great fun and well worth going!

Funnest experience I've had in London!. This was honestly super fun. So well thought out, the props were excellent and just the perfect level of difficulty. I only wish it was longer! It totally exceeded my expectations.

Fantastic fun. This was great fun! The hour flew by and really got us thinking. We played 'The Killer' in a team of 2 and the host was lovely and friendly. I would recommend this highly, it is really well thought out and cryptic!
Amazing experience!!. Went with my boyfriend and we had a great time. Highly recommended.An amazing experience! Best escape game ever!
Tell your friends. Really good fun! Would love to do it again, can't wait until Sam opens up his second game in a couple of months.
Amazing experience!. Sam is a great host. The setup is amazing and really immersive. Be prepared for a lot of fun with your friends and remember: keep the spoilers for yourself!

Great team bonding. We had fun spending time together bonding. This is great for couples and so much fun. The game has been well thought out and the problems were fun to solve. Great idea. Thank you, Sam.

Super fun and creepy! :D. Doesn't look much at first but gets really exciting (and creepy) quite quickly :D Went with friends and it was a lot of fun! Prepare for a great experience :D Good time guaranteed!

We could do it ALL DAY!. Played 'The Killer' as a group of 5, was a great intensive escape game and our host Sam was awesome!
Lots of attention to detail to set up the story and make you feel immersed in the game. Would definitely recommend this for anyone!

Sam made the experience even better. First Escape room I've been to and I did not know what to expect. We were greeted by Sam (who is the nicest guy) and went out of his way to make us feel comfortable. He introduced us to his experience and everything about this experience was awesome. #AllDay

Best so far!. I've done escape rooms in 3 countries now and this definitely takes the cake. Sam was a wonderful host, you're really made to feel like you're a part of a scenario that you have to escape from and there were lots of small touches (toffee popcorn - the best!) that really made the experience great. The puzzles were interesting, the rooms were well thought out and executed. Good variety in the types of problem solving and above all... so much fun! Recommend to everyone to try Enigma and I'll definitely be back for new rooms.
AMAZING. If you like games like '100 doors' or if you always wanted to know how being Sherlock Holmes feels like this is perfect for you. Great for couples or friends!

Great theme and innovative puzzles. My husband and I did this together and both really enjoyed it. We've done lots of Escape Rooms but this was slightly different as it had more of a story and great theme. Some of the tasks in the room were ingenious - nothing like previous rooms. It's a really innovative room, with some good challenges and puzzles. The staff were lovely too!

Amazing & different. This was something really different that I'd never done before. It went too quickly for me & will definitely be going to the next scene they create! Very very clever & thank you Hon for the awesome experience. Can highly recommend to anyone who wants to do something fun in London at low cost.

So awesome. This was our first escape room experience so we didn't know what to expect.What we got was absolutely amazing. I won't spoil it you have to experience it with your friends. The scenario is based around puzzle solving and a killer. The owner Sam had real passion for this project and I can't wait to try the next event! Definitely worth going.

Brilliant time and great host. So we did enigma escape last night it was so much fun and really challenging (in a good way). I even organised with the host to help me set up a proposal to my boyfriend during the game (as it is a leap year). Hon was great, really helpful and supportive in helping me set this upd. My boyfriend said yes so it will be a memorable experience for us! Can't wait for the new room to do it again. Highly recommend this escape room

Brilliant. We have done now 8 different escape rooms and this one was very special. It is different to any other so I would really recommend it if you are new to the escape rooms or experienced player. We were four but you could do it with only two players. I wouldn't suggest it for more than four players though.

Thoroughly enjoyed it!. We thoroughly enjoyed the room!
The puzzles were nice and logic which made it more fun than many other escape rooms!

We escaped!. What a fantastic experience! I organised this as a birthday present for my husband and we had a fabulous time. The whole concept is so cleverly done and kept us guessing but we survived with over 12 mins to go! Absolutely brilliant fun!

The Killer is fabulous. Such a fun trip to the Enigma Escape!
My husband took me here as a surprise last Sunday. We worked together for 53 mins to escape as winners!
An epic and unique evening- really got us excited!

Excellent Fun. In "The Killer" you and your companions have been kidnapped and locked in a cage - the backstory ties the puzzles together very well; everything is logical and not arbitrary and there is a good mix of physical and mental problems. Some of the areas are quite small, so although the website says you may have a group of up to five, I would recommend you take on The Killer with no more than four.On top of that, our host Sam was very friendly and welcoming, and customer service is superb! This is one of the best escape rooms out there.

Great atmosphere, logical puzzles and a few surprises!. We've done a few escape games before and this was the best. Great atmosphere throughout the whole thing, puzzles made sense and there weren't a ton of red herrings. Only needed a few clues, compared to other games where there's so much going on that you just end up looking at the screen the whole time!Recommend to anyone!
Thrilling experience!!. Did this as a birthday present from my friends. One of the most fun nights we have had in a while! Gave us a taste for more escape experiences. Would definitely recommend!

Looking forward to trying the next game. We played 'The Killer' game in a group of four and had a great time. There's a nice introduction before you go in which gives you the background story before entering the room.. There are various elements to the finding/ working out of the clues which gets everyone involved. There are also hints provided if you get really stuck. We got out with 5 minutes to spare so we were happy with our time and that we got the most out of our time in there.

Brilliant way to spend date night!. We had an fabulous time at Enigma escape. Our host Hon was really friendly and the whole experience was well organised and was designed to get our brains working! Highly recommended looking forward to the new room opening soon!

A great time with 'The Killer'. This was great fun. We were a team of 4, all involved at all times, thinking and doing to try to solve the mystery and escape the room. Good storyline requiring common sense and lateral thinking. The creator was friendly and welcoming. An excellent time had by all. Would highly recommend.

Great escape game!. I went with three friends and it was great fun. First time I've been to an escape game and it didn't disappoint. The game was difficult enough to be challenging and keep you interested the whole time. Would definitely recommend it. Looking forward to the new game in a few months.

Great Escape Room - one of the beat. I have played a LOT of Escape rooms. Some in London, Newcastle, most of the ones in Sydney and some in Spain. This one is easily one of the best. The set up of the actual place in general is good from where you're met when you arrive and then taken into a briefing room - all of it feels professional and welcoming. And the game itself - just so much fun. A lot of good attention to detail and creative clues - although everything is purely logical which is the big plus of this room. Can't say too much as don't want to ruin it but it definitely has one of my favourite moments in an escape room that I've done so far. Looking forward to the next one - thanks for a great evening. Defo worth checking out.
First Escape Room. Great fun - the owner has clearly put a lot of thought into the room. The clues flow seamlessly from one stage to the next and the room is laid out well. Recommended.

Fun, well thought out, well designed . Fourth time doing an Escape Room with friends. Enigma was more unusual in its back story and setup, and the host was welcoming. I would only recommend that the transition from the briefing room to the escape room could be more seamless to create the full immersive experience - though I appreciate this is hard to achieve. Overall very good.

Enigma Escape - excellent fun!. Had an amazing time at Enigma Escape. Hon's a cool dude and great host :) The game was so much fun, even though there were only 2 of us. Recommend you don't watch the video on their website before you go in - just take the game as it comes and you'll figure it out.

great game..and we won!!. Have been to a few of these live-action games in Hungary; kept looking out for good ones in london. Came across Enigma, and was impressed as they catered for 2-players. So me and my wife went along.Very well thought out, as it was only 2 of us playing, we probably got a few more clues then bigger groups would need, but still we managed to get out 15 seconds to go. THE BEST FEELING EVER!!

Great fun. This was our fifth escape game. It compares very positively to the other games we have done. Specifically, the clues and puzzles are logically organised to guide you through the story, and you find things where you would expect to. The level of challenge per puzzle felt about right, though we think there could be another one or two things to solve- we finished with 10 mins to spare (compared to under 2 mins for the other games we've done). Customer service the best we have received. Hon was great. Lovely touch to have popcorn at the start and a prize at the end.

Wonderful Experience at Enigma Escape. I went there with 4 friends and we had a really good time. Our host was really welcoming and took the time to explain "the game". Then we spent roughly one hour fighting to get out. The enigmas are fun -sufficiently hard to make you think but you won't be bored though-. I definitely recommend it!

Enigma Escape - The Killer review. A brilliant experience at the engima escape, I've done an escape room in Plymouth so i expected something similar but this one took me by surprise and has raised the standard to the next level! Hon was a great host, he made us feel very welcome and relaxed. Little snacks and the medallion if we escaped was a great unique selling point. Highly recommend to anyone having a trip to London and are thinking of different things to do other than usual tourist attractions!

Awesome game with an awesome theme!. Really enjoyed our time here! Hon was a great host as well! The gameplay was really interesting with different tasks to get us thinking on a Sunday afternoon! There were a few surprises which were really impressive. The props were good too which helped us immerse into the story more. This is a great experience and recommend enigma escape to anyone interested in immersive gaming! Thank you Hon!! In the future it might be good to have a ranking of where we came overall... And also a copy of the video of our experience in the rooms would have been great to watch back to see how slow we were! Hah!
A great experience. Enigma Escape was a great experience. The staff were really welcoming and the game itself was pitched at exactly the right level. I had an excellent time.

Brilliant fun!. What a fun morning it was! Just the right amount of challenge, hard enough to make you think, but not too much that you end up feeling a total noob! I don't think I've actually laughed as hard as I did when doing this challenge, thank you Hon! It was fantastic

Superb, engaging experience. This was our first escape game and I'm rather worried that we have done the best first! We had a superb day and really enjoyed the whole experience, the welcome, scene setting, story and experience itself was fantastic and we would wholly recommend it to anyone looking for am engaging activity to do!

A unique hour of absolute EPICNESS. This was the 7th escape game I have done. I have to say it had aspects that were completely unique and features which made it more thrilling, nerve racking and fun. It was the perfect combination of physical and mental tasks and the introduction to the game gave you a sense of apprehension and excitement. We talked to Hon for ages afterwards and his passion for his business was evident. We did it in a team of 2 which I thought was perfect, as I think large teams might not get as much out of the experience as teams of 2-3.Overall I absolutely loved the whole experience, and ranked 2nd out of the 7 I've done in total. Would recommend this to anyone!

Fantastic experience. This was the best escape room I have done. It differs from others as there is more hands on things to do, as opposed to pure mental puzzles! Really fun, the game was really well thought out and it is definitely an immersive experience! Also the host Hon is delightful, A++++ for customer service. Enigma Escapes have put in a lot of thought into what makes an exceptional customer experience and the game is a testament to Hon and his business partner's hard work.

Absolutely fantastic!. I would highly recommend this escape game! So much fun and definitely a unique experience! We saw that it had a high rating and it didn't disappoint. We had all our questions answered when we arrived and the host was really really excellent. Couldn't recommend this enough!!

exciting from start to finish. This was our first venture into the escape game scene and what a great way to start. The whole experience was fluent and exciting. From the moment the countdown begins you are engaged in a fantastic and atmospheric environment. Hon who is the co-creator was a fantastic host who is very passionate about the whole project and gets you pumped for what is about to happen.Will be recommending this to many friends. Great fun.

Absolutely amazing!. Have done a number of these room escape games in the past and this one was one of the best ones. Well thought-out story/rooms, and the service and small extras are absolutely great. You will have a great time!

Great fun. Hard to write a review when you don't want to spoil it - but the game was brilliant. Bought the experience for two for my boyfriend and I for his 21st birthday. We both really enjoyed ourselves, was great to work together to figure out the riddles, etc. Highly recommended! Great small touches before and during.
