Fantastic! . Just completed the escape! Amazing! Didn't go with any expectations but when we got there we were greeted by Hon who made the experience fantastic! We've never done any escape games but I'm pleased with the choice out of all that are around London! Does test your nerves and patience but the clues and the idea of everything was just beyond imaginable! Very clever and very well thought up! Can't wait to return for the next escape! Also enjoyed receiving a medal at the end! Thanks hon!

Best of the best. I have played a few of these escape room games now and this is with out a doubt the best, I don't want to give anything away as that would spoil it for others, but one thing I can say NO RED HERRINGS lol so everything you see means something making the game much more enjoyable, our host was fantastic spent time with us before going into the room and talked to us after the game, and our team did it with 14 mins spare we rocked. Really looking forward to the next room hopefully coming soon.

The best without a doubt. I have taken part in a few escape room challenges with my sister and our husbands and this is by far the best. They make it unique with the story line and the puzzles are great. The little added extras makes it just go the extra mile. I cannot fault it and cannot wait for the new room to be built.

One of the best!. Definitely one of the best room escapes we've done so far! Loved the immersive aspect of the storyline and the little extras that come with it. Managed to get out with 13minutes 18seconds to spare! Hon was a wonderful host who explained everything wonderfully and was very friendly! Would recommended to anyone!

The Killer - Escape Room. My friends and I really enjoyed our experience from the beginning to end. It really felt like a 'murder mystery film! I defintiely recommend this :) Also the owner, Hon was very sweet :) Thanks for an amazing time :D

Escape the room but not the fun!. My wife and I decided to have a go at the room escape while visiting London. It was a great experience which mixed both physical and mental challenges. We both enjoyed the story and felt the challenges, while suitably stretching, were never too difficult. There was also a with logical sense behind each puzzle and no parts felt forced. We completed the challenge as a two but the room was big enough to cater to larger teams. Hon was our host and he was a really friendly chap who was happy to talk to us after the challenge and explain how we did and where else we could go. We're looking forward to the future rooms and I'm sure we'll be back.

Loved it!!. The Killer game was amazing! Loved the story behind it, and that it was actually an immersive experience. We went as a group of 4 and had a great time, definitely different (and in my opinion better) than the other escape game concepts in London. Highly recommend!!

Liked a lot - made me.... I have been on 6 different Escape Games now and this is one of the best.The introduction and scene setting is great and gets you into the mood much better than some of the others.It was good that this game allows 2 players (range is 2-5). As there were two of us.I would say that it would be quite cramped and not much fun if 5 players tried it.I was going to say this game made me.... but I don't want to put a spoiler in!Looking forward to trying their next one when ready.
Amazing. One of the best new experiences I have had in ages - Hon is an excellent host and we were delighted to smash The Killer!

The killer game. I cannot rate this highly enough. The effort that Hon put in was greatly appreciated. There was a couple of really amazing touches that really made it memorable for us. Hon really is a great guy and I am looking forward to the next attraction

Fun, immersive, well though out. The Killer was my friend and I's first escape room and we enjoyed it greatly! The puzzles are diverse and logical and the story is fluent and gripping, making for a truly immersive experience. Our host, Sam, was very welcoming and helpful. Overall, we found it to be just the right amount of challenging - we escaped with a few minutes left (thanks to the clues we were given whenever we got stuck). There might also be extra surprises along the way.Would recommend, especially for puzzle enthusiasts. Looking forwards to trying the new room once it's ready!

Exciting, fun and challenging. We went for my partner's birthday and loved the experience. It was like being in a video game. The host was really friendly and offered great hints when we were struggling. We'd thoroughly recommend the experience whether you're just a two or a big team!

100/100. Absolutely superb way to spend time in the area. Was totally worth the value for what you got with the hour of the game. Even with 2 people it's possible to complete as we did with just 38 seconds left. Our instructor Hon was amazing and gifted us the reward for completing it with a few hints from himself. I highly recommend this and will be booking the next one when it opens.
Great experience. We just love this concept, and now can't wait to get our friends to have a go. As soon as the new one is out we will book another challenge.

Awesome event!. This is a really great way to spend an hour or so of an afternoon. The game was challenging but not impossible - there's various stages to get through and because you never know which section unlocks the final door/reveals the final clue, you're going as fast as possible right up to the last second!The game follows a story right from the 'briefing' at the start, setting the tone immediately. This briefing was done by our host, Hon, who was very friendly and professional.We were a team of 2 - another great feature, one of few escape room events that offers sessions for just 2 people.Would definitely recommend this event for teams of any size, fantastic event!Another game is being developed and I fully intend going back to attempt that one too.

Great team building event. We came as a new management team of four to have some fun getting to know each other and to see how we'd solve problems under pressure. And I have to say we had such a great afternoon. We left with a sense of accomplishment finishing the task as well as a greater understanding of each other which will be very helpful in a business context.

Highly recommended!!. I went to Enigma Escape along with my two sons (20yrs and 17yrs). We knew we were going to enjoy this experience but agreed it over delivered to our expectations. Our host Hon was very friendly and straight away made us feel at ease and explained everything clearly before we started. The actual escape was great fun, as soon as the clock started counting down we were totally immersed in the whole story and focused on working as a team. Its was certainly a roller coaster of emotions along the way and a feeling of great achievement when we completed with just minutes left. If you are travelling by car I can recommend 'JustPark' to find local car parking at reasonable prices. Can't wait for Enigma Escapes next offering...

Something different to do and great fun!. I'd been looking for something different to do that would be a bit of fun. I'd heard of escape room games. Didn't know too much about them, but found that they generally needed more than 2 people to take part, or you had to play with strangers.At Enigma Escape we could book for two. It was a really fun way to spend an hour. The time flew by. I thought we'd speeded our way through the puzzles but we finished with just 2 and a half minutes to spare.I won't give any detail away, but there were a few unexpected twists along the way.As soon as I had finished playing I wanted to do another.I'd do this again with just two of us, or a group of friends. It would also be a really good team building event.I highly recommend it.
Sweet escape. A fun yet mind challenging escape. We've just managed to escape with a minute left on the clock. Puzzles were creatively done! Definitely worth a try!

Great fun!. Booked this for a night out with friends. Some of us had done something similar before but it didn't make it any easier! Requires brain power & teamwork to succeed. We escaped with time to spare! :)

great fun. We went there for my friend's bday. I was so tired as I came straight after work but once the door closed and the count down started I got all my energy back as well as full attention. It was such a great fun and it was amazing to experience how we all worked together as a team to complete every single task in order to get out. I would definitely recommend it.

Better than I expected. This was an amazing game to play. Like point and click adventure games but in real life. The environment was set out really well and we all felt immersed in solving the clues to escape as fast as possible. Hon was a wonderful host and I will definitely be back for his next game!

Thank you for al your hints. It was overall an amazing experience!
There were just two of us in the team. Luckily the host Hong gave us lots of hints and tips to guide us through to the end.
We escaped with about 2 minutes left, phew!
I heard they will design a new game soon, so I will keep an eye out for sure! thanks!

Amazeballs!. Went with my sister last weekend. Our first ever escape room experience, and to be honest were a little worried that won't get out in time - but we did it! And loved every minute! It was so much fun and very interactive, the puzzles were difficult but not too hard. Looking forward to go again when they have the new escape room up. Highly recommend this place! And extra mention to Hon! Brilliant host!
Brilliant experience!. Was such an amazing experience. Really recommend it as a fun evening with friends! Really immersive, you forget that you're just in central london.

Amazing experience. Loved every minute of this game. It was so much fun and very interactive, the puzzles were difficult but not too hard and the person hosting (I believe his name was Hon) was very friendly. Overall it was a great attraction and I would love to go again when they have the new escape room up.

Enigma activity. Amazing day! My girlfriends brother tried this in Budapest so we thought we would try it here.So glad we tried this here as Hon was really friendly and helpful and the game was really challenging!Will definitely be coming back for Hons next game!

Good fun!. It was just the two of us, we were bit scared how we would manage, but we completed the escape :)! It was professionally organised, and clever hints came through if we seemed to be stuck for too long. The puzzles were interesting and challenging, we had an amazing time!

Our first foray into live escape games and we loved it!. My boyfriend and I booked to do Enigma Escape 'The Killer' for my birthday. I'd wanted to try a live escape game for a while but there aren't that many you can do as a team of two, so we settled on Enigma Escape after reading all the good reviews. It definitely didn't disappoint! I had a good idea of what kind of stuff to expect from the game as I have played the online versions, and I also watched the video on the website. (HINT: If you want to go in completely blind I would advise NOT watching the video on the website before playing this game; it was helpful to get an idea of what the game would be like but it did contain some spoilers). The game was a good level of difficulty - challenging but when you felt like you were stuck you had the option of helpful hints on the screen. It was very hands on and there was a good variety of puzzles to solve. We made it out with 3 mins to spare, and when we finally burst through the exit door our adrenaline was really pumping! We can't wait to try another escape game and will definitely be back when the new Enigma Escape game opens in a few months.Hannah and Gary

Great escape the room experience!. It is one of the only games in London that offers a game for two players, and at a very good price (half compared to some others). Engaging and story driven (which was nice, no real 'randomness'), The hints were very helpful, did not give away too much but put you on the right track when things seemed to get frustrating. Overall, excellent, would definately recommend.

We'll be coming again!. I booked this for a group of friends, as I wanted something hands on and different to do. After looking at the puzzle rooms that London have to offer, I decided on the Killer at Enigma escape - as the story is more immersive and has a bit of an edge (plus we're horror fans!). Didn't disappoint, the story was fun, the clues were great, Hon was a lovely host and has paid attention to detail throughout. It's easy to get to from Holloway underground station too.Thanks - we'll be here again for your next story!

So much fun- recommend to anyone!. The whole experience was fantastic from start to end. Wasn't sure what to expect as this was our first escape room, but it was just amazing! We completed as a team of 2 and escaped with 5 minutes to spare. Would recommend to anyway- go and do it!
Amazing Experience. I can't recommend this experience enough! Hon was a brilliant host and my friends and I can't wait for the new game! We will for sure, be signing up ASAP.

Fab time escaping the crazy killer!. We were a group of 4 girls, with only one member having taken part in an escape game before. We had a brilliant, and at parts a scary, time!! Lovely little extras at the beginning and end of the game. Cant wait for them to open their second room. Will definitely be returning.

Such fun. What a fun and different night.
Me and my girlfriend both came out smiling and laughing.
I won't give anything away but I thought it well worth the price.
Just book.

So tense!. The challenge is done really well - you really feel like the scenario is actually happening! Couldn't recommend this highly enough, and Sam the owner is so lovely and passionate about the game! Will definitely be going back when he opens a new challenge!

Crystal maze eat your heart out!! . Didn't really know what to expect. Super fun, entertainment and challenging. Worked out great with 4 people. Would definitely do it again (different game). Our host 'Hon' was brilliant.
Amazing. Hon was an amazing host. The game was everything we hoped it would be and more. Rest assured we'll be returning to partake in the new game when it is finally finished.

Good fun. We did it as a group of 2 and managed to get out with 12 minutes to spare (though it was not our first escape game).
The puzzles are well layed out, there's a logic sequence and interesting story.

Challenging, a little scary and a lot of fun. We did this room with just two of us and managed to escape. The theme carries well and the puzzles fit quite naturally within the narrative. The host was very friendly. Will definitely return for the next room!
Excellent birthday activity. The host, Sam, was so nice and accommodating. The game was amazing and so fun. Such an adrenaline rush! Lots of nice little touches. Highly recommend!!

The Killer. So much fun! Such a great experience. We managed to escape but only just! One minute to spare. Will definitely be going back soon!
Sam is a great host who explains the game really well and goes over and above for you on your visit.

Authentic & engaging escape experience. Having seen enigma escape on the timeout article I decided to take 3 others with me to try enigma. I've tried other scape games but this game was a very genuine and adrenaline fuelled experience - and really good in a group of 4! Unlike others with riddles and puzzles this was more hands on and a better fit for the adrenaline junkies who would like a more hands on experience since you are dealing with 'the killer'. A great one for the guys and those looking for a more adrenaline fuelled experience! Throughly enjoyed and would definitely recommend! Our host Hon was so fab and really welcoming - all round great guy! Added touches were when they offered snacks as part of the experience and memorabilia at the end. These added touches and his great hosting completed the whole experience!
The host was great. It was a really fun experience and the host was extremely welcoming, would definitely recommend! Will most definitely be going again for the new game.
A great London experience to share with friends. Thank you Hon for such a thrilling experience we can't wait until the next one! This is such a fantastic idea and would make a perfect surprise gift
Enigma Escapes. Great fun and would highly recommend for anyone interested in doing fun things in London. Great hospitality and overall a great game.

Excellent and cannot recommend it enough. Four of us took the challenge and managed to escape with our lives! While there we learned that Hon (one of the owners) is working on a new challenge room. All four of us will definitely be returning to try it out. That's how good an experience we had.Some particularly positive things:* Hon was friendly and funny; an excellent host* Surprise bonuses and extras!* The room oozed quality in its construction* The puzzles were varied and logically consistent* Some great twists during the escape* Reasonable priceSo why only 4/5 rather than top marks? A couple of very minor slips stop it from getting a perfect score.* The backstory is told through an overlong and not very informative animation if you haven't read the story on the website* WHY do you only have 1 hour to escape? (perhaps add "live CCTV footage" to the countdown clock?)* A small slip in internal logic near the very endThese things only affect the "immersive" quality of the experience and don't detract from the escape itself. Nevertheless, it's a bit like the difference between Alton Towers and Disneyworld and these little things do matter.
Funnnnnn!!!!!!. All four of us had a fabulous time, tremendous fun. Didn't realise we were such eejits, needed a few clues to get out. We had a ball and would recommend it to all.
Great entertainment. Good fun. Highly recommended. I've done a couple of escape games before and this was definitely as fun as anything else!
Brilliant experience. We had such a good time. As soon as it was over we wanted to do it again! Why a clever game. It's a great time. I encourage all to try.

Amazballs!. Me and my boyfriend survived The Killer Escape and survived working along side each other lolWe had an amazing time, it will make you use every bit of intelligence you have from logic, to physical and commen sense. We can't wait for the new room to open so we can have another go!
Great Fun. ACE! good fun all round, would recommend to a friend and would go back again for the next version!!!

Surprise 40th present. Hon and his business partner were very welcoming and professional. The Killer was so much fun, not easy at all and full of surprises. A real achievement to have completed it! Thanks again and will look forward to visiting the next game...
P.S the popcorn and drinks also made it that little bit more special.

SOOOO GOOD!!. We had such a great time playing (and surviving, woo!) The Killer at Enigma Escape. It was tense from the second the door closed behind us, to the second we got out! The game has a great story and Hon was an awesome host, we will definitely be back for the next game...cannot wait!!

Everyone should try this!. This was absolutely brilliant. I could not recommend it more! The game itself was so clever and well thought out. Our game host was so accommodating and nice. We left buzzing. Cannot wait for them to open more games!

So much fun!. We went for a friends birthday and had never been to anything like this. We didn't know what to expect! It was so much fun and we managed to get out! Will definately be coming back when they bring out their next one!
A great challenge!. Had a great time. Well organised and we'll thought out with great service. A really good experience!
Amazing. Compared to other escape rooms I've been to. This one was really well thought out and the service was excellent!

What A Blast!!!. This is definitely one of the best attractions in all of London. Hon is a friendly and great host and will see that you have nothing short of a great time. Definitely well worth it !!

60 mins of mystery and fun!. My colleagues and I really enjoyed 'The Killer' at Enigma Escape! 60 mins seems like a lot in the beginning, but as you discover new puzzles (and some of them are quite challenging) time seems to be running out so much faster. Great host + amazing experience = can't wait for the next one! Highly recommended!

An awesome way to spend 60 minutes. Was booked this for my birthday as a surprise. It was brilliant! my only complaint is that it felt like it was over too quickly! But they say time flies when you're having fun! This was super awesome! I would recommend teams of max three as it isn't spacious... but 100% worth dong!

Best escape room so far.... I have taken part in 6 escape rooms, 1 in Berlin and the others in the UK. All of which have been varied in experience, but Enigma Escape was by far the best. Totally involved in the story right from the off, many surprises along the way! Best 42 mins ever!! Thank you for making the game! Can't wait to try out your new one in the summer!

Intense modern escape experience. We really enjoyed 'The Killer' at Enigma Escape. There were some great modern twists on escape games (without giving too much away) that were a great point of difference from other Escape Rooms we've done. Difficult but achievable, and great fun. Highly recommend.

The Best Immersive Game I've Done. I've done a couple escape room games before this, but this one tops the list! I did it in a group of two, and we got out with 1:37 to spare, close call. it's challenging, and frightening at times, but achievable and practical! Our game host (Hon) was fantastic and helpful, making the experience more enjoyable. the layout was fantastic, with one or two problems needing to be solved before you could move on. overall, FANTASTIC, and would definitely recommend to anybody looking for a fun, challenging group activity

Awesomeness awaits. I booked this for a surprise birthday activity after seeing a write up online and it ruled so hard! Moments of panic, shock, frustration and victory are all included in the time you'll spend here that is all over to quickly! I will be booking the next game as soon as it's ready. Thank you guys! Keep up the good work!
60 mins that you don't want to miss!!!!!!. I went into this reluctantly, but Sam has absolutely smashed this to bits. So well thought out and real good fun!

Immersive!. Wasnt sure what to expect as the reception was fairly small and narrow with not much going on! But once inside the room we were pleasantly surprised! We played the Killer and had a great time. Nothing but positive comments and the guys running the place are really cool, Logical and common sense thinking are required in order to escape!

An amazing experience. From the moment we walked in we were greeted by Sam which only added to the amazing experience we had. The set up was well thought of and I'm really glad we came here! Looking forward to the next game and will definitely be recommending this to friends!
Awesome!. We had an amazing time. Sam's a great host, the mystery and story unfold fantastically an the puzzles are just tricky enough to keep you guessing and make you feel smart for solving them
Good escape game. The Killer.. Good escape room. Senario is surprising. Escape based on regular lockpads puzzles and technologic devices. Very good moment.
Great experience. The game was reallt fun and challenging, plus useful hints that didn't spoil the game. I would highly recommend to anyone.

Best Escape Room in London!. Fantastic escape room for newbies or connoisseurs! If you're looking for a fun afternoon out with friends or even just as a couple -- Engima Escape is it! My husband and I have done something like 25 escape rooms all over the US and Europe and we were BLOWN AWAY by this room. Their attention to detail is awesome. You feel like you're in a movie, solving a crime and catching the killers. Hon, our host, was very welcoming right off the bat. The room and waiting area is clean and well maintained. Enigma Escape goes that extra mile to make you feel like you're getting a real experience -- not just locking you in a room. The puzzles are challenging but rewarding, and they're logical and based on a cool story you can actually follow. This is one of the best escape rooms we've ever done! Cannot wait until they open a second room. We'll definitely be back.NOTE: This room has some MILDLY scary bits, so it's not for young children. 18+ only!

Fantastic birthday experience!. I took my boyfriend here for his birthday. He's big into gaming and puzzles and this was the perfect experience for him. Initially I didn't expect that it would be my type of thing, but within 5 minutes I was as into it as he was! I couldn't fault the experience in anyway and I would highly recommend. Engaging, challenging and, most of all, fun!

Brilliant time with friends. I can't recommend this highly enough! I was invited by a friend who'd already done an escape room before and was a bit sceptical at first. The place was easy to find and we were greeted by our really friendly host Hon. Without wanting to spoil the story, we were given a bit of background and immediately the mood was set. As soon as it started we were all really into it trying to solve each puzzle we encountered. I was pleasantly suprised to see the puzzles came in many forms and got us all racking our brains to progress, piecing bits of the storyline together as we went along. I can't say too much but the last part of our escape was fantastic. Can't wait to see what the guys at Enigma Escape are preparing for their next story!If you're looking for a really fun, exciting, social and different way to spend an hour after work or during the weekend, this is definitely worth trying out!
Awesome. Great night outGreat value ,Can't wait for more rooms Makes you think outside of the box , very addictive concept that's gets you wanting more.

Non stop fun!. Right from the start Hon, made us feel welcome and he was incredibly polite. He explained everything well and made it all very clear. Then the game itself was intense and gripping, but if you do get stuck Hon will help. Remember all props in the room could be a clue! All in all, it is a great experience and I would definitely come back again!

Awesome room escape!. My girlfriend and I have visited a room escape previously, and had an idea of what to expect. However, this lived up to the expectation... and more! On entry, we were offered complimentary drinks and snacks whilst watching the intro story to our experience. From there the puzzles were really good fun, and challenging. Not only did it require logical problem solving, but involved good teamwork (and a little trial and error!) to get through. Really well made game, and Hon was a great host!

Fab game. Loved doing this game yesterday. Really good experience. We were warmly welcomed and the treats were a great touch, especially as we were successful at escaping! A good afternoon's entertainment.Highly recommended...we're looking forward to the new room they're developing and will be back for that!
Christmas present . Had a great experience! An fun but difficult challenge, we would highly recommend. Good luck Hon! Looking forward to the next game.

21st birthday!! So much fun!!. Hon (the host) was amazing! Something really fun and really different to do! Challenging to say the least but such a laugh when you're with friends! Better the expected will highly recommend it to anyone will definitely be doing another escape room soon!
Great fun. I've done a lot of Escape Rooms and this was definitely one of the best. Very logical, professional and a few surprises along the way!

Bloody fantastic! Highly recommended!. The Killer at Enigma Escape was a brilliantly prepared and brilliantly thought-out challenge with a mixture of interactive and logic puzzles which kept us on our toes for the entire experience. Highly recommend! Thanks, Sam.

Fantastic Time. We were a team of two and had a great time working through the game and the clues. Really clever and well though out. Can wait for Sams second game to be ready, would highly recommend.

Awesome!. An amazing escape game with challenging puzzles!. The game is really intense and fully immerses you into the feeling of being on a mission to escape. It's a well designed by an awesome guy who is an excellent host. Thoroughly recommended for new and experienced escape artists!
Enigma escape. Had a really good time last night at enigma escape, can't wait for the next one! Had 30 seconds to spare!

Extremely fun and. I visited Enigma Escape with my partner, and we really enjoyed the whole set up. Our host, Sam, was very helpful in explaining how everything works, and even provided us with some snacks, which was a nice touch.We then jumped into the the background plot of the escape, ground rules (eg. don't break anything in the room that doesn't look like it's meant to be broken), and then of course we were locked in our room and had to find a way to escape.The escape itself was great, evolving in a way I didn't expect it to. It certainly made my heart race, and for the last 20 minutes I was genuinely worried we would not be able to escape in time. Hints didn't give too much away; they came at the right time and said the right things.Overall a fantastic experience and highly recommended!

Loved every second. This was my first escape game and I am hooked! Host was amazing and super friendly, will definitely be coming back when the next room is ready. Loved the story and had a great mix of puzzles. Definitely got my brain working. Love love love

Fun and interesting experience!. it was really enjoyable - neither of us had experienced an escape room before and this provided us with a challenging and exciting hour! Our host was lovely and provided us with hints where necessary (although this was optional) and provided refreshments beforehand. All round good time, would recommend.

amazing experience. It was amazing for a first time escape room experience. very well designed rooms, great mixture of puzzles. Everything was spot on, friendly hosts, nice refreshments ( popcorn was off the charts ). very easy to find location with plenty of public transport. can not go wrong with the hour of fun unless you get done by THE KILLER!!!!!! Will visit again when new room is complete.

Thrilling experience!. This was my first escape room experience ever and it was an absolute blast. Starts out quite easy and then becomes a lot more difficult! You really feel the time pressure towards the end, and at some points it's convenient that your host (in our case the awesome Hon) points you in the right direction, or reminds you of certain details that you may have overlooked. Great setting, really immersive experience, you forget about the outside world and feel that all you can focus on is escaping! Wholeheartedly recommend for an afternoon activity with friends (but perhaps not more than 4 if you want to make sure that everyone is doing something at all times!)

Great Escape Room. Had a wonderful time, too my sister and her partner and they loved it. Think they are keen to do any new ones they open. Run very professionally and a lot of fun. Plus great for us as live in Highbury but close to tube.

Eigma escapes. This was an excellent day out our host was fantastic and very friendly. Everyone should try this great for all ages. It was very cleverly set up for a small space. Also made us jump at one point! Cant wait for the next game to be ready

Beyond Excellent. Had such a fantastic experience playing the Killer at Enigma Escape. The owner was a great host and the escape game was really good fun yet suitably challenging. Student discount was an added bonus.

Great challenging fun. I run events and live action games so I didn't want to get my hopes up here, but I was very happily surprised. Not as abstract or skill based as Crystal Maze, but just as fun and more team orientated. We played The Killer and although it was relatively light on the narrative it never lagged in pace and the difficulty level was just hard enough that we never resented the odd clue. Hour well spent and great fun. Professionally run and committed to the theme! Highly recommended for people who like theatrical hands-on puzzles wrapped in a story.

Amazing escape room. highly recomend. We recently completed Enigma Escape’s The Killer escape room. This was our escape room and we really enjoyed it. Hon our host was great and gave us a very warm welcome and offered us hints and tips throughout the game if we were struggling. We did the escape room as a pair which worked very well as we were both kept busy the whole time. It was a good mix of physical tasks and mental problem solving and very well themed. It flowed in a good logical order and we managed to escape with 7 mins to spare. I would highly recommend Enigma Escapes for anyone looking to do an exciting (tiny bit scary in parts) escape room. The best part is the strong theming and the suitability for couples to complete it.

Great way to kill an hour.... Really enjoyed this escape game which was themed The Killer. So many puzzles, clues and games to play that the hour flew by and we got out with 3 minutes to spare! Definitely recommend!

Amazing even for 2 people teams!!!. Our game (hosted by Sam) was amazing!! We went as a couple and had so much fun and escaped with a few minutes left! It was our first escape game experience and we were pleased with all the twists and turns and interesting problems to solve with some fun & scary surprises along the way (and a couple of hints when we got stuck)! We had a hard time finding an escape game in London suitable for a 2 person team - definitely recommend this one if that's what you're looking for (or small groups of friends or groups interested in team building)! :) Sam took care of us from beginning to end and he clearly cares a lot about making sure everyone has an awesome experience. We'll definitely be back when the next game is ready!Just a couple of notes - a washroom is available, some lovely snacks are provided at the start to get everyone into the scenario, and it's very easy to access from Holloway Road station (also felt very safe!).

An escape game that you definitely need to try. Super friendly host and very thoughtful in designing the game. They will send you reminder before the arrival, very warm welcoming and detailed in explaining. Prompt help during the game and very nice post-game services. Definitely recommend and will return when they build another room!
Fantastic puzzle time hooray!. Had an amazing time with four friends who all loved it. Challenging but not infuriating. A fantastic way to down an evening with friends.

Great!. Once of the only escape rooms we could find for just 2 people. Hon was great and helped us along the way just enough not to ruin the fun of working bits out for ourselves. Thoroughly enjoyed ourselves and keen to do the next Enigma game when it's ready!

A Challenging, fun experience - deff recommend!. This was so much fun! It was a challenging experience, with a really well thought out story and puzzles. I was looking for something for all my siblings to do (ages 16 to 30) and this was definitely the answer! Don't hesitate and book! Hon was super nice and cool and we had a great time, can't wait for the next experience!

The Great Escape - we survived!!. This was our first escape room and we had a great time! We didn't know what to expect but we really enjoyed the challenge, a great day out for a couple if you think your teamwork is up to it!! Some really interesting bits to it and Hon (our host) was really clear and friendly! All in all a great time, can't recommend it enough!

Fantastic escape experience. My boyfriend booked this for me and him as a surprise and it was brilliant, you really immerse yourself into the experience, I wont say too much as I dont want to give away any clues, but I would 100% recommend this for small groups 5 maximum and great for couples too :) x A big thank you to Hon aswell for his great hospitality.

Really good fun and very intriguing!. Had an excellent time at Enigma Escape. The story line was engaging, the escape room was well kitted out and the whole experience was very enjoyable. Will return when they build another room!

Great fun!. I, along with 4 friends, confronted "The Killer" yesterday. Fun and laughter (And a few girlie screams) were had by all. Well worth going if you like this kind of problem solving activity. I don't want to say too much and give spoilers away, but it really does make you think and more importantly bond and work as a team to escape. A great fun activity, and I hope the guys at Enigma are able to expand and add more rooms in the future!!!
Marvellous afternoon with friends. We thoroughly enjoyed enigma escape! Hon was very friendly and explained everything well. The game was a brilliant set up and great fun. Definitely recommend!

Challenging fun time!. My wife and I had a rough idea what to expect but it was our first time in any kind of escape game and we thought we'd try it on our trip to London.We had a lot of fun trying to solve the clues and did pretty well. We managed about 3/4 of the game in the hour time limit but, without giving too much away, we were stumped by a piece of electronic equipment which we had never used before (in other words a certain level of tech savviness is needed to successfully complete the latter part of the game).Overall it was great fun and the clues were well timed and helped point our thinking in the right direction.If this company were to create another game, we would have no hesitation in trying that one too next time we come to London.

Atmospheric, challenging - great!. My second escape room and the best so far: very atmospheric with challenging puzzles in a logical progression, so you're never stuck thinking what to do next. Brilliant!

Prepare to be amazed. My friends and I had the joy of taking part in 'The Killer' and have never had so much fun! From the concept to Sam himself, it was something I will never forget. I would definitely recommend Enigma Escape if you want an adventure, want to find out about yourselves, or just scream.Brilliant. Hope to visit again soon! Thank you!!! A
Superb!. I have been to many escape rooms, but this was definately one of the best I have been to! Great host, fun and availabe for 2 players!

Amazing fun! Highly Recommend!. Had so much fun doing this. The hour flew by and there were lots of little surprises along the way that I loved. Slick operation run by really nice guys who deserve success! Couldn't recommend more. 7.08 remaining! Boom!

A Killer Experience.. Very well themed escape room with some new puzzle types I hadn't seen before. Well themed and use of multimedia was good. Great rewards at the end of the game. Had a fun experience and will definately be back for the new room.

Great activity for all. What a brilliant activity - we had so much fun! I escaped the room with my mum and sisters as a birthday celebration for my mum and it really suited all our abilities. I'd recommend this to friends and family as a group activity although I would recommend to keeping the group size to a max of 4.The game was challenging but not impossible, the 'Killer' storyline made this all the more fun and our host was very welcoming. Pre-game drinks and snacks and prizes afterwards gave this activity an added extra. The only reason I've not given it 5 stars is because I wished it could have lasted longer!
Fantastic!. Best escape room we have ever done, fantastic puzzle fantastic store awesome host! Please make more rooms so we can come back soon!

Amazing time!. We did a short visit to London and as we love doing Room Escapes in Barcelona, we thought we could try one in England. The experience was amazing from beginning to end. Our host Hon was fantastic! We truly recommend this experience. It was a great challenge for two people. Thank you so much

Fantastic time. Booked as surprise for my husband for his birthday, from start to finish a fantastic way to spend an hour. From the snacks on arrival to the the photograph/prize at the end it was very well run. I would definitely recommend it.

Wicked!. Had such a wicked time at enigma escape! Would definatley recommend to everyone! A lot better than expected and the host was fantastic! Will defiantly be going again when the new game is created!

Excellent flow, very good balance!. First, the owner has been very friendly and from the minute you arrive you can feel his passion about the game. There was an excellent flow in the way the story goes on, very good balance among the different skill sets required to solve the riddles and unlock each mystery. Clever room, nice atmosphere and a very concrete theme. Definitely recommended to anyone who wants to try an escape game in London. Looking forward to the second room.
Excellent Fun. The guy that welcomed us was super friendly and the actual puzzle was very enjoyable. A good level of challenge and the option to have clues was useful

Hurry up and open the next escape room!. I've done both HintHunt games and thought they were brilliant so I booked this expecting something similar. But it's even better! There's so much that's been thought out: from the initial cinema style screening explaining the back-story to the scenario you're about to be placed in (with popcorn and drinks), to lots of other things that I probably shouldn't mention as I don't want to give too much away! The game is so well thought out and logical, with no random puzzle solving - it all makes complete sense within the storyline. I did feel it was a little easy compared to the ones I've done before - but not everyone gets out so maybe my team were just exceptionally brilliant (combined with our experience giving us a bit more of a heads up in how to start tackling it)! Our host, Sam (who was great), mentioned they are currently building another escape puzzle and we will definitely be booking that one as soon as it's open.
Loved it!. This was such good fun, well organised and Hon was a great host. Would highly recommend having a go!

Brilliant time. I took my sister for her birthday, so there were just two of us. We had such a laugh. The game was really good, and challenging. Will definitely be returning once the second game opens!

A great way to do something different. Heard about Enigma Escape from a friend how had a great time. Went for a birthday outing as we were looking for something different to rather than the usual dinner/drinks. Definitely didn't disappoint! The puzzles were logical and challenging. Everyone was able to join in and work together to solve them without anyone having to do all the work. If you enjoyed The Crystal Maze from yesteryear then this is definitely one to try.
Great experiance. We had a great time. Perfect team is 4 people, i think 5 might be too crowded. Hon was a good and fun host :)

Very interesting room with lots of puzzles. I visited about 15 different quest rooms but this room impressed me the most. There are unusual and interesting puzzles. We had a team of 4 people and didn't have anyone who was bored, each found a job.I recommend this escape room.

Great stuff. Visited the Enigma Escape today and really enjoyed the whole experience. The host, Hon, was very good and explained exactly what we had to do. If we got stuck he gave us hints to move on. All in all a very enjoyable hour which I would definitely recommend.

AWESOME!!! Want to go again!!! . I booked this as a surprise trip for my friends birthday and we both loved every second of it!! It's so well put together and the staff are very friendly and explain everything you need to know. Before you know it you're locked in and trying to escape. The puzzles are hard enough but not impossible to solve and once you get cracking your brain gets into gear! We finished the game within the hour and got a cool prize and photo. We wish it could have been 2 hours long to get even more out of it. We will be telling all of our friends to go check it out! If you have a spare hour in London it's well worth a visit!!! It is like being in the crystal maze tv show and is a lot of fun! Thoroughly recommend it!

Excellent Room Escape Game. Room escape game, ie game revolving around finding clues and solving ingenious puzzles in order to escape a locked room I less than 60 minutes.In this case slightly more emphasis is placed on solving a mystery. Well presented and pretty slickly put together with some interesting features not encountered before. Worth a visit if this type of game has already been tried, definitely worth a visit if not

What a great night out!. We had just the most fun, it was great to do something to different with our Saturday night. I was a little worried I would be left behind, but the experience really allowed us all to be involved and get thoroughly caught up in the experience. Thanks all involved for making it so fun.

Escaping before the time runs out. I went with my family of four, consisting of two parents and two teenagers, we had an amazing time racing against the clock and trying to solve the puzzles. It was the perfect level of hardness and wasn't to frustrating. The experience was filled with fun surprises and i would defiantly recommend it to all mystery lovers and fans of the old tv show crystal maze.

The most fun activity in the City!. Went in January as a surprise birthday gift for a friend, for of us in total. Hon introduced us to the theme of the game and after an intro video were in "The Killer" room.It was so much fun working out the puzzles, they're not too easy but also not so hard thay it's frustrating, plus the hints provided were very good too. They didn't tell you what to do, instead they act as a prompt to change your way of thinking. It felt great working together as some people tried to work out clues and others explored to see what they could find.Cannot recommend this enough, this was our first time trying this type of activity and we'll definitely do it again! Also for anyone concerned, the room size is not too claustrophobic. My friend managed it and they struggle with small rooms, so please don't let that put you off if you're worried about it!Hon is clearly very passionate about this project and he really makes it special, thanks for a great time!

Had a killer time.. Enjoyable and fun escape room. Puzzles were varied and tricky but not not frustrating. Weent with a team of 4 and had a lot of fun plus the theme for this was well done with a nice little video intro. Sam is a very pleasant host for this and I would recommend this to anyone who enjoys these kind of things.
good. It was really fun and intense at some parts! There was enough time to get used to the task and then complete it if you follow the instructions! Definitely recommend.
Escaping the Killer is a great evening!. Had a lot of fun. Great storyline and really worth doing. I'd recommend a group of 4! It's definitely different and the hour flies by!

Amazing host - Amazing game. Enigma escape really stands out as one of the only places to offer this type of experience for 2 people. The experience is really made by the enthusiasm and care put into it by its host - Sam. It is carefully constructed and perfectly themed with tonnes of hidden extras to discover as you go. I could not rate this experience highly enough. Even if you are slightly considering something like this I would recommend you book a trip now

AMAZING!!!. Came here with my friend as a surprise birthday present and we literally had the best time ever! Only two of us and we nearly completed it, we only needed like a couple of extra minutes. Really easy to find as well, so close to the train station! SOOO much fun, would definitely go to another by Enigma Escape! LOVED IT

Great fun; something different!. My husband and I played this game as an alternative New Year's Eve celebration with some friends and it was great fun! The puzzles are logical but also reflect real-life situations, meaning you don't need to be a genius to work them out, just use common sense. That's not to say they were easy; 3 of us have PhDs yet we still found it challenging enough to be fun. It was also highly immersive, like you were acting out a real-life situation, not just locked in a room solving random puzzles. Would highly recommend!

A fun, unexpected day. Had such an amazing day! Went for a friend's birthday, and she was thrilled with it! Especially loved how it linked to Dexter - one of the best TV shows ever! So so so impressed and can't wait for future games!

Fantastic Part of Our Trip. I recently visited Enigma Escape as part of a day out in London. This was part of a Christmas present to our family and it went down excellently. Very hospitable and looked after. A lovely family run business. So much fun for everyone, even the mother in law liked it :). All in all very enjoyable.
Would highly recommend . Visited enigma escape as a group of 4 a s would highly recommend for something different to do. We'll be returning when enigma escape's bank heist escape is up and running!

Excellently designed and executed game. Went with a 2 friends as part of a send-off do - the game was pitched at the right level, not too easy, not strupidly difficult either. It's not rigged in any way, and not everyone gets out in time! The hints were good in that they didn't give too much away as wellSome of the items didn't work perfectly, but this was quickly rectified and we were given an extra couple of minutes in recognition of this, and it didn't have any effect on how much we enjoyed it.The game itself was original, exciting and had some brilliant surprises - the adrenaline was pumping for the whole hour! Hon was really friendly, very attentive and explained everything really well.Would wholeheartedly recommend this! I can't wait for the next one to come out, as we'll be going to that one too!
Brilliant!. It's definitely worth trying. Great fun. They'll give you a very fun introduction and the ending is fun too.

Enigma Escape the Killer. This was a great afternoon for both me and my partner. Our host was super friendly and we were even offered snacks and a drink! Fantastic fun for someone who doesn't take life too seriously. Thank you Enigma Escape and we're bound to be back again soon!

Amazing!. The whole experience was fun and immersive!
Great Story and Hon was an amazing host.
I would definitely recommend this escape room to everyone!

Best fun we had as a family in London. We went to this place as recommended by timeout. We have been to many escape games before, and I can tell you that you will not be dissapointed here.
The game is logical and terrifyng at some point. Hahaha....
We had so muchh fun. The host is really nice too. Thanks...!

Great puzzles, cool story and just the right amount of scary. This is the second escape room I have done and this was fantastic. There is a good blend of physical and logical puzzles with good attention paid to a fun horror plot. The game is paced amazingly well and escaping is achievable with only 2 people (but only just). The hints provided are great as well and help to keep the game moving on trickier sections

A great puzzle for first timers, veterans may leave wanting more. Enigma Escape was a very enjoyable escape room, with some really clever clues and puzzles to solve. It did an excellent job of starting with slower clues and ramping up the difficulty as the game went on - perfect for a first timer. For someone who has done escape rooms before though (and without giving anything away for people that are new to this type of game) I felt it was a bit easy given it's length and could benefit from another stage. Something that set this game apart from others was the little additions of medals, snacks etc. A nice touch and feels less like you're just being shunted through an obstacle course for your money. A friendly atmosphere and Hon was very nice.Either way, i'd recommend it and I look forward to trying the new room they're working on...

40th Birthday treat. If you're looking for something different to do, this comes highly recommended. It was fun, stimulating and pretty exhilarating by the end. A great time was had by all 5 of us.Sam, our host was great too.
Great fun!!. Great escape room, with lots of logical games and not too many things to find! Definitely we will be back when the second room is open. Thanks Hon!!

Fantastic experience with excellent and friendly service!. Highly recommended escape experience. The props and puzzles were very good indeed and in keeping with the main quest itself which is ideal! The setting and service was first class. Hon (apologies if I spelt this wrongly) was very friendly from the start. We can't wait for another room from the team!!
Awesome. Amazing set up and really intense immersive game, lots of fun and will be back for the second room when it's open. Will definitely keep an eye out for it
Loved it!. A lot of work and thought was clearly put into this immersive experience. Challenging and fun - we had a great time - I highly recommend.

Excellent . I sent daughter and her friends along for her birthday - they are all aged 15 and they came back with rave reviews! All four said it was really good, engaging, challenging , great fun and most importantly something very different and cool! The hosts were great and it's so good to see exactly why they get so many five star reviews here. I will be going back myself with friends very soon!
Enigma Escape London. Thanks Sam for a great adventure escaping your serial killer scenario. An intriguing and challenging new experience. Can't wait for the next one.

Fun couple challenge!. Great problem solving challenge figuring out clues to order to escape the room & "the killer". Enjoyed cracking open the padlocks, finding secret doors & putting puzzle pieces together. Good storyline & useful hints to help us along the way. We enjoyed this more than another escape room we had been to as it was more logical, however we we more on the ball to get started & raid for clues this time!

Amazing experience!. This far exceeded our expectations and was the best escape game we've been to so far in London. The story unfolds the more you play the game and the clues really make you think! I'm looking forward to Sam's next game which will be out in a few months.

Amazing experience!. I was expecting the escape to be good, but not as good as it was! From the moment the key turned behind us in the lock we were immersed in the experience. All the puzzles were fun and interesting; that along with the backing story lead to an amazing, fun and exhilarating experience. If you get chance to visit definitely do!
Amazing experience. Really well designed and thought out game. Seriously challenging and fun! Managed to get an amazing score with 3 people. Sam, who designed and hosted the game did a great job.

Just like Saw, only less traumatic!. A friend took me along to Escape for my 40th birthday present with 3 other mates and we had a fantastic time. Having been friends for 28 years had turned us into a great team. Would recommend to anyone. Thanks

Enigma Escape - awesome challenge!. I'd not heard of these escape sessions before, but being a Crystal Maze fan, thoughts this would be a lot of fun. Five of us had a brilliant time putting our brains to the test to work out how to escape a series of tricky situations. This game kept on getting better and better and we all were pumped when we got out, and continued to be excited by the whole thing for the rest of the day! 5 stars from me, great activity.
Superb. Great idea. Way better than other escape games. Huge fun. A real challenge with a great mix of brain puzzles. Easy to get to as well
Awesome. Brilliant, only negative is that we would have loved it to be longer, maybe we were just too quick!!!

Unforgettable. This was the first time we'd tried an escape game and what a great experience!! We played The Killer and it was a very intriguing setting as well as fun to solve! We all had a lot of fun playing the game.Also, our game host (Sam) was very welcoming and fun- his service was amazing!!Can't wait for the next one, we'll definitely come again. I encourage anyone to try it!
Amazinggg! Recommend to all. I went for my birthday and it turned out to be even better than I expected! Its really good for team building and improving communication
Great game. Great game for team building. Didn't want it to end. Hoping there will a longer game out to play soon!
Great Escape. Really well put together escape room. It was my 14 year old daughters first experience and she loved it.I'm looking forward to more rooms in the future.
The killer escape. Good fun, well put together and great value for the hours experience. Well worth a try. Looking forward to the next one.

Brilliant. A really well thought out 'escape the room' game. Lots of details and logical thinking that made this a step above other escape games. Also great because you can do it with two people -- although it is much harder!!
Fabulous . Had a fab time here today with four friends. We are now the current record holders - can't wait for them to build another room :)
Really good, mind-provoking fun. A great concept, a great scenario, and a great host. Thanks again, look forward to the new game you're launching soon!

Fantastic way to spend an hour. Great fun for all the family, everyone had something to contribute and as we managed to get out in the time it proves that we can work as a team! A great experience from from the time you walk in the door to escaping the room. Only about 3 mins walk from the tube, so a perfect location. Thanks to the Enigma Escape team we had a fantastic hour, where did the time go!
Brilliant. Every minute of the game very well thought out and fantastic customer service buy the game host. Location was very easy to find and I would definitely go again.

We ESCAPED!. If you are visiting London with your family and looking for something non-touristy, this is not to be missed. Super fun family experience! My wife, daughter (15), son (13) and I experienced our first escape room at Enigma Escape. It was incredibly fun. Hon treated us to popcorn and drinks while he explained the rules and showed us a video. No spoilers, but it would be a bit spooky for kids under 15. My 13 year old son handled it well, but not all will - you be the judge. Thanks to Hon for allowing our son to join in! The puzzles and clues are really well done and not easy. The hints don't give away any answers, just redirect your efforts. We were successful in escaping, but with only 38 seconds left. What a feeling! This is a great way to see how you family can work together. All minds are necessary. Great adrenaline rushes - one after another as you move through the experience. AWESOME!

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️. Enigma Escape was truly an amazing experience; one that every person should have. The game was incredible and unique and included many surprises. Our host, Hon, was very kind and patient making sure our experience was the best it could be. Thanks for the enjoyable time Hon, would recommend to anyone and everyone!

The Killer killed it!!!. Brilliant time with my 17-yo cousin on Christmas Eve! Just the two of us managed to get out in just under 5min left! Surprises around every corner... Super immersive! He couldn't stop talking about it all the way home!

Amazing Escape the Room Experience (The Killer). My wife and I love watching detective shows, doing treasure hunts and solving puzzles. After I had heard about an Escape the Room game colleagues of mine had done in New York City, I went online and search for a similar experience here in London. I came across a review by "Time Out" which recommended Enigma Escape and decided to give it a try. I'm so glad we did! This was our first escaping adventure and we didn't really know what to expect. Sam introduced himself as the host and during an initial 10mins of chatting and getting ready for the experience he told us that he was also the owner and had founded Enigma Escape just 5 months ago. Sam then proceeded to present the game to us in parts by a short video. After that the door opened and the 60mins clock started ticking... The game itself (without giving away any details) is amazingly well designed. It is called “The Killer” and will have you thinking, wondering and puzzle solving every second of it. Sam is always “there” (via surveillance cameras and a text message screen to interact with you) to give you a hint should you be in need of one. The riddles are neither impossible nor straightforward to solve. In fact they are extremely well thought out and you will have a blast working your way through them. We made it out with 8mins left on the clock and felt proud and excited. Enigma Escape is worth every penny and we couldn’t recommend it more highly. Sam said he's currently planning a second room. Count on us to come back for another amazing challenge!

Fun escape room experience. Enigma Escape's escape room was a blast to play through, the puzzles were challenging yet doable, we were treated really well and we were even treated to a photo opportunity and a prize for escaping! I really recommend giving it a try, it's fun for friends or as a business outing!

Simply....WOW!!. This was the first escape experience I have ever tried, and it's set a very high bar for future ones. It's super fun, interactive and a fantastic team working exercise, full of laughs and surprises. I went with 3 friends and my girlfriend, and found that this was the optimum number of people. Easily done with less, though it would be a little more challenging to escape within the hour! :)Sam was our host for the day, though we also met Hon. They are the actual business owners, and I wish them all the best for the future. Really nice people who made an extra effort to make our experience memorable. I would highly recommend this to anyone...
Awesome experience. Not my first time playing escape game but this one certainly is one of the best! Well crafted story and great props in addition to great service by Sam

The Killer - Wonderful experience!. Went for my birthday with 3 of my friends and didn't know what it was about because one of my friends paid for the experience. Loved every second of it (literally) had a fantastic time. My friends and I had 39 seconds left until the game was up. So fun would recommend it to anyone. Please go you will have a fantastic time.

What a great way to spend an hour!. This was my first adventure game experience and I really enjoyed 'The Killer'. Not sure me and my team were the best ever players but nevertheless we all had a blast solving puzzles, riddles etc. I would definitely recommend Enigma Escapes and look forward to visiting when there are more rooms available.Think 'creepy crystal maze'...in the best way possible!

Birthday party. Was a really enjoyable day out. The storyline behind the escape was very well thought out which added a personal element to the interactive game which some other companies do not have. The person that led our group was extremely friendly and welcoming. The game was clever and definitely made you use your brain, but once you realised what you needed to do it all made sense and was all very well linked. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a fun and nicely challenging day out!

Fun filled time. Great time at Enigma Escape. Sam was a great host and got us into the mood and theme of the event. We have done a few escape type games before and found this challenging and enjoyable. For the record Team 5 Ho's escaped in the nick of time!Thoroughly recommended.

Professional service, fantastic time!. Definitely would recommend this to anyone - well run, fun, friendly and professional. Nothing negative to say as was amazing. We will be back as soon as there is a new room to explore!

Really fun with good wheelchair access. Went with 3 friends. In a manual wheelchair and could still move and complete tasks. Lots of thinking required so easy to still participate. Lovely owners and can't wait for the second game!

Really brilliant 90 minutes. Booked for my 3 daughters who love Room Escape and me! This did not disappoint. It was challenging enough to keep us all busy (and squabbling), but it was very clever and Sam was a marvellous host. We are all very much looking forward to the next game in the New Year!
Amazing experience. Fantastic time at Enigma Escape. Challenging and exciting. Highly recommend! Can't wait till the second room is ready.

Best by far!. Having done a couple of escape games in the UK and abroad I kinda knew what to expect.....or so I thought.This was by far the most logical, well thought out and professionally run and maintained escape game I've done.totally immersive and good fun but still very challenging.We got out but only just!as soon as a new game arrives at Enigma we will be back!give it a go, it is awesome!

Fun and exciting game!. Friendly and warm host. Really exciting and mentally stimulating puzzles. The game was challenging but still quite manageable. Keeps you on your toes and constantly thinking. Great feeling of accomplishment when you manage to escape. Highly recommend this game and would come back again when there are new rooms.

Watch out, there's a Killer about!. A really fun and suspenseful hour and a bit, with a few creepy surprises and a lot of laughs. Looking forward to the next challenge being planned by the team at Enigma Escape. We'll be back!
Excellent, great way to spend an afternoon. Have not done a thing like this before, will be trying again !Fun, challenging, clever, inciting, gratifying (if you finish)Highly recommend !
Great fun. A Brilliant day out in a good location. Easy to get to by public transport and plenty of restaurants nearby. challenging and clever puzzles which are great fun friends or family.

Awesome game!. Very awesome host along with awesome game experience! Really makes you think along with great team building experience. Fun day out activity! Can't wait for the next game! Highly recommend Enigma Escape to anyone!
Killer escape. Fantastic game, very clever. Only thing I would suggest is losing the intro film, a little pointless.

Fantastic!. Went as a group of 4, including one in a wheelchair, we had never done anything like this before and were sad when it ended!! It was so much fun, really clever and thoroughly enjoyable. Was no problem having one of us in a wheelchair, was fully inclusive and we all had something to do during the game. We were all a bit nervous but hon put us at ease, we were so pleased to have gotten out with just under 8mins to go, as I said we were all really sad it ended, hope they do another one soon!!!

Good challenge. Very welcoming host and challenging but fun experience. The theme was excellent and as you progress through the experience it just gets better. The help when you seem to be struggling is also helpful so you don't lose interest. Great experience!
Like nothing i have experienced before!. Completely unusual and thrilling experience - don't want to say too much and give the game away - go and you won't be disappointed.
Great!!. Me and my friends had such a great time at Enigma Escape. I strongly recommend this place to anyone. It is definitely worth it!!

Enigma Escape. Amazing fun, it tests your skills and a great day out! They need more adventures so I can go again!!! Had a good time giggling at my friend near the end. Don't want to say any more as it might spoil the suprise!
Excellent fun!. Nice host. Fun and clever puzzles to solve. Clues given when we got stuck. Altogether a really fun activity. Highly recommended. Thanks!

Can't wait for the next one!. The enigma escape game was great for a boys night out where teamwork abounds! We enjoyed a great post game dissemination from one of the creators to the process that was taken and can't wait to see what they come up with next time!

So much fun and Great Host!!!. Definitely recommend going here! It is so unique and has a great personal touch it doesn't feel like they want you in and out to just make money. On our visit we got to meet the owner Sam who explained a bit about his company and then the game. We got offered drink and Popcorn and then the game started. So much fun!!! There were two of us but it can go upto groups of five. Sam can post hints or comments to you in the room some are quite funny. We were giggling so much and you really have to work things out, from physical problems to maths to puzzles. It's great!Cost: Very reasonable especially for London and has student discount. (My cousin was really late so unfortunately missed it but he is offering her a discount next time she comes so she can experience it, which is great) Location: Really easy to find few hundred m's from the tube. MUST DO IT!

Just brilliant. Absolutely loved it. Great mix of puzzles to solve, really well done. I don't want to say too much and spoil the surprise, but it has been thought out very well, pitched at a good level, with physical and mental games to solve, very engaging. A brilliant hour well spent.

Great time at Enigma Escape!. We went in a group of 5; the owner Sam was charming and banterous - he explained the game to us and showed us an introductory video, his hospitality was unparalleled. The game itself is extremely well thought out, and ridiculously enjoyable. The storyline of the game was captivating and added to the overall experience. All in all we couldn't have been happier with our visit.If you're thinking about doing a locked in a room experience, I would certainly choose this! Thank you Sam, we had a great time.

Amazing fun! Everyone should try it!. Enigma Escape is definitely something everyone should try! It is extremely well thought out and Sam adds a lovely persobal touch to it which makes it a perfect experience! I can't wait to come back for more!

An Awesome Immersive Experience!. This is the first immersive game I have ever taken part in, and was asked to go along with some mates. Having no idea what to expect, I ended up having the best time in the game. The business is very professional for one so young, and the experience itself was very well put together and genuinely challenging. I would thoroughly recommend Enigma Escape to anyone who enjoys a challenge and wants to try something different in London.

Fantastic Escape Game. Had great fun playing The Killer. Never been to an escape game before and really enjoyed it. Would definitely recommend this, Sam was a great host. Great in couples or as a group.
Loved it. Really great fun, never been to an Escape Room Mystery before! Very unique and well thought out, thanks Sam

A fantastic escape game. I've played a lot of escape games (and also run two myself) and this is one of the best and most enjoyable that I've played. If you dislike random clues and puzzles then this is the game for you. Every puzzle in there makes sense and as each puzzle is solved the story line unfolds. Really well thought out and made. Highly recommended.

Great escape. This was our first time into the unexpected! I thought it would be a great experience for my girlfriend and brothers birthday - so it proved to be. Being stuck in an empty room not knowing exactly what to do at first really gets the mind going. It was just a pity it didn't last longer as once you get going you don't want it to stop as we were enjoying it so much. Our host Hon was also a very welcoming and friendly. Highly recommended for anyone who wants to do something a little different and interesting.

Brilliant - fun!. We decided to do this as part of a friends 30th birthday trip away. We absolutely loved it Hon the owner was fantastic and helped organise it easily. The set up and concept were fantastic and it turned in a real fun day out. Hopefully the guys will branch out and have multiple rooms soon because we would have happily done two or three tasks. Don't want to giveaway too much but the set up is full of surprises and well put together. You will love it and it is a must try for all.

Did we escape alive? Or ecstatic? . After a few months of really wanting to do an escape the room experience me and my good friend decided to take the leap - we were extremely excited and a little worried (only for a good reason!) We found Enigma on here and we're very grateful it was a 2 person one as most if not all the others are for 3+. We got there after a nice morning in London and were a little late and were sad and anxious we may not get to play but on arrival the wonderful host, Hon, said we were very lucky and allowed a to still play as there were no more games that day! So thank you Hon! After giving us a lovely welcome and cozy introduction to what lay ahead we settled down with some nice snacks for our experience, then all of a sudden thrown in to the room (metaphorically! I know it's called the Killer but Hon graciously showed us in.) Once we we delved in we were immediately immersed into the narrative and the room itself; scrambling around for a way out of the first section we needed a few hints but made it and were so thrilled and were into the next bit! Our host let us know beforehand that this is one of (if not the only) escape experience that follows a narrative and I'm so glad it was our first! I don't want to reveal anything more for the sake of any other fellow escapees, but I will say do it! Do it! Do it! Worth every single penny and more! And the ending, wow. Thank you Hon and all the creators for this great experience! Will definitely be coming back for the new room next year! Trust me. Go and escape!
Amazing. We really enjoyed our experience with enigma. Very well thought out and extremely fun. I would definitely recommend it to my mates. Thank you hon
Great Entertainment. Fantastic Escape Game and excellent host. highly recommend, great theme, great little touches and will 100% be back to try their new room when it opens.

Didn't want it to end!. I've never done one of these type of games before and I wasn't disappointed. The hospitality of the host immediately put us all at ease and the simplicity of the introduction left us feeling both intrigued and anxious - a perfect combination to get our adrenaline pumping! The codes/tasks weren't too easy but were achievable and the handy hints that came up throughout the game kept us focused and pointed us in the right direction if we were losing our way a bit. We did the game as a group of 4 which I think worked perfectly - I wouldn't suggest any more players for this game. When we managed to escape at the end we were all so excited but also sad that the experience was over! Well worth the money, lots of fun and we are already planning to come again when a new room has opened with a different scenario! I also plan to purchase gift vouchers for my sister and friend! The only thing I would say is that I'm glad I didn't view the video on the website before I came as it is much more fun not knowing what to expect!
So much fun!. My husband booked this for date night with another couple. It was so much fun and we made it out of the room in time! Would definitely recommend!

A brilliant extra to a day out in the city. We had been searching round for something really interesting and different to do in the day before a show during a day out in the city. After reading the reviews Enigma Escape seemed like a good option; relatively short, easy to get to and a bit of a challenge to get the day going. Hon was a great host, building up the experience and getting us going. The challenges were great, the right level of difficult without being too much so. Where we started to lose track, a hint was always there in a timely fashion. The hints themselves though were just that, hints not sledgehammers.All in all, a great diversion. Look forward to the next room being developed for a new experience!

Intriguing, challenging and fun. This was a fab evening! It was the second time I'd done an escape room, and chose this one as it lets you have two people. It was a great date! Interesting scenario, and the host/creator was awesome - he made us feel very welcome and comfortable. I'd definitely do another escape room of his based on this experience. Really got into it, wish I could do it all over again!
Celebrating husbands 50th. excellent day out, lots of fun for the whole family, great for teamwork and Hon was a fantastic host

Stands out from the crowd. "The Killer" is full of neat and novel ideas and was refreshingly different for someone a bit tired of searching for endless number combinations in escape rooms. Our host, Hon, really knew what he was doing and without spoiling anything, the whole experience was richly done and very immersive - which is something else that made Enigma stand out from the crowd. The only slight criticism I have was it was maybe slightly too easy for us as experienced players, but I had a blast with the role-playing aspect, and I'm still more than happy to award 5 stars. Highly recommended.

Great Game. We had an amazing time with this challenging escape room. It's got a really good concept with some great and well thought out puzzles. The host is super friendly. If you get a chance, definitely try this game.

Scary! V exciting. This is definitely different from the usual hunting for endless numbers type game- it's much more practical and logical and actually the bits we struggled on were simply because we didn't think about it in a "what would I do if this was real" way, so I definitely encourage you to not just randomly search for things! The host was great and you can see they really care about the game, look forward to seeing their new one early 2016!
SMASHED IT!!!. Great location, amazingly fun game, super host ! & we made it out ! Really looking forward to the next game Sam is making... Will defo check it out!!

Excellent Challenge!!!. Enigma Escape room is the place to be, it's Fun and definitely an Excellent Challenge for Friends, Families, Couples or Colleagues. My friends & I played 'The Killer' room and we all had a GREAT time. We look forward to playing more of the other rooms that's coming soon!Thanks again to our Host Sam & his team partner Hon Ban for creating such an Awesome room!

An AMAZING Experience. Came with my two university flatemates and we had the best time trying to escape The Killer! Well put together and clever, there are endless surprises and "Aaaahhhh!" moments! A completely unique, immersive experience - can't wait to go back when the new room opens!

Great Experience. This was a challenging experience but it was designed at just the right level. We would highly recommend this to others. I plan to buy my brother tickets to go with his girlfriend for his birthday. The suggestion/recommendation I would make to the organisers is that it would be nice to have the option to buy the dvd of your team experience. :)

The Great Escape. This was my first escape room adventure and I truly enjoyed it. The level of complexity is high enough to be challenging but not unachievable. Unfortunately we did need a few clues but that didn't distract from our excitement over making it out within the given timelimet.
GREAT!. very good escape room, was able to finish 4 friends 1min late + 3 hints.good location 5min from metro station.
