Excellent immersive escape game. This was my fifth escape room, and the best all-round experience so far. The challenges, on the whole, are of a more physical nature than mental, and are tied into the storyline of the room really well, rather than just being puzzles for the sake of puzzles. Looking forward to their second room!
A must do. Very good I would highly recommend it. A great experience full of fun puzzles and interesting twists
Great Laugh!. Really immersive experience, something really different and fun. Staff were great and would definitely go again.

Exciting, interesting, surprising escape room. Myself and 3 friends did The Killer escape room at Enigma Escape. it was my first time doing an escape room and I didn't really know what to expect however, I was blown away! The whole experience was brilliant, with some really cool features within the room. The hour flew by and we managed to get out with 5 minutes left - the time and level of difficulty felt perfect. 2 of my friends had done escape room previously and they said that this was the best one they'd done by far. Would definitely recommend!!
Extremely good fun, so exciting!. This was our second experience of an escape game. We weren't let down by Enigma Escape. It was very cleverly put together. Twists and turns every step of the way!

Great edperience!. Went with my father who was a first timer and a little unsure about the idea. We were greeted very nicely by Sam who explained the game and offered food and beverages. The game itself was chalanging and we needed clues, which we recieved on screen throughout and still let us think. Great for pairs and groups
Something different!!. Great for a group of friends/couples. Challenging but entertaining. Would definitely recommend! Parking can however be a pain.
Enigma escape - brilliant!. Great time at Enigmas Escape on Friday - some nice twists on other escape games we had done. Hon as an excellent host
Best Hour Ever Spent. Had a great time. Perfectly designed rooms and puzzles. Great atmosphere and the host was great. I can't wait to go to the new rooms coming in 2016

Excellent!. Went with my partner, it was her first escape room and my 3rd. We both had a really great time, and managed to escape with 1:50 minutes left and two clues. The props and design is great and supported the storyline very nicely, same goes for the puzzles, with a couple of them being particularly fun to solve.

Immersive & Logical. Brilliant game - very well thought through - all the riddles were believable and logical and fit the overall story. Game mastering was excellent - not letting us to slip to frustration by providing soft, indirect (yet gradually more direct) hints. Loved it! Highly recommended!
Really fun experience. This was a really fun experience. An escape game with a common sense approach. I will highly recommend Enigma Escape.

Fun day out!. I booked this for my partners birthday because it sounded different to the norm and didn't really know alot about this kind of thing.At first we didn't really know what to expect but after 10 minutes or so we both got right into the thick of it and loved the experience!Both of us will definitely be trying out more of these escape rooms and would recommend this to anyone who loves a challenge!
Timtam. Really good game and really friendly host. Provided beverages and popcorn at the start. You receive a medal on completion (spoiler alert).

Brilliant fun!. Having done a couple of other escape games, I can totally recommend The Killer as a brilliant example of this kind of attraction. And Sam the owner/host makes it an even more memorable experience! You'll see.....

Great experience and so well done!!. I booked this for my sister's birthday and we had soooo much fun! It was the first time we had ever done one of these 'escape a room' experiences and based on this one they are completely worth it. The owner, Sam, is great! He set the atmosphere at the beginning, created a personal experience throughout (we were dressed as pirates!), and was really friendly once we escaped the room. The story was fantastic and intriguing and Sam gave the right amount of help at just the right times. The added touch of a photo and a medallion made it even more worth while. If you are looking for something new and exciting to do then I would definitely recommend this!P.S I am really looking forward to the opening of the second room!

A great birthday treat to complete with a friend. I've done a few Escape rooms in groups before but was pleased to find one that was designed to work with just 2 people. I took my friend along today for her birthday present and it all worked out really well! The venue is easy to find from the tube station. The game is challenging, yet solvable and I particularly liked the sense of narrative rather than randomly solving puzzles. We were pleased to complete it with more than 10 mins spare! Would recommend for a pair of friends for a fun and adrenaline-fuelled activity in London!

Absolutely Fantastic - The Killer is awesome!. I didn't know what to expect when we did the Enigma Escape I hadn't watched the YouTube video, I would recommend not to watch the video before you do this as it may a few clues away. This was one of the best things i've ever done, it was so much fun and it was brilliant that we could do this as a couple as a lot of the ones we've looked at are for 3 or more. I would totally recommend this to anybody who enjoys these kinds of games, the host Hon was fantastic and totally genius for coming up with such an awesome game. Highly recommended, great fun and it wasn't easy either, was pitched perfectly, can't wait for the new games!!

Fantasicly fun. My self and my friends have done similar escape games so knew what to expect. Sam, (the owner and host ) set the scene at the start of the game and offered us help and encouragement throughout. The game itself was mainly puzzle based, really making you use your brain and work as a team. Great fun and we will be back when the new game opens!

Best UK escape room we've been too!. Sam is a great game designer and host, the added extras he's put into Enigma escape to put you into the story of the game is awesome! Fab experience with some cool features we hadn't seen before, can't tell you what as it would spoil the surprise, but take my word for it that its fab and try it yourself!!
Had a great time. Really enjoyed this experience.An enlivening and generous introduction.The clues were tough but achievable.All in all really good. Hope they expand soon.

Great time on the killer. Wanted to book somthing fun to do as a couple for the afternoon and this was perfect. Had a really good time and would recommend to anyone who hasn't done an escape game before. The staff were really friendly and the whole experience was really well organised and put together. The game itself was loads of fun ( and a little bit scary at times). I'm definitely looking to do the second game the guys have planned!

Good fun - brilliant story line :). Just two of us went to this escape room and had such a good time. Obviously not going to give anything away but it was really good fun with a good back story. We're looking forward to Enigma Escapes creating a new room soon as we'll definitely go!

Escape the Killer. Fantastic!!!
Really very good fun.
Well set out storyline
Immersive.
Host was simply lovely.
At the end, got given tokens, a good touch
Fantastic fun. Had a great time at this event. The room may be small but it certainly tests your brains and tea working skills to be able to make it out in time

Brilliant evening out with friends. Enigma escape was great fun. It's a brilliant hour spent with friends. We're all looking forward to the next game and will definitely be returning. Have recommended it to all my friends.
Possible for 2 persons. The only one that does not overcharge ridiculosly for two persons. A bit hard for us we would have needed half an hour more. But still Great fun.

Really in to the story!. The game is really nice, surprises and emotions. You are really immerse in the game. Nevertheless for me was a bit to short, it might be because I did a few! I recommend it, big time!

Cracked the code!. First experience of an escape room today, thought it was brilliant. Hon, the host, was really welcoming and the snack and drink a nice touch. Really enjoyed the game and won with 17 minutes spare, can't wait for the next one to be finalised as we will be back!!

Fantastic! . Been to Enigma today and loved every minute of it. It was our first ever escape room and it was a great experience. Hon, our host, was very helpful and as previously said in reviews, the snacks are a lovely touch. We were delighted to escape with 17 minutes to spare and are now self confessed escape room addicts.

Good fun!. A great experience, however with just the two of us it was a bit trickier so it would have been good to have a few more hints, we were so close to escaping but failed on the very last part as it was too confusing! The story line is cool, I look forward to seeing the next one they bring out.

It really is that good..... We decided to book Enigma escape as part of our trip to London. Something to do for a couple of hours. ABSOLUTELY BRILLIANT. Hon was a great host, the game was pitched just right and all very clever. Drinks and snacks on arrival also one of the few which is currently on offer for just 2 people. Looking forward to their next game!!
Loved it.. Great bit of fun and lots of different puzzles to work through. Worth a visit. Can't wait to try the 2nd room if it's ready in January!

Amazing escape room in North London!. If you are a fan of enigmas and puzzles, then this is the perfect way to spend some time with your friends or to test your problem solving skills and cooperation with your partner!Very well organised, and nice idea to offer funny signs to the players at the end, to have a nice souvenir picture :) Very friendly atmosphere.Looking forward to seeing the next themes!(We lost, but it's quite common if you only play in a couple and you have never played before…)
Woopwoop!. Loads of fun, managed to escape with 5 minutes to go! Recommend this to everyone, definitely going back when they have a new escape ^^
Great room espace. Enigma Escape provided a great room escape with a story behind. It was my first time but I also had some more experienced people in my group and we all enjoyed it.

You've got to try it! Brilliant. This was my first time doing anything like this! I've always loved playing escape games on my iPhone! It was absolutely brilliant and it is so well planned and thought through. The owner and host (Sam) was brilliant throughout and I would definitly recommend it to anyone and everyone! Cannot wait for the next one! Bring it on!!
Great fun and challenging . Loads of funFriendly staffChallengingGood prizesCan't wait until the next game !Would recommend to anyone even if you don't think you would be good at it
Great find in North London. Great concept, the difficulty was just right. The staff were amazing and we even got prizes and refreshments. Definitely recommend.

Enigma escape team Multi group visit. If you only do one thing this year when you're next out and about in London do this! Location is good and easy to find just off of Holloway tube station. The greeting was warm and pleasant with plenty of banter and information about the upcoming experience. Once the game got underway everybody became very focused and all were keen to beat the 1 hour time limit. The clues and various challenges were difficult but not impossible and if you do get stuck there is a bit of prompting to ease you along. This would be a very good team building exercise for companies to send staff on because it really does need everyone working together to achieve a common goal,(Escape) but is also great for anyone else as well. So overall I would say that this was a thoroughly enjoyable experience which is very reasonably priced, great fun and with a few little surprises thrown in as well. Why are you still reading this review? Get on the phone or internet and book your Escape experience now!!

So much fun!. We had never done anything like this before so had no idea what to expect but so glad we did it. It was so much fun and so challenging! I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for something fun and a bit different to do with a group of friends.
Great fun. Lots of fun was had by all, and even better we managed to get out! Nicely themed game which means you feel the pressure and really get into it!
Brilliant. We had the best time. We had a team of4 and we all thought it was really well devised, it was very professional and well worth the money. Highly recommended

Great Enigma Escape (Great for Two People). Starting to get seasoned on escape rooms and Enigma has found a good balance of mental and physical challenges
Felt really satisfied when completed and wasn't an over challenge for two people
Would highly recommend

Engima Escape. I played the Killer with my other half on her birthday. Having played an escape game in Budapest we wanted to try one back home in the UK. I found Engima because they allowed you to play with only 2 people when a lot of other London based games required a minimum of 3.The game was great fun and I'd definitely recommend to give it a go - particularly if you're looking for somewhere to play as a couple.

Great Fun. Went late Saturday night as a group of five of us, ages ranging from 18 to 45. We all had a great time. The host was extremely friendly, nice little touch with the drink and popcorn. The experience itself was so much fun, the clues were quite hard but we did manage to figure them out in the end, with a bit of prompting when needed. Unfortunately we made it out 2 seconds after the 60 minutes was up, gutted..! Would defiantly recommend trying it out, great as a team of 5, but also fun for just a couple to try. Looking forward to when the scenario changes and we can go back and try again.

As escape room veterans, we were not disappointed!. Went as a group of 3 friends- we are now well-seasoned London escape room goers. This escape was probably one of the better ones we have done. It features some escape classics as well as some original ideas. I'd say 3 is probably the ideal group size- larger groups may find some team members standing around with nothing to do at points.

Amazing experience!. We went as a couple, and it completely surpassed expectations. It was thrilling and exciting, and we finished with a great sense of accomplishment.The owner was very welcoming, and we were offered drinks and small snacks while he gave a brief explanation of the game we were about to face.Every riddle in the room made sense as part of the plot, the atmosphere was great, and we really had to think outside the box.When we got stuck, the owner gave us hints in the best way we've encountered so far, without revealing the answer outright, which was crucial to maintaining our sense of accomplishment. We made it out just in the nick of time.All in all, we had a great time and would definitely recommend it to everyone!

Locked In. Chose this as it was one of the few places which has 2people option. Hon was a great host, we thoroughly enjoyed it. Challenging and fun. Will definitely recommend. Can't wait to see what Hon has coming up next.

Way better than expected. Chose this place as a couple as most other places don't let you go with just two people. So glad We did, Hon was an amazing host, the story was just right. We escaped with just 39 seconds to go. Well worth it, and going with just the two of us didn't make it much harder. We'd definitely recommend it!!!!!
Fun times in Killer. First time doing a room escape and throughly enjoy it. Killer story line was fun and really got the brain working. Looking forward to many more. Thanks Sam

Loved it!. Went to Enigma for my birthday, didn't know what I was in for, but it was fantastic. Very challenging, and very well designed. Sam was a great host too. Can't wait for his next design after completing this with a few mins remaining. I'd highly recommend Enigma.

Amazing. We visited for my husbands birthday. It was our first escape room and we succeeded just! Hon was an amazing host and the scenario is really immersive and enthralling. The mini popcorn packs and drink was the finishing touch. We'll be back!
Original Amazing !!. I really enjoyed Enigma Escape, its genuinly challenging but also loads of fun! Exactly what you need from an escape game!!!
Last Minute. Sam (host) was great going above and beyond to book me any my friends a last minute spot. The story line was very thrilling, very well organised. I highly recommend it to anyone.
worth the price. i wanna keep it short and simple: very nice and friendly host and a really funny game. I can highly recommend it to everyone!

Amazing!. Sadly we didn't survive this game but i must say it was incredible!! Really well thought about and planned! There was surprises round every corner and amazing puzzles!! Definitely strongly advise enigma escape!!!!

All round excellence!. Had an AMAZING time. This was our first escape room, thoroughly enjoyed the experience from start to finish. The snacks were a great touch, followed by the mind tingling experience; prizes at the end. I hope they open other games all around London!

Challenging - but fantastic fun!. I wasn't sure what to expect beforehand - but i certainly didn't expect to come out feeling so thrilled and proud of myself and my fellow escapees! There are twists and turns and a few surprises along the way, and the whole escape story is very well constructed and professionally put together. It challenges you to think logically and systematically and use the skills of all your Team to your best advantage. If you do that you can succeed and escape - and believe me when you do the feeling is pure joy! Give it a go - its wicked fun!

Wow what fun. small group of 3 of us, didn't make it out in time but what a thrill. It really gets you thinking in ways you wouldn't have to in normal life or jobs. So much effort and time to make a great short experience. Thanks a lot and keep up the good work. Defo worth trying out. Would really recommend, so much fun.

Fantastic day out!!. We really enjoyed the entire experience! Challenging and exciting! Hon was friendly and encouraging, good luck with this venture would definately return if there were different games to play!
Great. I went with my girlfriend and I can honestly say it was one of the best day out I have ever had would recommend it and I would deffo go again :)!!!
Brain Food 4 Inspiring Sherlocks. Brilliant fun for everyone.Requires teamwork,logic,calm nerves and out of the box thinking. Looking forward to more great escapes...

Great couples date night. Had some great laughs. Just when you are about to get frustrated the host drops you a hint that keeps you motivated and keeps it fun. Recommend it to a group of friends or a couple.
The killer. First time doing an escape room and wasn't disappointed. Great fun and kept you thinking till the end. Would definitely recommend it.
Brilliant place. Has such a brilliant time and would recommend to anyone who is looking for something different to do!

Very well run and great fun, highly recommend!!!!. Went on Halloween and had a great time. Very well run game and good fun. Never played an escape game, but will definitely play more now!
Definitely worth a go!

Great story and a few surprises. Really enjoyed this escape experience, it had more of a story than others we have been to and the whole thing felt very professional without being too formal. A few surprises, which we enjoyed!
Will definitely be back to do the next room when it is ready!

Great Fun. It was great fun from the moment we entered the Briefing Room till we actually managed to escape. There was 5 of us and we ranged in age from 17 to 52, we all loved it.
Will definitely do another one at some point.
Fantastic. A great experience - really well managed and very friendly! Will definitely be visiting again when the new rooms are ready.

Very different from other Escape Rooms. Visited here a week ago and having played other escape games this one was certainly different. From the start and the warm welcome from our host Hon we were in for a surprise. Unlike other games like this that relies on simply opening combinations this game had a lot of other puzzles to solve and if we did get stuck Hon offered us clues on the TV monitor rather than making direct contact that made it much more challenging. If you like escape game then book here it is the best that I have done.
Amazing. Unfortunately the killer killed us , but it was more than amazing. Waiting for the next rooms to be opened.Thank you Hon for being our host

Do it!. This was our first escape game experience and it has set the bar very high!I would highly recommend a visit to Enigma, the puzzles were very well thought out and tough but not impossible, although we did require a couple of hints.

Well thought out and challenging!. Not your typical escape game, well thought out that requires a range of techniques to solve clues to move on to the next stage. Great game for couples as well as a team building exercise as everyone will need to get stuck in.What makes this experience even better was the super friendly and welcoming host, Hon was superb on the day and offered many clues when we struggled.We have been to many escape games before (none of which required us to use much brain power) but with The Killer you would really need to think outside the box. Definitely would recommend Enigma Escape if you want a really enjoyable experience to remember!

So so so awesome. Didn't know what to expect. Would highly recommend this to anybody Very much enjoyable. The host was great and friendly. We managed to achieve success... but only with 3 minutes to spare. The hints aren't too many - which is good. We didn't want that many pointers to be honest.

Awesome break out!. Was an awesome experience and different to others we have done before, think that this place will do really well and if you are looking for a breakout around London would def recommend this place you will enjoy it!! Will be back again when more rooms are open

A great challenge. As most escape rooms in London are made for three or more people, the Enigma Escape is a great alternative for couples. The challenges were really mind bending and great fun. Thumbs up!

A Unique and Fun Experience. I didn't know what to expect when I arrived with my girlfriend. The experience was refreshing and challenging. It really tests ones ability to work together. I would strongly recommend Enigma Escape for anyone! Don't miss out...
Super fun. Very much fun and challenging. Our host was great and the enigmas were just hard enough to get you there without too much panic. Definitely recommend.
A very nice escape room. This escape room was really good with lots of unexpected features! Having tried a few more though we thought it was a bit simply made but still very satisfying!
Fantastic experience. I have done a couple escape rooms in the past and this one was by far the best - everyone should give it a go!
Fab. Such a good fun experience , we are deffo coming back when the new rooms are created. Deffo worth going
Fantastic Time! . First time for us...am hooked & can't wait for them to build another room. Brilliant fun & even better we got out with 5 minutes to spare! Lovely welcome by Hon!
Up & coming tourist attraction.. Amazing, well worth the money and trip. Great to do with friends or family, working together to escape the room with lots of hidden mysteries.

A brilliant experience. This was a really well thought out room, with a friendly host and a clever story line. We escaped the room, and had a lot of fun getting there with some interesting puzzles to solve. This is one of the best rooms I have encountered, having taken part in several before in different parts of the country; it was challenging, engaging and the host wants you to feel immersed in the game. The bonus at the end it a must for collectors!

First experience of an escape games and loved it!. Such good fun, I played this with my two sons, aged 17 & 18 and my brother and we all came away buzzing, laughing and talking about it. Great experience where you can all work together as a team and we all really enjoyed it! Fantastic game host too, who was really friendly. Thank you Enigma Escape

Brilliant family fun. Wanting something to do, and a target to aim for, we plumped for Enigma Escape. I'll not ruin it for those who've not been but suffice it to say, it's different, fun and well hosted.While we didn't escape in the hour, we were pleased to be noted as a family that worked well together.Thank you Hon - we'll be back when you have a new test for us.

great fun. we were a family group of four with boys aged 11 and 15. The escape was a good fun challenge that all members could join in with and contribute to the team effort. Very atmospheric and a clever combination of clues. We really enjoyed ourselves.
Lucky Escape. First experience of going to an escape game and it was great fun! Highly recommend going. We all have such a laugh and came out buzzing! Loved it!
First timer. Action packed and exciting. This is a modern escape game with the correct mix of problem solving and interesting features.

The Killer. We did 'The Killer' as a family and we had great fun. Sam is a brilliant host and gives you a few clues along the way to keep you on track. We escaped with 2 minutes 27 seconds to go so the kids were happy. We have done other escape games and the concept of this one was a little different and highly enjoyable. Keep up the good work.
Enjoyed it. This was the first time ever tried anything like this and we enjoyed it very much. When we were stuck helpful hints were always available from the host via the screen. Was a lot of fun.
Worth a visit!. Really enjoyable experience and great to do with friends or family. Great clues and very cleverly done.

Amazing!. This was our first escape room experience and it was amazing! Challenging yet enjoyable and very well organised! The owner Sam was friendly and really got us into the scenario of the escape room. Highly recommend this experience to others and will definitely be going back when other scenarios for escape rooms are created by Enigma Escape!

Great fun for all the family . Great escape game - kept us all amused for an hour and the time just flew by. Combined with a stop off for a burger in town, this was a great day out. Often difficult to find family activities that everyone enjoys (especially with teenagers) but this is a definite winner!

Excellent team building adventure. Really great experience, it was our first time at an escape game and would go back for their new game. Sam was really friendly and snacks and drinks were a nice touch. The storyline and theming really helped to get you into excitement if the game, definitely recommend it!

amazing escape room. i have been to a lot of escape rooms, each different in its own way. this is one of the best rooms that i have been to. its very clean and well made. it requires simple logic and is very enjoyable. i would definitely recommend this one.
Fun and Awesome!!. Great practical experience with a good storyline. Perfect group activity for those who like puzzle solving, I can't give clues away. You have to experience it for yourself !!!

Great family fun. We loved it - none of our group had ever tried a game like this, and didn't know what we'd get up too. I was looking for an activity to cover our broad age range of 50years - we had school kids and grandparents to cater for. It was a great experience where everyone got enjoyment out of it. Sam, a co-owner was running out session and he was fantastic. Fun and friendly, enthusiastic and welcoming. I'll not give anything away, but the game was challenging and we really enjoyed it. An hour will fly by!

Best escape game experience in London. Amazing Experience, Great Game, Great host (Sam). Comparing to other escape games in London this one is really surprising and by far the best story plot. Very well done in the details. Looking forward to test the next one !
Amazing day out. Thanks so much Hon for a great day!! i booked this as a surprise for my Boyfriends Birthday, he had a great day. Nice to do something different. 100% Recommend.
Superb!. Simple but so much fun. Me and 3 friends went to try Enigma Escape and it was the most fun we had in ages! Sam was a superb host. Keep it up!

Amazing Experience!. What an amazing experience! I highly recommend this to anyone looking for a new fun type of adventure between friends and/or colleagues.Let me begin with an important side note: Being a first-timer in "escape rooms", I enjoyed it so much that we went ahead to book and complete another escape room (from a different company) in the same day. In complete honesty, Enigma Escape blew the competitor out of the water - in terms of the overall experience - it was not even close. The creativity and the gameplay of the plot was, imo needless to say, much superior.On a business level, I have to hand it down to Sam (the owner/operator). From product creation and execution to amazing customer relationship management, I am sure his company will go a long way. Great hosting and overall hospitality goes a long way. Sam - the stuff like snacks, drinks, badges, and medals were great and very much appreciated. Small details make a big difference in the outcome of customer satisfaction levels - and my expectations were EXCEEDED.I will definitely be back (and looking forward) as a returning customer when Sam opens up his second escape room!Great Job!

Totally immersive experience with some fun surprises!. Compared to other escape rooms, Enigma was a really immersiveexperience. I really felt like I had been trapped in a room and Iactually had to escape. The puzzles were quite realistic; rather thanrandom numbers and clues, the puzzles were meaningful and it felt moretrue to life. There were 4 of us all together which was a goodnumber. Puzzles were generally quite linear so this is a good escaperoom for smaller numbers of people. The puzzles were of a mediumdifficulty, I'd say this was a good room for noobies to escape roomsto start out. That being said, my team still had to cash in a coupleof clues so it wasn't all plain sailing!Hon was a great host and gave us loads of freebies. No other escaperoom offered us snacks, drinks, badges and medals!When another room opens up we'll be there for sure.

A great experience. My girlfriend took me here for a surprise and its was so fun! good for the money and really have to use your head to escape. Great for bonding and just such a good experience and will have you chatting about it hours after.
A great escape game. Really gets your mind working and a fun game to play as a group. Easy to locate as well. Had a great time playing this game and would recommend to anyone.

So much frustrating fun!. My wife and I had a great time. The place was easy to get to and the owner was very pleasant and friendly. The game itself was simple and logical but very challenging. It took a lot of time and several hints to get to the finish, which we just missed out on. (Only just). Looking back, we'd definitely do it again if the game was different. We really enjoyed ourselves. Great fine and highly recommended. Give it a go with a spouse for a fun, bonding activity!
what a fun experience!. Had a great time. Was a great game. Host was very helpful. Time flew by when we were in the escape room. Would definitely do it again!!

Great escape game, well thought-out puzzles friendly host. TL;DR version - Great atmosphere, satisfying and logical puzzle progression. Will return when the next experience is open!As the four of us arrived, our host Hon was entirely welcoming and friendly, and set the scene for the event in a way that built up an anticipation for the event, but also made us feel safe even my wife who is claustrophobic and who was very nervous about being locked in a small room.The setting was atmospheric without being too spooky, and all the puzzles were challenging, but very logical and we felt that everything connected in a very satisfying way.Hon said that they are aiming to open up the next escape experience in the new year - as soon as tickets are available we'll be pre-booking the next one!

Dino boys rule!. Hon was a great host. Our team of four (a.k.a Dino boys) had a really great time solving the puzzles and escaping the room, with plenty of time to spare. It was our first escape room, but a great experience nonetheless.
nice. amazing game, and time, all is logical, and surprising, but we had lots of fun and had a great time :)

Fantastic escape room!. Visited with my wife and had a huge amount of fun trying to escape The Killer room. Difficulty is just right with clues if you need them. Lots of surprises to keep you guessing. The host is really down to earth and helpful, the location is 2 mins from the underground and the room is very reasonably priced compared to others. Would recommend this to everyone!

Exciting experience!. Our team of two had a great time trying to beat The Killer. It was not our first escape room, but it was definitely different. Not just math/logical puzzles and lots of padlocks to open, but a nice scenario behind and original "riddles" to solve. Truly immersive! Sam was a great host, providing us small hints when we were stuck. Highly recommended!

Fantastic!. Visited Enigma Escape with my fiance for my birthday and it was amazing! We went with this company because it was the only one that offered the experience for two people as opposed to larger groups.
Sam was great - so helpful and friendly! I cannot wait to go back when he has created his next escape game!

Great fun. Hon was really helpful and the whole experience was fun; great way to bond solving the mystery. The puzzles were fairly challenging and even though we made it out in time it was never boring

Fun for all!. I took part in the EnigmaExperience with my grandson age 12 and hos aunt (my daughter 26 y). We could all contribute to escape from The Killer. We had so much fun and will be back for more asap.

Great fun...would definitely recommend!. So much fun...the clues were challenging but not impossible. This was our first visit to an "escape room" and after this fantastic experience, we will definitely be going to more and we look forward to the second room opening. Special thanks to Hon for making it a memorable evening.

Just go there and do it. Although my wife and I are semi-regular players of puzzle games on the PC, this was our first ever "live-action" escape room. And we absolutely loved it. You start with a quick introduction from your host (Hon, in our case) and then shown a short scene-setting video. After this, you're led into a small room and the door locked behind you. Now you're on your own. It's dark, except for a monitor on the wall showing the time you have left: 60 minutes. There's a metal fence in front of you. There's seemingly no way out. As you poke around in the dark, you start to discover objects. Can they help you? You're not sure. As you make your way through the game, you become completely immersed in the story. Everything seems so real...A few times we repeated ourselves; ran out of ideas. Each time, a little "ding" sound came over the speakers and a hint appeared on the monitor. These little tips were just enough to nudge us in the right direction.We made it out with 2:48 to spare. Not the fastest by any means but it didn't matter. This isn't a game where you try to out-do other players. This is a game where you try to beat the clock and your own assumptions about what you see in front of you. Looking back, what I liked about it was that everything seemed to have a purpose; there were no red-herrings or random objects. So, when you finally made it out, everything made sense.Fantastic fun and highly recommended.
Excellent experience. Thank you Sam for creating and hosting an excellent escape room game. Great attention to detail, added extras and storyline. We will be back for more. Highly recommended.
Great escape!. Went as a group of five. Very good puzzles and really well thought out. Had a great time and looking forward to the next one

Great game, awesome fun!. I've done a few room escapes but his was definitely the best. The puzzles were tough which added to the achievement but didn't require random luck or lots of searching to solve.
Awesome!!!. Had a great time playing the "killer" game. The host, Sam was lovely and helped on many occasions when we got stuck. Will definitely be visiting again.
Amazing!. Three of us went Saturday and it was so different in a good way from other games. The host was super friendly, Deffo highly recommend!

very atmospheric!. This was my first escape the room after hearing about the existence of these. I went with four other friends. After a lot of frantic searching and panic we ended up losing with a few minutes worth of puzzles to go! It was so much fun, we've been talking about it for days since. This particular room has a story and theme where everything was coherent. It had a spooky theme and pulled it off really well, and did a good job playing with lights. Only one of the puzzles felt slightly contrived. Highly recommended!

Great fun, challenging. The escape room is fun and interesting, a little bit scary but nothing that an adult cannot handle :D There are some innovative elements which differentiate it from conventional escape rooms. If you get stuck you get little hints, which are good enough to guide you in the right direction but don't spoil the experience. You get a small snack and drink at the beginning and a token to take home if you manage to escape! Host was very helpful and friendly :) There is a WC on site as well.

An amazing experience!. I surprised my friend with Enigma Escape for his Birthday and am delighted to say it didn't disappoint. Neither of us had tried anything like it before and now we can't recommend it enough. The game is engaging, exciting and brilliantly put together. The experience lasted for one hour which flew by as we were enjoying it so much, although we had even more fun afterwards discussing all the things we did right or wrong in the pub afterwards!For anyone new or undecided on escape games, I urge you to try this, you won't regret it.
Awesome!. Great experience, loved every second of it! The guys have really created something to make the long trip to London worth it

Best escape room we've done. A really great game. A great mix of puzzles, story and a physical element. Everything you look for in an escape room. Even some little keepsakes for finishing. A definite must if you like the idea of escape rooms. Can't wait for the new rooms. Better than the two in Manchester we did.
So hood. Absolutely loved it. Would recommend to everyone and so inspiring that the creator is just a nice guy!
Great Experience. Amazing experience, I hope to come back soon! We will definitely gonna reccomend this to our friends.
Intense. One of the best attraction around London. Very immersive and if you loke riddles, mini Games and investigstion stories this escape game is for you. Would recommend this to everyone
Absolutely must try for everyone. Went with a group of friends and had an amazing time. Fun, immersive and Sam's a great host. Recommend

Great fun. We have been to a few escape rooms and enjoyed this one. As an escape room addict it was nice to see some different clues/ideas, as repetition can be a problem when you have done so many escape rooms. Would recommend.

great escape game in london. we went as a group of 5 and had a fun experience in this very new room. it was challenging enough but still doable, only thing I would comment is that one or 2 of the clues are too ambiguous, but still great. I would also make the intro movie apply more to the actual game, other than that, really great!!

Best escape game in London!. I've been to a few escape games in London and this is definitely the best one of all. The entire plot makes sense and the "puzzles" are not random maths problems that came out of nowhere. The design of the place also allows full immersion. I can't spoil it but there's a moment which totally made me jump! Can't wait for the next room to be ready!
Best escape room yet! . Amazing fun, very well thought out and good up keep. Would definitely recommend for team building. Lovely items awarded at the end as well if you manage to escape!
Brilliant!. Great experience, really exciting and well planned! Brilliant value for money would definitely go to the next one!
Great experience. Really good escape room, slightly different from the others in London. Worth doing whether you are completely new to the format or experienced
Really good fun. We went as a group of 5 on a Sunday morning. We all had very good fun and enjoyed the experience. Bit more differentiated in so far as there was a story line behind the room.

Amazing. We played 'the killer' last night. 2 of our group had already completed similar room escape challenges.whereas myself and 1 other were newbies!It was so good! We watched a short film that set the scene / backstory for what we were about to experience.We had a couple of hints while we were in there because we got a bit stumped! There was a bit that made us scream (well I screamed which freaked everyone else out)We managed to escape with 20:31! 2nd quickest time so far! We loved it! So much fun! We cannot wait to return when they have a new story!Thanks for a great evening!

A Killer!. Awesome experience - everyone really enjoyed it. Hon (our host) was great and really friendly. The escape itself was really well designed and followed a great story line. Highly recommend it!

Enigma Escape Room. Took part in 'The Killer' enigma escape room in September, it was an excellent game with challenging puzzles to solve to help you escape. If you got stuck for an extended period of time helpful hints were provided but not so much as to detract from the game or make it easy!A special mention to Hon who was a brilliant host and we can't wait until you open your next scenario!Thanks very much!Sam and Grace
Amazing. Best time in London in a while. Truly worth a visit. Well worth the money... Very exciting and fun. Good story... Would go back and visit when they have another game :)

Fantastic fun with friends. Our first time taking part in an escape game and we can not wait for them to launch their next experience as we all had such a great time. If you are looking to do something different with friends or colleagues then take part in this unique and challengingly exhilarating activity. Thanks for a great experience, i would highly recommend it!
Ten outta ten. Creative and fun, was just two of us and made it out with 59 seconds left. Fun feeling of intrigue and in the last minutes urgency. Would get locked again.

Such great fun!. I would strongly recommend! Catered for 2 which was ideal. Was such a great hour which was really fun, made us laugh lots, and also use some of those brain cells. The company has been up and running for six weeks or so, but I would do it again if different games/rooms were added or updated.

The Killer. The game was lots of fun & was achievable with only some intervention from staff. So much better in that respect than other escape games...in the clues where possible to nut out yourself. Modern day scenario was great too. Very enjoyable use of an hour. :)

Unique and fun!. We found Enigma Escape on trip advisor and went along as a couple, we found it to be one of the only escape rooms that cater for 2 people! We had never done an escape room before so were unsure what to expect! We were welcomed by a well informed polite guy and looked after with refreshments whilst watching a short film before the game began! I cannot say too much more, only that it was absolutely brilliant! It tested how you work as a team, whilst having a giggle too and we finished with 02:12 minutes remaining on the clock - an amazingly satisfying feeling - needless to say we went away grinning at our success and chatting about it between ourselves for hours! I would highly recommend this experience to groups, couples, anyone looking to have a fun hour or so!!

'Killer experience'. Had a great time at enigma escapes at the recommendation of a friend. Totally immersive and exciting down to the finest detail. The experience has a clear story and the escape is well thought-out and logical. Enjoyed it thoroughly and would absolutely recommend. Just try not to get too carried away!
Time teasing fun!. A brilliant night out with friends. Challenging and so fun. The organiser was so helpful and friendly and the experience was worth every penny. Can't wait for their next one!

Great escape game. Great experience. Went as a group of three. Really enjoyed it. I have done quite a few of escape games, but this was a slightly different experience. This game requires logic, rather than solving random puzzles. Friendly stuff and very helpful. Interesting storyline. Would highly recommend.

Great Escape Room Experience!. Thanks Hon, for a great Escape Experience! Was our first time, and we'll definitely do something like this again. Very friendly welcome, clear explanation, well set-up and a lot of fun. The hints we got came on the right moment - didn't spoil the fun. Would definitely recommend this!

Had an amazing time. Great concept. Totally immersive. Great host - Hon - very friendly, chatty and welcoming. I would highly recommend this experience to everyone ! Lots of fun and really good to have to use your brain and figure out the clues. very easy to get to on public transport - just 5 minutes walk from Holloway Road Tube station.

What a Killer of an experience.. A five star experience from me. A very well thought out design and super fun. The staff members were very kind and helpful from start to finish. The hints we did receive were enough just to get us back on track, rather than telling us exactly what we must do. We had such a fantastic day and great for all. A must try, immersive experience~

Great fun. Went with my 13 year old son and had great fun solving the puzzles. We chose Enigma because they only require 2 players and because of Tripadvisor reviews, and were not disappointed. We have been to a couple of escape rooms before, and this one might possibly have been a little easy with more players, but for the two of us it was just perfect. We got a little stuck in the middle, but with a couple of clues from Hon the game-master we managed to escape on time. Highly recommended from two escape-game-fans!

Killer Experience. This was the second 'Escape Room' experience I have been on, and it was an excellent and satisfying experience - the puzzles were actually logical, well thought out, and immersive.In my previous 'Escape Room' experience in another part of London, I had found it quite frustrating because the puzzles weren't really puzzles - they were just frustrating time wasters, requiring the entire place to be turned upside down and inside out, necessitating endless hints from the game organisers who even said (quite proudly, it seemed to me) that 'no one gets anywhere without plenty of hints'. But that's not good design - a good design should mean that you can work it all out yourself - but the occasional hint might point you in the right direction.Enigma Escape was the perfect experience. When we did find that we needed a little hint, the hints given were just slight pointers towards something we may have already considered and then dismissed - rather than blatant explanations of what to do.It was a really great day, and our game host, Sam, really looked after us. 5 stars!
lots of fun!. This escape game was different to those I did before, so realistic and SO MUCH FUN. Highly recommend.
Amazing Experience. This was my first time at an Escape Experience and I am now hooked, I went there today and i already am impatiently waiting for their next experience to appear

The Killer. Wow where can I start, I've been to a few escape room in my time and this has to be one of the best. We start of with an amazing host with great service and everything has been explained to us in detail. Throughout the game it wasn't too hard that we can't get through so it was perfect. I have already recommended it to a few of my friends because I know that they will enjoy it.

Loved everything about it!. From the ease of getting there to the welcoming customer service, to the fun puzzles and the immersive atmosphere, our team of 4 loved everything about the experience. Can't wait for the next game to open so that we can try again!

Well thought out and different to others. We went as a group of 2 and had a really good time. Not many of the other escape rooms cater for groups of 2 so that was refreshing.The escape room was very well designed and was entirely different to any we have done previously. We managed to escape with only 3 minutes to spare, partially thanks to Sam's guidance. He was very friendly and professional.We look forward to visiting the new room they are planning in the future.

Something a bit different from the others..... We are a group of 5 that have done a number of escape rooms and so was delighted to see a new one open up. Enigma Escapes was slightly different in terms of the skills you had to use, or the way you had to think about things - so it was a great challenge for a team who are becoming experts at these! There were also some nice little touches that added to the experience, but i wont give them away. The host was very friendly, and told us there is a new room coming soon, we will definitely be back!

Great way to spend an hour!. I was looking for a clue/escape type game to go to with my girlfriend as part of her birthday. Of the games allowing two players this was the highest rated game on TripAdvisor, the games with higher rankings had a minimum of three players.I can't say much without giving anything away, but I can say that we were not disappointed! Hon, one of the founders, advised that they had only opened within the past couple of months so I'm sure it's only a matter of time before the ranking is further advanced.We thoroughly enjoyed the experience and look forward to Enigma Escape creating more games for us to try - Hon advised that there are some ideas in the pipeline!

The killer. An amazing escape room, one of the best ones I've experienced!! This is a good experience for you all too try and have an adventure with your friends! Would highly recommend anyone who likes to go out and to just have fun!!

Really Immersive!!!. We booked as a team of 4, 2 of which had previously done an escape room so we thought we knew what to expect. This escape room was something else though! The theming was top class, the host was very friendly and helpful and the room itself was... well I don't want to give anything away but it was definitely worth it!There were lots of "Aha!" moments as we solved various clues and were elated when we escaped with the fastest time to date!
The Killer. It was great :D Me and my friend had so much fun solving the puzzles :P I highly recommend this to anyone! I shall be taking some more of my friends back very soon to see how they fair :P

Great fun. We did it in a group of 5 and had a great time. It's a little crowded with 5 people, optimum would probably be 3 but we still really enjoyed it. We hadn't done any escape room before. It's definitely worth a try and we will be back once they have another room! We escaped with 30 seconds on the clock....a nail biting finish!

Best escape room I have been to!. I have been to many escape rooms in my past and hands down, this has honestly been one of the best experiences out of the lot. The host was excellent, very friendly and made us feel like we were part of the game. Perfect amount of clues and time in order to complete the game, with interesting twists and turns. Definitely recommend!!!
Good last min fun!!. Found enigma escape and booked a last min go on a Friday night. Really enjoyed it, Would definitely recommend going with some friends!

Awesome experience, a must do!. So I've never played an escape game before, but this one was a fab one to get stuck into... there were times where it was tense/scary, in all the right places! And the clues weren't entirely too obvious...Sam was lovely and eased us in, my only problem now, is when are you going to come up with your next adventure? Sign me up...

Awesomesauce. This is one of the best things I've done in London. I would recommend this to anyone that likes a bit of a challenge and fun at the same time. The game is immersive and you are so concentrating on ways to survive against the time. I want to say a lot more but don't want to spoil it for anyone but there are so many surprises the further you go. Definitely a 5 star review!
Excellent Experience. First time at an escape game and loved it. Would recommend this to anyone. Great puzzles and makes you think outside the box.

Awesome Escape Game. We did "The Killer", it was group of four, and we really enjoyed it. The host was super nice. The place itself is not hard to get to, it is really near the underground. The game itself was pretty neat, the provide you with clues if you get stuck. Some of the people in our group of four never played one before and they loved. The ones that have played these type of games before thought it was pretty fun and exciting. Would recommend it! 5 stars all the way :)

So much fun!. My husband and I went to play on a down day during our vacation. Time and money well spent.We were greeted at the door by Hon, one of the owners. He invited us in, lead us to a sort of mini-cinema area and offered popcorn and beverages. We watched a briefing video to give us the background on our current situation. After the short video, and answering any questions we had, we were locked in our room and the fun began.We did the game titled Killer.I won't say anything about the game itself, spoilers and all that, but we had fun and I screamed like a little girl.It was 1hr long after the story brief. You get locked in a room with a timer and you need to solve puzzles and keep calm before time runs out and the killer comes back. If you get stuck, they game's monitor can give you hints.At the end, win or lose, you get your picture taken and added to the Wall for all to see.We won our game and had fun playing it. Looking forward to going again.

Unforgettable!. The most interesting and unique activity I've done in years. Unforgettable fun and a really positive atmosphere. The staff are all incredible, and Enigma Escape is definitely something I've been highly recommending to my friends and family since doing it.

Great fun. Went on bank holiday Monday. Hon was our host. He was very polite and explained everything well as this was our first try at an escape game. If you get really stuck they will give you clues. Would definitely recommend it. We are going to try another one in the future.

Excellent experience - definitely worth trying!!. We were a group of 5 friends participating to this escape game and had an awesome time!!The host was very engaging and we had lots of adrenaline throughout the game trying to find our way out! Great atmosphere, 60 minutes full of surprises and fun!Everyone enjoyed it a lot - would highly recommend it!

Had a great time. My friend and I had a fantastic time! The game was really exciting with various puzzles - this seems to be one of few escape games in London that caters for teams of 2. Great location near tube station (Piccadilly Line). Free drink, free popcorn, great photo op. at the end and medallions for successful teams a nice touch. Fantastic host. Looking forward to future games with Enigma Escape. I suggest not watching the video on the Facebook page before you go - I watched it afterwards, and I preferred it that way. I surprised my friend with this for his birthday - he had no idea what we were doing until the host introduced the game! Would also be a good thing to do on a date!

Very clever escape room game, great experience and awesome value for money. The guys at Enigma Escape have created a really fun, challenging and exciting escape room experience. I did this as a two - with my fiancé - and we found it to be great value for money for the tasks, a really good theme and definitely challenging without it being too difficult to the point that we didn't enjoy it.We've done a couple of these escape room games in London and they tend to be pretty pricey or not available for couples. These guys did the exact opposite, so I hope other companies follow suit.Hon was a great host and explained how everything worked, without giving too much away. Thanks guys, looking forward to any new rooms you open up in the future.

The Great Escape. Enigma Escape is a new addition to London's escape rooms. I been meaning to book an experience for a while and finally did over the bank holiday weekend with some friends.They have a great location a couple minutes walk from Holloway Road tube station. We arrived 10 minutes early as advised and was greeted by the host (Hon) who gave exceptional customer service. We were lead into the briefing room and surprised when we were offered snacks and drink - nice touch and so far so good! Then the game began, we watched a short intro video how the story started and got locked in a cage. I can't tell you anymore from this point onwards as there will be spoilers. All I can say is the story and puzzles are cleverly designed and it felt like a real life situation escaping from a killer within the time allocated (60 mins). There are surprises after surprises throughout the experience and we managed to escape with just under 5 mins remaining.The experienced didn't just stop there as the host spent a good 10 mins talking to us about the game, what we did well and their vision for future games. We had the chance to take photos which was great fun and was given souvenirs for escaping from the killer.The whole experience was awesome, exciting and thrilling. I would recommend this escape game to anyone looking for something different and fun. It's suitable for couples, friends, colleagues, basically anyone! What are you waiting for? Book now!

Very impressive - A must!. Fully recommend! Delivered something unique, unlike other escape rooms. Unusual and varied assortment of things to solve. Very well put together with a great storyline. A surprise around every corner; that even the most seasoned escapist wouldn't expect! Wonderful host who is clearly passionate about what he does. Looking forward to the next instalment whenever that may be - we will return!

Had an amazing time. This was my first escape game and had such a fun afternoon. The game was well thought out and it wasn't too easy or too difficult (although some parts had us stumped for a while!). I will definitely go back if they open more games, but The Killer was fantastic and a great story. This experience would be great for corporate team building exercises, or just a day out with friends or family.Our host (Hon) was lovely and gave us some helpful hints when we were stuck, but not too many that he made it obvious!
Loved it! . Have never done one of these before but we all loved it. Great experience, will definitely come back for your new rooms once they're ready!

Amazing experience right around the corner. We heard of Enigma as we live right aroundthe corner. And absolutely no regret to visit our local.Warm welcome and explanation (dont want to spoil much), very interesting narrative and thrilling experience.Limited to five people due to the size of the room, but to me its a massive plus as you really have to work as a team (i did not like as much some other escape places with massive rooms).So 200% recommanded to all for fun with friends, familly or coworkers!
Amazing!. I've done many of these but this was the best!! You truly forget that you are in a game and the whole story behind it is fantastic. The staff where great and make you feel at home.
REALLY GOOD EXPERIENCE. Had a great time here lovley host free snacks and best of all we completed it! Been to a few of these now and this is def on e of the best! cant go wrong.

Great fun. Will go again soon.. Really wasn't sure what it would be like but me and my friends had a great time and I hope the open more rooms. Parts were hard but with good team work and logic you can escape.
Immersive. A very good experience- immersive from the start and not like other exit games I've played before. Out with 1 minute to spare.

Fab experience . Didn't know what to expect but had SO much fun. Great immersive team building experience.We did it as a family and it was a laugh working together.Would 100% recommend this to anyone who loves a challenge. And getting stuck in.It's a must must must!Well done to the enigma team!
Don't miss out!! . Haven't had so much fun in such a small room !! Never heard my wife scream so much!! Thanks enigma escape for a immersive experience! Respect!!

Great fun and very exciting. Didn't know what to expect with this experience but it was so much fun. Lots of laughs. The puzzles were very well thought out and executed. Definitely had us thinking. We were talking about it lots afterwards too. Definitely recommend to a friend and would go back when the second room is open. Thanks for the great experience.

Group fun - not for the impatient!. This was my second experience of an escape game, and I thoroughly enjoyed it. The game was well-paced, physical and mental, and had everyone scratching their heads... in a good way! Sam is the perfect host - he explains the game well, without giving anything away, and there are nice touches like the 'founders wall' in the entry lobby which give a bit of history about the company. I understand there are plans to open a second game at this site... I will definitely be revisiting for that!
Great fun!. Brilliant fun in a group! Went with work colleagues and things got very competitive...Tricky at times and there is real attention to detail. Would definitely recommend.

Such fun on a rainy Tuesday. I was cynical. It was the middle of the day (specifically, lunchtime) and I was hungry and had loads of work to do. I did not feel like spending an hour trying to escape from a room. Pleasantly surprised when Sam presented us with a packet of popcarn and a bottle of PepsiMax on arrival, things began unravelling (in the right direction) pretty quickly. By then end it was so much fun - don't want to present any spoilers, but it was exciting, clever and brought out the competitive edge in a group of colleagues - great teamwork exercise, and masses of fun.

A unique, fun, fantastic experience!. I organised a team building day out with work to Enigma Escape in August. Sam, the owner was incredibly helpful. He accommodated all of our timing needs & was friendly, informative and very organised. I would recommend this activity for families, friends, couples, work outings you name it. It worked very well for us doing a team building day with work. A great way to have a fun different challenge! Only thing I would say is email Sam if you don't get through calling- hes often busy in the escape rooms!

Brilliant fun!. We made a last-minute booking at Enigma Escape, and were welcomed by our host Hon, who is a great ambassador for the brand! It was a challenging and imaginative experience that I'd recommend to anyone looking for something a bit different.

A great experience!. A friend recently booked a group of us for a game at Enigma Escape, and I honestly didn't know what to expect. But what a night out! Yes, we were a bunch of amateurs, getting stuck at various obstacles and riddles, but after a slow start and a little team work, we had a fantastic game and managed to outwit "The Killer". With the clock ticking, it felt a little tense at times and the 'mood' as you move through the various rooms is creepy but exhilarating. It was an unexpected and unusual night out but one I'd heartily recommend to friends.

Very well done escape room!. I went to the Enigma Escape room with three friends who have done a number of escape rooms in London. The entire experience was very enjoyable and Hon was a very friendly game host. The room was challenging and entertaining. I would definitely recommend this experience to anyone visiting London as well as experienced escape room gamers. I hope they open more rooms.

A well-considered escape the room, with great attention to detail.. We had a crack at Enigma Escape as a birthday outing, and really enjoyed ourselves. It's a well-considered escape the room game, and Sam's enthusiasm for the format is evident in the fantastic attention to detail. I really loved how integral to the story the games felt, and all of our team of four found it fun and challenging. Big thumbs up!

worth the wait. Having been watching this project from the start, at last it was open. Gathered a group of like minded people and went along. Without spoiling the experience, it's more immersive than other similar venues, the setting and story blend well, rather than just being a set of puzzles.It's tense, a little creepy and very satisfying to foil what's going on ( if you manage to get out alive...). All this, and you get free popcorn. Win..

Five star experience. My partner and I did this escape game and found it to be the best experience yet!!! We had done one the previous night and therefore had something to compare it to. It can be quite challenging, as you have to solve one puzzle/crack a code/find a key before you move onto the next, but they give you plenty of hints to help you along the way. You are also aware of how much time you have left which only serves to increase the adrenaline rush towards the end. Given its difficulty, we we pretty euphoric when we came out with a minute and 50 seconds to spare which only heightened the experience for us. Definitely worth a visit!

refreshing experience. Enigma was the best escape game we have done so far (it was the 4th one we have tried). Enigma is original because you need some dexterity for some of the challenges and not just to use your brain. The atmosphere is tense because of a scary killer in the background.

ONE OF THE BEST THINGS TO IN LONDON!!. This escape room is absolutely brilliant. Every single part of the experience was well thought out and delivered in a very professional yet friendly way. Hon (the creator) is such a nice guy and very very welcoming. The design of the escape room was brilliant, it is very clear a lot of time, money and thought went into it. Hon is always there to help no matter what to ensure you get the most out of the experience. We were treated with drinks and popcorn during the introduction and then once give very clear and concise instructions/rules we were locked in the escape room with an hour to escape. Of course, there was a key on the door for emergencies which made us all feel safe, but of course the fun is had not using the key but using the clues to escape. I highly highly recommend this place. I will definitely be returning when Hon expands with more escape rooms. A true GEM in London.

Team work!. A really fun experience, definitely makes you work those little grey cells to the max! A little nervous to start with but we soon got in to the swing and found out our strengths and weaknesses! Have to say without the helpful hints/prompts from our host I swear we would still be in there but we managed to get out with 5 mins to spare - definitely worth a visit. Can't wait to see the next Enigma Escape game up and running.

Hon is a 'Don'. I did this experience on the 15th of August along with my brother and his friend Sammy. When we got there, we were greeted by Hon in a very welcoming way, and he is a very lovely man who is clearly an entrepreneur who knows what he is doing. I am 16, my brother is 17, and the escape experience itself was rather challenging, but we managed to complete it with 5 minutes to spare! There was a lot of detail and care taken into the story and set up of the escape challenge too, with awesome gadgets and features included (I wont give anything away). I certainly believe that this experience is great for teens or older (it may be slightly too challenging and scary for children; no hints but the first escape room [they are yet to build others, but they are on the way] is called 'the killer' so not suitable for young children). The entire challenge was exciting the whole way through and I really felt like I was in a spy movie, and with numerous special features or controls, it wasn't hard to forget that it's all fake! Furthermore, we started in a 'cinema' and were given complementary refreshments to make it seem even more real life. I can see that Hon is really passionate about the escape rooms, and too right, they're excellent! I definitely recommend this experience to anyone looking for a fun challenge and day out, something different to the typical cinema, or the park: something for interesting people!

cool experience. It was a lower budget then some of the other rooms we visited, but they went for a more "how would you escape if you were actually trapped" type of atmosphere, which we liked. The intro was original and we felt very taken care of. And the owner who was our gamemaster showed a customer service that was extraordinary, both before and especially afterwards, having two hours slots so he could really interact with the customers. That went a long way with us.

Amazing Experience! . I cannot speak more highly of this place! The game was fantastic fun and a real challenge, but alongside this, Sam the host, and owner was phenomenal, from the moment we entered the venue he was exceptional and it really made our day! He even took the time to put up a 'happy birthday' banner for my boyfriend! Would 100% recommend!

Awesome! Best experience!. Even though one of the five of us played the phone version of escape games, the puzzles here were still challenging and fun to do! Hints were given when we needed it (and sure did we need it when we got stuck more than a few times!) and with a couple minutes to spare we came out satisfied with the room.Anyone who are interested in riddles and puzzles, I would definitely recommend this to anyone from little kids to adults, (a great family game!) and they did a really good job in making a realistic representation of the phone version of the game!
Fun with friends!. This was such a cool new exciting activity To do with friends. Great for birthdays or when you want something fun and different!

Very immersive game! Great with Friends!. Definitely worth going to this! A great mix of puzzles. Hints were provided when we asked which helped us get passed some tricky points in the game. Such a great laugh with friends/family we spoke about the different puzzles we encountered for the rest of the day which provided plenty of laughs! The game with very immersive. The countdown letting us know time remaining which added pressure. The music was gave us the right mood setting. Host was really friendly. We went as a group of 5 which I think worked well.
Excellent team building event! . This escape game was really thought provoking, fun and exciting! One of the best interactive games to be played in London. Thank you for the experience!!

What an amazing time 10/10. We wanted something to do that was a bit different in London and came across escape games and thought we'd try Enigma Escape room for our first one. So having no experience of what to do or expect we wondered how we would do.Our host Hon was fantastic, having explained how it worked, (you can go through the escape room without hints and tips if you are experienced), but for us, Hon was able to give us a small hint if we were stuck for too long on any aspect of the Game. It was just amazing how the game flowed and the adventure unfolded, which was amazing considering we hadn't done this before & all credit to Hon.We all said what an epic hour this was, full of puzzles, codes & surprises, 24 hours on & we're all still buzzing about it.So my wife & I, (in our fifties) took our daughter & friend (16) and were a team of 4, great number for interaction and bouncing ideas.Overall a fantastic and unique experience, you don't need to be athletic or mega intelligent just keep an open mind and try and think clearly & logically, which is tricky when all you want to do is rush and panic!Best time ever, would do it all again, can't tell you anything about the content it would just ruin it for you, but book your Engima Escape NOW !!! You'll love it !!!

Loved it!!. It was the first real life escape room my cousins and I tried, and It was really fun!!! It was a little challenging (just because some of my cousins were younger than 15- but the people were super helpful, giving us hints when we got stuck). The rooms were extremely well set out and the puzzles were really cleverly (and logically) put together! Would definitely recommend this for teens and adults! Can't wait for the new room!!

Great fun for my teenagers!. I didn't personally play this experience but my teenage kids (15) (16) (18) did and they absolutely LOVED it. All they could talk about on the way home was how much fun they had and wanting to do it again. They wouldn't tell me anymore as they didn't want to spoil it for me, so I'm going to book a game soon to see what it's all about. Thanks for Enigma Escape for making me the best mum ever!

First Ever Escape Room - Loved it. I've seen many of these advertised before and a group of friends and I did it on the spur of the moment - we were not disappointed! A very nice set up, some clever tricks and very aptly named as 'The Killer'! Would recommend to anyone who wanted to try something different - or for experienced players. I look forward to your second room when it is completed!

Very cool! . I went here the day after it opened with my friends so we were one of the first to experience it. I haven't done an escape room before but I must say this has been an awesome experience. The puzzle is well thought out with a clear plot and we all had a lot of fun. The host was also very welcoming and friendly. I would definitely recommend this as a group activity and will be trying our other escape rooms to see how they compare!

a\m/esome eXperience. Great atmosphere. Dark & erie set up. A lot of mystery & intrigue. Great logical puzzles.Definitely a team activity, wear comfy trainers, bring you wits & your thinking caps.It's a 60 minute game with a 15 minute brief & debrief at the end.Awesome host, introduction, & a\m/esome eXperience!Thanks EE

great fun. i went with a group of 3 and we had a great time. we loved the concept and atmosphere. it's difficult to say much without giving away anything!when we arrived we had a free drink and small bag of popcorn which was gratefully received as we walked from caledonian road on a hot day. then the adventure started. after some tricky puzzles and a few surprises, we managed to escape with over 5 min to spare. we were congratulated with a medal and badge, which was nice but not really necessary. we also had a photo that was emailed to us that i thought was a nicer souvenir. i thought the game was sufficiently difficult, and we required a few clues to help us. it was also nice to have the debrief afterwards with hun to hear more about their fledging company.the only downside for me was that holloway was a bit far to travel. however i would return for another game when they release it!
great experience. The game is really good although we didn't come out. Very good experience. Will recommend to anyone.

Highly Recommended !. Having only done one 'Escape Game' before this I didn't have much to go on, but this one was 100 times better than the previous game I tried. Our host was great and explained that having tried many games themselves the founders wanted to bring something different to the table and really make the players feel immersed in the game. They have definitely succeeded in this! My friend and I really felt we needed to escape the room, and the storyline made a lot more sense than the other escape game I went to. This was clever, fun, puzzling and we will definitely be heading back when Enigma opens more games. Great experience and thank you to Hon, who made us feel very welcome :)
Brilliant fun. Brilliant escape room! My boyfriend and I have escaped most of the rooms in London and In my experience it's a close 2nd to ClueQuest. Well worth a visit.
Awesome time. We've tried a few escape rooms but this is one of the best. Great puzzles and fun! Adds a little something physical as well as mental so it's an all round challenge. Loved it!!

Best Escape Game I've Done In UK & NYC.. I have done these escape games in New York City, Birmingham and London, this is by FAR the best one that I have been to.Very easy to find, very friendly and welcoming member of staff (Hon) and a great price with the 25% off special offer! This game is very different to others that I have done before, in others I have played you are trying to solve a crime or just solving a random assortment of puzzles that don't make any real sense or add to the story. From the moment it begins you are involved in the story, not on the outside looking in, you're playing it from your prospective, you're not solving crimes, you are trying to escape for your safety.All of the puzzles and challenges are all linked to the story, the whole thing flows well and you are constantly thinking, trying to work out how to escape. We didn't manage to escape but discovered we were very close to getting out, after that we were taken to do a promotional photo where there was a huge selection of signs, banners, emojis etc to hold up, something I've not seen at a UK game before.When the new games open me and my friend will be visiting again, something we stated at the time as it is in a different league to ones we've done before. Also this is one of the few that accommodates for 2 people games, many start at 3 people only. If you are looking to do an escape challenge this is THE one to tackle.

Brilliant way to spend an hour. If you loved The Crystal maze in your childhood then you're going to love Enigma Escape. You're in a team and have 60 minutes using all four challenges - skill, mental, physical and mystery to crack the game.Having played a few escape games already I would definitely recommend Enigma Escape. Well thought out puzzles and really tested us against the clock. This is a must for all escape game lovers.

Brilliant!. Visited Enigma Escape with a friend, We were ideally looking for somewhere that could cater to a team of 2, which many escape games do not. We were warned that it might be a bit more of a challenge with only 2 people, however it was still achievable. We both liked the sound of the game "The Killer" due to us being horror fans. The game itself was very logically challenging, the story was great and you do really feel immersed in the experience. Our host, Hon was brilliant and provided us with drinks and snacks before the game, gave us hints when we really needed them and to say that they are a very new company, gave a great service. We managed to escape with a few minutes on the clock and were rewarded with medals and badges. It is clear a lot of planning and organisation has gone into this.
